Summary: Why is this a 3 star hotel??  I just stayed at a 4 star in Tahoe this week that was way below the caliber of this hotel.  We just left this morning.  Check in and out was super easy.  Room was clean, large, no complaints.  We are IHN platinum ambassadors and this property was a delightful surprise.  Really can't say much else other than this should be a 4 star and fantastic location!

Summary Heading: Excellent Evening at Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa OC
Summary: We stayed a night for president‚Äôs day weekend. We checked in around 8 PM and were greeted by excellent service from their front desk specialist, Alexander. Alexander was quick to get us checked in and truly helped us feel welcome. I can say it was one of the best check in experiences I have had. He was able to provide all pertinent info we needed and promptly direct us to our room. We found our room very clean and ready for a relaxing evening after a day on our feet. Thanks Alexander and the team at Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange County!

Summary Heading: Great service from Alexander, Javier and the rest of the team.
Summary: Great service from walking in the front door to checkout. Stayed 10 nights and Javier and Alexander on the front desk were brilliant - nothing was too much bother for the dream team ! Room was quiet and comfortable and the hotel is in a good location for shops, restaurants and bars. I'll definitely use again if I'm ever back in Orange County.
Room tip: Ask for a pool view if you want the quietest rooms.

Summary: The front desk receptionist, Alexander was very accommodating to me. He was polite and super respectful.  Gave me a king room on the top floor and let me know about the hotel policies and amenities.  I will come back to this hotel In the near future.  Thank you, Alexander for a pleasant stay.  Jimmy L

Summary Heading: Great time had and lovely hotel
Summary: Stayed here over Xmas and new year, great location for getting around. Hotel spotless and clean. Facilities good all round, staff very helpful at all times, especially Alexander helped with all our needs, nothing was to much trouble and would definitely stay here again and recommend to others.  Food and drink in the attached Fireside Tevern lovely.
Room tip: Great hotel, staff wonderful and great location especially for the shops and getting around

Summary Heading: BREAKFAST INCLUDED OR EVEN AVAILABLE IF YOU PAY IS NOT ALWAYS TRUE
Summary: We have stayed here before it HAS happened before however I thought we all make mistakes however at exactly 10:10am we come down for breakfast EVERYTHING is completely cleaned and closed though sign states buffet breakfast ends at 11am we are very UPSET üò† we have 2 rooms and now we are all stuck having to figure out where to go for breakfast we are wasting time and money! GIVE YOUR GUESTS WHAT YOU OFFER !!
Room tip: Unless its early DONT plan on having breakfast buffet even if you payed though it should end at...
Manager Response: Dear lizette v,  Thank you for making us a part of your travel. Here at Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange County, we‚Äôve thought of everything to help you unwind and rest easier, ensuring a productive day ahead.  I saw your comments and am sorry for the events that made your stay unsatisfactory. I know this is not what you expected from a quality chain like ours. Furthermore, I forwarded your comments to our local area managers and took action to prevent this from happening again.  I invite you to come and visit us on your next travel so you can create new memorable moments here.  Great wishes,  Oscar C. Case Manager IHG Service

Summary: We needed to fly to Orange County a day earlier than planned or we would have been stuck in the cold for the holiday.  Booked this with my IHG points. Check in was a breeze, Alexander is just as great as the reviews. I tried to take him home with us but they quickly attached a ball & chain to his ankle making him too heavy for even 2 of us to carry.  The bed was very comfortable, we didn‚Äôt hear any sounds from other rooms or the hallway, very good sound proofing! The best thing about the room was the rain shower. It was the best rain shower I‚Äôve ever had!

Summary Heading: Does not provide daily room clean up or fresh linen
Summary: Hotel does not change bed linen nor clean room.    Booked five nights.  Come to find out second day they don‚Äôt do not change bed linen nor clean. The room.   Also big surprise upon arrival,  they charge $25 parking fee.     The room is ok except minor details, but I am shocked this place is in category of a hotel.   It is a motel.   It reminds me of the old days Motel 6
Manager Response: Hi ggoogglle d,   We appreciate you for choosing our hotel. Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your stay.       We strive to achieve high-quality standards, deliver guest satisfaction and serve travelers needs. I'm sorry that did not happen during your stay. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. I forwarded this to our hotel management for improvement of guest experience. I've also sent you a private message to discuss this further.       We hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.     Sincerely,      Riz E.  Case Manager   IHG Service

Summary Heading: Stay here over other hotels in the area!
Summary: Compelled to write this because of the exceptional service I received from Alexander at the front desk. I was initially booked at the Hilton across the street - after many issues I called the front desk here and Alexander immediately made me feel safe, comfortable, and valued. My trip was for business and he helped ensure I had a nice room with strong wifi. The room is very good, modern with a lot of outlets and plenty of storage. My only room for improvement would be to level up the amenities in the bathroom, currently they‚Äôre a bit basic. Learned my lesson from other hotels in the area and I will only be staying here every time I visit OC!

Excellently customer service from the front desk team.  Javier made sure to accommodate our needs since I broke a foot right before our trip.  Alexander was so helpful to make our Thanksgiving celebration away from home a great one.  Just a fabulous team who really cares.  Would definitely come back to stay here again.  Location is another plus!

Amazing customer service especially from Alexander. Alexander has an amazing way of making all guest feel welcomed and happy during your stay. Everything is straight up and forward while checking in with him!

I was looking forward to staying at this hotel before my trip to Europe with early morning flight.  The hotel photos showed a nice and modern look and it was indeed renovated with good color and taste.  The only thing that showed its age is the doors but that‚Äôs not important.   However, when I remove the pillows on the first of 2 beds, I see hair fibers.  Small black lint balls likely from socks were also visible under the comforter.  Moved to the second bed and initially looked better but after I removed the comforter, 2 coils of long black hairs as well as a third straight hair fibers were found.  I was very tempted to call and switch room but I only had less than 5 hours to rest so picked the cleaner of the 2.    Next day after I put my polo shirt and jacket on I also noticed
Manager Response: Dear iancE6385SZ,  We are grateful for the recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenges you faced during the stay.  We have since communicated this information to our housekeeping staff to prevent this from happening in the future.  We wish you well in your travels and hope to have another opportunity to host you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Assistant General Manager

Summary: As a member of IHG we were placed in the preferred member room.  The shower didn‚Äôt work, there was no maid service and we were not notified that we had to request maid service. They were out of coffee for the room and the best they could do was provide a voucher for free coffee if we picked it up at the restaurant.
Manager Response: Hi TheAdmin,  Thanks for your review and for staying with us. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience. I am sorry for the level of service you encountered during your stay. I have shared your concerns with the hotel management and sent you a private message to obtain additional information.  Again, thanks for your feedback. We hope to have another opportunity to provide you with a better stay.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa on line listing had suites that were designated for accessibility. We weren't sure about other places in the same area. The suite was spacious and neat. The furnishing seemed to target business guests, simple, utilitarian almost. That was fine with us. The price was reasonable. Be sure when booking on line to look at the packages for parking and breakfasts, as they may or may not be included in the price.  The staff were accommodating for our needs and were helpful. We were able to get another room near the accessibility suite which was our primary need. There was coin laundry, ice machines, and microwave available in one of the service rooms. There is an exercise room, and a pool. The pool is heated, and the pool area is well maintained.  The pool depth

Summary Heading: large rooms, not the best value
Summary: If you're looking for space for a large family, the slightly cheaper price could make this a good option.  When I stayed here, there was only a round bar of soap and a travel size bottle of shampoo. Fortunately I brought toothpaste. There was a coffee maker but no water. When I went to the front desk, I had to buy a drink. When I asked for a toothbrush, they said you can buy one from the store. Wtf? At least the service desk just let me take one. I would've been annoyed.   They had limited facilities, or I didn't have time to check them all out. The restaurant food I tried was mediocre while service was very good. All the staff were courteous. They had hand sanitizer publicly available. I think the lack of supplies is due to being short staffed with limited budget.
Manager Response: Hello onestarocean,  I hope you have a wonderful day today. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange County, where we make business travel works.  We always go beyond providing excellent service and a comfortable stay to our beloved guests. I'm sorry if there is an issue during your stay with us.  I will share your comments with our upper hotel management team to take the necessary steps to avoid the same mistake from reoccurring in the future.  We thank you again for being a valued guest. When your travel takes you back to Indianapolis, we hope to welcome you back for a more pleasant stay.  Yours in hospitality,  Melissa P Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Nice hotel, its clean and spacious with huge comfortable beds. There is also decent sound proofing between rooms and the corridors which is an underrated bonus.   The breakfast is quite expensive however the service is great and very hospitable.  I didn't try out the pool as sadly I didn't have the time, but it looked very inviting.
Manager Response: Hi Tish008,  Thank you for telling us about your experience in Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange County . Our hotel is the perfect place to enjoy a quality stay in an environment were you can enjoy with all the family.  I so your evaluation of our services and I am sorry that they where not to your expectation. I know that when you reserve you have options and that you choose us because this is not what you are accustomed from us. I documented your case and shared it with our local area managers. We took immediate action to avoid this from being an issue in our guest's future stays.   I invited you to visit us on your next trip so we can provide you with a new view of our services.   Warm regards,  Oscar C. Case Manager IHG Service

Summary: The location of this property is excellent!  It is right off the freeway and very close to to South Coast Plaza.  The facility is in top-notch condition and very clean.  Room decor is modern and tasteful, and the bathroom is luxurious and well-lit.  One of the lights was burned out, however, and we had to get a replacement from the front desk, which was of a different type but actually shed a better light!  Housekeeping/maintenance needs to pay better attention to such details.  Service was friendly, and overall our stay here was enjoyable.  I would certainly recommend this hotel!

We booked this hotel thinking we were going to pay a little more, but it would be worth it because of the great amenities they said were available. We showed up and they said their gym, spa, and restaurants were closed, and they were no longer doing the shuttle service or breakfast. These were all things we were told were available before we even booked. After traveling as far as we did and thinking we were getting a great place to stay, we were extremely disappointed. And if you book this hotel you will be too.
Manager Response: Deary AdelynL10,  We appreciate your recent visit and vital feedback regarding your stay.  I am very sorry we fell short of your expectations when it came to the amenities being offered at the moment.  We are still working our way back to open everything up, and hope to have everything in the coming weeks.  We wish you well in your travels.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Assistant General Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying at Crown Plaza. The 2 clerks, Javier & Angel, where professional, respectful, and very personable. Great Customer Service and excellent room for the price!!! Ben & Dana
Manager Response: Your visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa is greatly appreciated along with your kind words.  We are lucky to have them part of our team and we hope to host you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my boyfriend for about a week to spend quality time together. There were some issues with our room but any problems were quickly resolved to our satisfaction by the manager Javier Jaimes. Very pleased. I will definitely stay here C again after all of the amenities are available. :)
Manager Response: Dear lovesammyv,  Thank you for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate your vital feedback regarding the issues and being able to have those resolved.  We look forward to hosting you soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed for one night for business. King room was large, the bed was super comfortable, VERY CLEAN, the shower was fantastic. great water pressure.   I checked-in around 1am, parking wasn't an issue. (They do charge for parking though) I noticed a security guard patrolling the lot, which was nice.   Front desk staff was very friendly. I didn't get a chance to use any of the facilities as I had an early start to the day, but everything looked great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the fantastic newly renovated Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are are so happy to hear you had a comfortable stay and felt welcomed.  We hope to host you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Services Manager

Summary: We have been here at the Hotel for our annual Club Pilates Teacher Trainer Summit all week. Some are visiting from out of town and staying at the hotel. The staff has been exceptional. They have changed and rearranged the conference rooms for our various studies and testing. Computer work, TRX, you name it! And the catering staff has been the absolute best! Providing a variety of hot and cold healthy food and drinks (but cookies, too!) Thank you to everyone who helped make this stressful week stress-free outside the classroom! #thepilatesbee
Manager Response: Thank you for having your master trainer training at our hotel.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the food, staff and complete visit.  We hope to host your team again next year.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Be aware of the extra charges
Summary: This appears to be an older CP property - but efforts are being made to bring it up to date.  On the plus side:. The staff are friendly and the location is Central to most of Orange County.  The minus side: There is a parking fee of $14 per day (even if you don't use the covered parking structure).  That small breakfast service that seems to be free at most hotels these days is $21 here and was substandard at that (room temp food).  The misc stuff: Our room heater would work for about 5 minutes, then would only blow cold air.  In short, if you're gonna going to stay at an IHG property in this part of OC - just stick with a Holiday Inn Express.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay at our recently renovated hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and sorry we didn't meet your expectations.  We wish you well in your travels.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: To be honest, I would rate this property at 2 1/2 stars if that was possible.  I stayed here for six nights for business and chose this property after reading mostly positive reviews and comparing nightly rates with nearby hotels.  The good:  Clean, basic rooms; centrally located to SNA airport, shopping and dining; good, basic food and breakfast options at the hotel restaurant/bar; comfy beds, in-room small refrigerator and nice small pool area with the obligatory hot tub.  The not so good:  Four out of six nights, I had a ground floor room facing the parking lot/street and didn't get much sleep due to the constant loud road noise and mechanical sounds of the nearby elevator.  I always travel with a white noise machine and earplugs and they weren't enough to combat the noise!
Manager Response: We are grateful for the recent visit and vital feedback given.  We are happy to hear you found the hotel central to your needs, however sorry to know your sleep was disrupted.  If you are ever back in the area we would be happy to get you a quite room from the start.   Warm regards,   Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Crowne Plaza for 3 nights while on company business. The room was very spacious with a comfortable king size bed. The room was overlooking the pool/hot tub. I really liked that the room was updated in current color schemes and it was very clean and quiet. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the very nice Crowne Plaza hotel in Costa Mesa.  Helpful to know the space and comfort was to your liking.  We hope to see you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My wife is checking in tonight on business so I called in to have some fruit and water sent to her room.  Amy who picked up the phone was courteous, efficient, super helpful and kind.  Thank you Amy!  Kudos to management for having excellent people pick up the phone.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear Amy provided great service at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  The feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope to host your family again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My daughter & I stayed here for two nights last week.  The staff were all lovely, rooms very clean & comfortable with great wifi & heaps of USB ports available which was brilliant when you have to work & have multiple devices that need to be kept charged. There was only 2 small negatives we could mention, the bathrooms really could use an exhaust fan & the cleaning staff were a little too eager to clean our room, the first morning knocking on the door at 8.45am & on the day we were checking out she woke us at 8am & even though we were checking out at midday, wanted to come in & clean. Maybe she just got our room mixed with another though? No biggie, but we would love to have slept in a bit longer as we were still jet lagged. We found lovely really reasonably priced food in small
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed the great stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Happy the room was helpful in keeping your devices charged and location was central to your needs.  Please come back to see us soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed for one night, wished I could have stayed longer. Suite was very nice- rooms were clean am I had a restful sleep. Very close to the airport and within walking distance of restaurants and a Mitsuwa Marketplace.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are so happy you enjoyed your suite.  Please come back and stay a few additional days.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: A convenient location is adjacent to a few freeways.  Very close to South Coast Plaza. Hotel staff is both friendly and professional.  Very comfortable beds..& hotel has been remodeled about a year ago.  Nice quality establishment.   The "rain" shower facet is great.  A few concerns:  windows on higher floors don't open.  The nicely laid out hot tub isn't really hot, and the jets are almost non-functioning.  If one orders the package with "breakfast included" - they don't tell you this on their website - but it's only a continental breakfast - the website is misleading. But overall, I certainly enjoyed my stay.  They just need to make a few corrections.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We definitely understand your concerns and appreciate you taking the time to get those communicated with us.    We hope to host you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Price for the Quality and Location
Summary: This is a great hotel, centrally located so whether you want to be by the airport, great shopping and good food, you've got all of them.  The service is awesome and the price is great for the quality of service and location.  Room service is a little $$$ but there are so many places to go out and eat, you don't need it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent visit to our property.  We are glad you enjoyed your visit and the central location of the hotel.  Please come back to see us soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Our go-to hotel in Orange County is the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa. Our clients rave to us about the food, the ambiance and the friendly and efficient staff. Oscar, the Banquet Captain, always takes care of all our needs. We look forward to working again with Oscar and the rest of his great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for making the newly renovated Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa your go to hotel in Costa Mesa.  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the ambiance and staff.    We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This property used to be the old Hilton right off the freeway exit. It was under a multi phase renovation when we visited for a recent weekend in So Cal. Staff were very helpful for early check-in and quite accommodating overall. On site restaurant, typical hotel amenities and ample parking. Reasonably prices and comfortable room. It will be top notch once the renovations are completed. Close to shopping, and a bout 3 miles from the beach. Can't blame the hotel for the horrendous traffic congestion in that area, but BEWARE! Add a lot of extra travel time if whether using the freeways and/or side streets. Approximately 10 minutes from John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent visit and vital feedback regarding your stay.  Many years ago this property was a Holiday Inn and we are across from the Hilton.  We look forward to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I love this hotel. It's conveniently located to my students college, shopping, restaurants and close to the beach. The staff is great and they have the best breakfast a hotel could offer. Arturo and Julio have served us on multiple visits in the restaurant and give such warm hospitality! Its always great to see them when we stay at the Crown.  We love the accommodations and look forward to staying there each time we're in town!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are so happy Arturo and Julio gave you a warm welcome.  Please come back to see us again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange County
Summary: Attended a conference in Costa Mesa.  Even though there was renovation work underway, the Crowne Plaza was a great place to stay the week.  Staff was helpful and friendly.  My room was clean and comfortable.  Restaurants were nearby as was shopping options.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed the great stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We hope to host you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel has recently been renovated and the rooms are nice and comfortable. Front desk people are very nice and helpful. Parking is easy and location is great. There is a coffee shop on the ground floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying the great location and great service at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We hope to welcome you back soon!   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent stay at the hotel.  We stayed on the 1st floor, overseeing the pool.  We thought it was going to be noisy, but we didn't hear much noise from the pool.  The Air-Con is quiet loud, but it also provided a "white noise" effect which helps to dampen other noises.   There's a laundry room on the first floor, which is great for those who are travelling for multiple days.  The bar has a breakfast buffet; perfect for my stay there because I needed an quick early-morning breakfast before my meetings.  There's also water provided at the lobby!    The location is great!  so close to a lot of restaurants.  and so close to Mitsuwa (7-minute walk across the street), a Japanese supermarket/food court/grocery store.  There are a lot of good restaurants inside Mitsuwa.  It's also
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you had a great visit at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are happy you enjoyed the central location and food.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Despite the fact that the elevator did not work, nor did the ice machine on our floor, staff was friendly and accommodating.  Room was clean and comfortable.  They did say it was recently renovated but bathroom lacked a fan and has some visible damage where the shower rod was previously anchored.  Overall a decent place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent visit.  We are glad you had a comfortable visit.  We hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A Very Nice Stay In Costa Mesa
Summary: Recently we had the chance to stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa California.  After a very busy day and a longer than planned drive to the hotel; we had a very friendly and prompt check in. While we just missed food service at the Fireside restaurant, there was a McDonalds next to the hotel and there were other options down the street.  The hotel parking lot seemed to have some work being done so while the spaces were all full; the parking garage had plenty of roof parking and it was a short walk from the garage to the lobby.  The hotel lobby was very inviting and there was also a small store for snacks and sundries for guests to select from. Our room was very comfortable as it had a Flat Screen television with plenty of channels and very good Wi-Fi.  The hotel also offers a
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We are happy you had a wonderful stay and appreciate the vital feedback provided.  Hope to see you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great front desk - kudos to Alex
Summary: There was nine of us, all literally wiped out from a seven hour drive. When we came to check in, Alex at the front desk was so accommodating, with a positive attitude despite having a full occupancy, managed to get us great rooms. To top it off he helped us with our luggage up the stairs to the new tower to get the rooms we wanted. All with a big smile on his face. It‚Äôs those kinds of people who make a difference for customers. Kudos Alex and thanks to Crowne Plaza for having such folks onboard
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We are happy Alex was able to assist you.  We hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My family and I have been coming here for 4 years and it has always been such a great experience. This hotel has the best customer service and the most friendly/ thoughtful staff like Arturo, Juilo and the entire kitchen/housekeeping and front desk staff. I genuinely recommend this hotel for a relaxing, comfortable, great hotel to go to. Definitely so happy with our experience of staying in this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay and your continued patronage of the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are so happy  the entire team continues to welcome you and we look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I checked into the hotel and really appreciated the professional and kind help I got from Javier. I like the hotel, and the staff is pro. The pool and the room were very nice. I did not use the restaurant. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to hear Javier helped you kindly.  We hope to see you again.

Summary: A friend and I stayed for two nights in adjoining rooms.  The rooms were clean and used white bedspreads, always a  good sign that the sheets might also be clean. The bed was quite comfortable.  Those were the good points.   Now to the negatives:  we came back to the hotel after shopping, hoping to nap before getting ready for dinner.  There was very loud banging overhead, sounding like a large hammer hitting metal..  I asked about the noise at the front desk, and the answer was  ‚Äúoh that‚Äôs construction.   they are working on the plumbing and the sound reverberates through the hotel‚Äù.  It was impossible to rest with loud noise going on.  We had headaches and our dinner was not fun. The door to the room felt as if it was made of lead.  I had to use both hands to pull it open and
Manager Response: Dear Skeeter32,  Thank you very much for the recent stay and vital feedback shared.  I am extremely sorry to hear of the very challenging visit you had.  We are currently almost completely done with construction and any noise.  Since your visit we have also passed this information to our restaurant manager as a training opportunity for our staff.   We hope to have another opportunity to host you so that you may see this last stay was an exception.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Crowne Plaza is a very good hotel close to the main roads and the huge South Coast Plaza shopping mall. Very clean and spacious rooms, very good bed and a perfect bathroom. Furthermore a small but well equipped fitness center and a delicious breakfast. Stayed there for 5 nights and would do it again if in the neighborhood.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are happy you enjoyed your time with us and the central location.  We look forward to seeing you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Located near John Wayne Airport and local businesses. Rooms were decent, stayed in one of their remodeled suites. Parking was limited due to construction out front, not sure about the parking structure in the back. Large open room plan, including nice walk-in shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay and vital feedback.  We are happy you enjoyed the suite and hope to host you again in the future.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Well-priced, request the newly renovated wing (but it did not have a functioning elevator during my stay!)
Summary: The room at the Crowne Hotel in Costa Mesa itself was spacious and newly renovated.  So newly renovated, in fact, that the wing I was staying in didn‚Äôt have a functioning elevator (I was told they were waiting for inspection).  I was offered a room with small beds on the ground floor (I don‚Äôt do ground floor), or a not renovated room (no thank you).  *I* had to suggest that I‚Äôd like to keep my original room, but that I‚Äôd like help with my luggage up the three flights of stairs.  She called someone to assist me after I requested assistance, but I don‚Äôt think it was his normal job. I felt bad for him, because due to my three week trip, my two bags were quite heavy.    The gal at the front desk was very sweet, kind, and calm (but seemingly a bit out of the loop on what I would
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our recently renovated property.  As you are aware we are still going through the final phase of our construction, which includes the elevator.  We are grateful for all of the feedback given.    We hope to host you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed 2 nights at this hotel. Front desk manager Aldo  was the perfect person in hospitality business. Hotel is going through construction phase. Restaurant was good and wine served was good. Hotel is going through changeover from Holiday Inn to Crown Plaza.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent visit and vital feedback given.  I appreciate your kind words and hope to see you again.  We should been done with our construction by early July.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Selected this hotel because of location close to customer, was not disappointed
Summary: I had a meeting in this area, and selected the hotel because of that (I was looking for a hotel from the IHG group). I arrived pretty late, was tired and hungry and hoped the hotel would offer a good room to sleep and room service so I could still do some preparation work for my customer visit next day. Check-in was as expected, the room was fine: clean,  sufficient space, a good bed, a desk that can indeed be used to put your laptop and some papers in a decent way, fast internet, bathroom was fine too. I ordered some dinner (I can recommend the chicken, it was very good!). I'm always a bit uncomfortable when the staff enters my room and put my dinner on the table, and prefer the room doors stays open. The lady providing the dinner had some kind of doorlock to block the door in
Manager Response: Dear Erbee64,  We are very happy you chose our hotel while you were in the area.  Thank you for all the great feedback regarding your stay.  If you find yourself in the area again, please come back to see us.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Really nice place, was currently undergoing upgrades so if you're a day sleeper the noise might be a little rough, but they do offer earplugs and a white noise maker at the front desk if you need it.  I didn't run into any problems but the staff made me feel of there was a problem, they'd get it taken care of.   Not sure if I had an older room or newer one but the mini-fridge was just chillin in a weird spot against the wall on the floor, sort of in the way, but I would rather have it there than not have any at all.  There's no bathtub, shower only. So if you're looking for a soak, won't be here.  Docked a point for the fact that at least two elevators were out of service during my stay. The restaurant had some of the slowest service I've ever had (put that on separate review)
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us some very detailed and important feedback on your visit.  We take your feedback as a gift so that we may use to further improve.   Glad to know overall you had a nice stay.  Please come back and see us in July once the renovation has been completed.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Even though the hotel is suffering and on going renovation, almost not disturbance (besides the fact one of the elevators was not working). All the staff is really friendly. Nice and clean rooms. Nice outdoor pool and a really quiet hotel. Very close to restaurants and shops make it a very convenient venue for a short business or shopping trip. Hotel keeps improving the service and that‚Äôs something that will make me return.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the 'Great Hotel,' aka the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate your understanding regarding the renovation and your kind words of the staff.  Please come back and see us once the renovation has been completed.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casnaova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Went yo the restaurant for breakfast and had the best service from Arturo. He was so attentive to all my needs, timely and respectful. He truly made me feel at home.  Would recommend this place to others thanks to him!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa and more specifically the Fireside Tavern.  Glad to hear Arturo was able to make you feel at home.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Ambiance & amenities doesn‚Äôt do this kind staff justice
Summary: I travel frequently for work and have stayed here multiple times over the past year. Without fail, the staff is kind, personable, and gracious and, surprisingly, the restaurant has good food and a good bartender. I wish the actual hotel rooms had the same attention to detail that their staff gives to their guests. The hallways seem to smell of 20-year-old cigarette smoke, combined with outdated wallpaper and hair dryers that will singe your tresses -it‚Äôs no wonder the hotel is undergoing an all out renovation. Notwithstanding, the bed and pillows are comfortable and the price is within the budget.
Manager Response: Dear Bseblgrl13,  We very happy to know that the staff helped to make your past stays with us an enjoyable experience.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the actual hotel and look forward to hosting you once the renovation has been completed.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Crown Plaza during a recent business trip. The hotel is currently under renovation, which is the only negative part of my experience. While I was never disturbed by any of the work, many of the hallways and other common areas were quite messy, dusty, or cluttered. Aside from that, my room was very nice, quiet, and clean. The staff was friendly, and it was a great overall experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay and vital feedback.  We do apologize regarding the renovation but very happy to hear you were not disturbed.  Please come back and see us again as we will be finishing the renovation in the next three months.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Management and the staff were great!  The rooms were super clean.  The accommodations were great!  The restaurant on campus was totally delish - thank you Carmela, John and Arturo!  The daily infused water station was awesome with my Crown Plaza refillable cup - thanks again Courtney!!!!! My team traveled from Washington, D.C.  We stayed all week for business.  The accommodations at the Crown Plaza Costa Mesa, CA were incredible.  The place to stay when you are in town.  Special Thanks to Courtney, Javier and Also for taking great care of us while we were in town.  You all are so wonderful!  Thank you again and again.  You all are the BEST! Can't wait to come back.     Denita
Manager Response: Dear Denita,  We appreciate the very kind words regarding your stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are ecstatic that you enjoyed all the accommodations.  We look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great value, newly refurbished, good happy hour. Dog friendly.
Summary: We stayed here just for a night as we had business to tend to in OC. We brought our 90 lb mixed breed pup with us.  Stayed on the ground floor (as all persons with dogs are allotted these rooms) facing the street.  It was quiet even with traffic. Room was spacious, clean and quiet.  Just refurbished and they did a great job.  Only complaint was we couldn't get the ac/heater unit to shut off completely.  Good central location if you have business to conduct in the area.  Happy hour was really good.  $6 well drinks-good Gin and Tonic. $5 wine and $3 beers.  Appetizers were good bar food too.  Great for the price.  Chicken wings were good as was the avocado bruschetta. Our waitress was awesome.  All staff was super friendly. Definitely will stay here in the future when we are in
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed the value and happy hour at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Our happy hour is daily if you would like to pop in for a bite.  We look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Friendly staff and nice rooms! Close the the beach! Restaurant is a little pricey but very good! Nice bar service! Great restaurants nearby. Cozy pool area. great shopping nearby.  I would recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the kind words.  We hope that your travels bring you back to see us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Crowne Plaza was centrally located in Costa Mesa
Summary: I was working at South Coast Plaza and the Crowne Plaza was like a 5-10 minute walk across the bridge to the shopping center. It was also very close to the John Wayne airport (5 minutes drive) and there was a free shuttle bus. Anyway, check in was friendly and fast. I stayed 2 nights. I was not crazy to about my first room and asked to be changed. No problems - I was moved to a quieter room facing the back garden and pool. I did laundry at the hotel and enjoyed having plenty of local restaurants to choose from on Bristol St.
Manager Response: Dear st25w,  Thank you very much for the recent stay and vital feedback regarding the central location of our hotel.  I'm glad we were able to move you to a room you were comfortable with. Come back to see us soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel convenient location between airport and shopping mall
Summary: Nice hotel with very friendly staff . Outdoor pool is nice with jacuzi on the side. Restaurant serves good food. The hotel is due to get refurbishment which is needed as carpet is worn at some places.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the friendly staff and outdoor pool.  We hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is simple and straight forward. It provides all what a Traveller (mainly business) need, good location not far from South coast plaza, nice convinient room with the functionality needed and a nice restaurant on premisses.
Manager Response: Dear Markel52,  Thank you for the recent stay!  We are very happy to know the hotel was central to all your needs.  We hope to see you back again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Dated, but great service and a great night‚Äôs sleep.
Summary: I purchased two nights at this hotelwith rewards points. My wife and I chose it because of its proximity to South Coast Plaza. The hotel is definitely dated, 80‚Äôs decor at best, low ceilings, musty elevator, etc. However, the service was above and beyond. Chase, the front desk attendant upgraded us to a suite (I am an IHG platinum member). It was a HUGE two room, two bathroom suite. Again, the decor is quite dated, but everything is in very good shape. The high point was the bed, the best bed I have slept on in years! The bathrooms are new (except for the wallpaper) and the rain style shower is phenomenal, a definite plus. The buffet breakfast was also excellent, and very reasonably priced, especially for California, and the service personnel at the restaurant went above and
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed the recent stay at our property.  Thank you for the vital feedback regarding your time with us and we hope you can come and join us again after the remodel.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: What a nice hotel. All as in *ALL* the staff are very 'Genuinly Friendly' not just 'Touristy Friendly'. Rooms, and so on are beautiful. Just a big shout out to (I think) Arturo who works the breakfast buffet. Nice guy, friendly and deserves a hotel 'Employee Of The Month' type award. All the other staff are a very close second. Would not hesitate to stay here again, I had a superb 3 nights here on Nov 1,2 and 3 2018. Usual 'expensive' rooms and food/drink as it is close to an airport, but forget that as its all good value for money, including the free airport shuttle they offer
Manager Response: Dear Bob P.,  We are thankful that you joined us at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Very happy Arturo and the rest of the staff added to your 'super stay.'  Please come back to see us again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Staff friendly with nice rooms and great location to SNA airport
Summary: Great place to stay close to the airport with friendly staff and nice rooms! I would recommend this hotel for anyone that wants a great stay at an area that is close to a bunch of restaurants. Nice rooms for a fair price.
Manager Response: Dear Hugo B.,  We are very glad you enjoyed the friendly staff at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Please come back to visit again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Good Location Near John Wayne Airport
Summary: I only spent one night here as I needed a hotel the night before I flew out in the early morning.  The hotel is close to the airport and has a free airport shuttle. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff friendly.
Manager Response: Hello sail2fun,  We recognize your time is valuable and greatly appreciate your feedback. I am delighted to hear about your excellent stay at the hotel and appreciate your compliments regarding our comfortable and clean rooms. We are always very happy when a guests' provides feedback about the wonderful service they have received. As soon as I received your comments, I immediately forwarded them to the management and ownership of the hotel. They will ensure that the staff knows what a great job they have done and also ensure they are recognized for their efforts.  Please come back and create some more good memories with us.  Sincerely,  Krysllin G Case Manager IHGService

Summary: The room I stayed in I felt needed an update.  They need to change the carpet and just paint things.  Everything was painted with like patches showing and carpet was missing chunks everywhere and there were stains.  Carpet just looked like its been really beat up and didn't look clean I felt like i had to wear shoes. The fixtures were rusted in the bathroom and when you turned my shower on it would spray out from the side pole everywhere.  All the desk and lamps were really dated. Staff is great but I travel alot and this one did not meet my expectations from others reviews.
Manager Response: Dear Don N,  Thank you so much for the recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry to fall short of your expectations regarding the condition of your room.  We are currently in the process of making major renovations in the next few weeks.    We hope to have another opportunity to host you after the renovation.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa - a good option
Summary: I‚Äôve stayed here on business several times in the past few months. The rooms have been updated and the bathrooms are quite nice. This hotel is minutes form South Coast Plaza Mall and is a great option for people wishing to be close to it. The hotel does offer a complimentary shuttle to the Mall. But as a New Yorker I enjoy the few minute walk.  The service in the restaurant is consistently good and offers great value. The food is quite traditional - burgers, salads etc Having stayed at most of the hotels near here, for the price, this is a good option!
Manager Response: Dear KesterCB,  Thank you for making our hotel your option while in the city.  Glad to know you were able to take advantage of location and amenities.   Please come back to see us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: You have other options in the area!
Summary: If it was not for the restaurant good food and very nice service , i would probably have gone negative on this crown plaza. It is in need of a serious renovation and some of the room show sign of wear and tear. Avoid rooms with 16 number in it, elevator is very noisy ( so is the air conditioning ) unless you have a killer deal in the rate, the Hilton next door is much better. This is mainly for business travelers ... one night per year holiday vacationer will probably not see anything since they have nothing to compare to.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the recent visit and vital feedback regarding our property.  We are very sorry that we did not meet your expectations in regards to the condition and elevator.   Please know we will be making a major renovation towards the end of the year and we hope to welcome you back when that has been completed.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Above and Beyond Service from check in to check out
Summary: From the moment we walked in through the doors of the hotel we were greeted right away by the front desk staff.  I would like to particularly write praises about Javier.  He was so accommodating from the moment I checked in and really listened and have gone way above and beyond my expectations.  I have stayed at numerous hotels in the past and I have to say that my experience with this Crowne Plaza has been by far THE BEST!!  From Javier to the restaurant staff and all the way to housekeeping.  Thank you for making my stay there unforgettable and will definitely spread the word.  Simply AMAZING customer service!
Manager Response: We are so thankful for the recent stay here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Javier has been part of the Crowne Plaza family for many years and we are so happy he was able to welcome you to our home.    Please come back and see us again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great location. Large heated pool and spa. Outstanding customer service from front desk to house keeping. Issue at check in. Pictures on Expedia booking room did not match hotel check in room. Javier at front desk corrected it and we enjoyed our 5 day stay. Only negative is that a refrigerator must be requested at room booking. This should be a standard item. Hotel staff advised rooms will be remodeled before end of this year. Over all great location, amenities, and price. Will return.
Manager Response: Dear Vacation,  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Happy to know the central location was a plus along with the amenities.    Hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Very clean and nice looking hotel. Friendly associates
Summary: Very clean and nice looking hotel. Friendly associates. Stayed on 5th floor. Room was very nice and above average.  Forgot about check out times but no problem. They were very friendly and accommodating. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph H.,  We are so happy you chose to stay here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Happy to know you encountered a friendly associates and a nice room on the 5th floor.   Look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel, Clean and a staff that treats you more like a friend then as a guest. I like that.   They really take interest in you. But i think that is normal for Crown Plaza hotels  The room is big and clean The restaurant serves good meals and a good breakfast  There are also some very good asian restaurants nearby   Next time i come back here
Manager Response: Dear Frank K.,  Thank you for being a friend of the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad you were welcomed as a friend during your arrival and you found the room to your liking.   Our hotel is central to some great restaurants including Anqi and Din Tai Fung.  Look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Staff fantastic, room clean & quiet & generous size . No fridge is disappointing. Handy to south coast plaza & right off the 405. Courtesy car to anywhere in a 2 ?? Mile radius convenient to get around
Manager Response: Dear Kawa47,  Thank you so much for the recent stay here at the Crowne Plaza, Costa Mesa.  Very happy to know you enjoyed the fantastic staff, clean room and central location.   Please come back and see us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Room #337. Over the last couple of weeks I've done a lot of traveling both business and personal. This was a business trip and as a business traveler I'm looking for a number of hotel features to make my trip as efficient and enjoyable as possible.  _Staff_  Staff at this hotel is impressive. Reception was great. Seeing reception deal with a few challenging guests before my check-in, not loosing patience, remain calm, polite and friendly was great to see. I forgot some personal items like a razor and they helped me with no fuss, no drama at no cost. Super!  _Internet Access_  Hotel provides free, fast, reliable wireless internet access. Being able to comfortably work on presentations and preparing meetings while out of office is very underrated.  _Quiet Room_  This hotel is
Manager Response: Dear hanssep,  We appreciate your recent visit and thorough feedback provided regard your entire stay.  We are grateful to hear of the pleasant stay you had due to the staff, however sorry to not meet your expectations regarding the condition.   Please know we are going to be doing a major renovation on the rooms towards the end of the year.  We hope you can come back to visit us again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We love this hotel for many reasons. The front desk staff is very friendly and helpful. The housekeeping ladies are wonderful, fulfilled all my wishes for extra blankets, pillows, towels, etc. as we stayed with our 2 babies, so needed some extra supplies.  We stayed at the hotel many times this summer, and the main reason for returning here was Arturo working at the awesome buffet breakfast, who helped us so much in every way possible. He always made sure our 2 babies and us got everything we needed and more - attention, help, hot water, and a lot of apple juice!! :) helped us carrying our plates to our table, always made sure our coffee cups were full of fresh coffee. Always had some good words for all four of us! He is the best waiter we‚Äôve met in years, and that‚Äôs a big
Manager Response: Hello Dora M.,  Thank you so much for the recent stay here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad to here Arturo was awesome for your breakfast experience along with our Crowne's Meeting Director Keith.   We look forward to having you back again when your in the area.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: All of the employees are super friendly and wonderful people. Arturo in the restaurant and Ana are so kind and warm. My mom has been staying at this hotel for six years and she always books a room here solely for the kindness of the employees. They all know her name and are always asking how she‚Äôs been.  The rooms need some TLC‚Äîa little updating, new lampshades, new carpets, the bathrooms in the rooms need some love too. But even with those issues, my mom will always get a room here when she comes to visit.  Also, the breakfast buffet is on-point. My mom goes for the incredible employees and the breakfast buffet. It‚Äôs also within walking distance of south coast mall, which my mom loves as well.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Banks,  We are so grateful for the your continued loyalty to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are so happy to have you and your mom here and making this your home away from home.   We will be making some major updates to our rooms towards the end of the year, so please stay tuned.  As always please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is actually my first time ever giving a review, sometimes I just say Ehh, but tonight I was so please with my experience I want to make sure these people are recognized. The customer service in this hotel alone is incredible. EVERYONE has been very Tentative and extremely kind, always smiling! I believe Joseph is his name at the front desk who I delt with by phone first and then in the lobby, he is AWESOME. He put a smile on my face because I can tell he really cares about his job and me as a customer. There was a mix up with a room when I requested and early check in, He accommodated and apologized sincerely.  I just had the BEST experience with Carmela our waitress at the Tavern. She is HANDS DOWN the BEST server I have ever had to wait on me. She herself, her presence
Manager Response: Dear Arielle E.,  We are delighted you were able to join us here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Joseph is new to our team and is proving to be a great addition as he enjoys taking care of our guests.  Carmela has been a part of our team for a few years and is always putting our guest experience above everything.    Please come back for another bite to eat and chances are Carmella will remember who you are and will be excited to see you again.  We look forward to your next visit and I also hope to meet you as well.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Services Manager

Summary: Been here 20 minutes, so far hasn't been the greatest. Front desk was very nice but another associate was having some trouble with his broken English communicating with a lady. 90 degrees out and the AC was off when we got into the room, it was up to 83 inside.  No refrigerator in the room and no ice machine on the floor.  Room is pretty small and furniture is a kinda run down.  Hopefully things improve, here for 2 nights and will update!
Manager Response: Dear Eric D.,  We appreciate your vital feedback regarding your current stay.  Thank you for noticing our diverse staff.  I am sorry your arrival was a bit warm in the room.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do to assist you during your visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is centrally located to everything in Orange County.  The hotel was very clean and laid out beautifully.  Everyone that worked there was very friendly and helpful. We had a very nice, spacious room with a king bed, overlooking the pool and jacuzzi.  The amenities in the room were wonderful.  The only thing it was missing was a refrigerator.  I have insomnia.  If I sleep two hours a night it is a miracle.  They had this relaxing spray that I sprayed on the pillow and I slept six to seven hours.  I brought it home and also ordered it from the company.  I'm still sleeping all night. My only two complaints was One:  restaurant/bar,  Everything we ordered was very spicy.  We asked for a milder sauce and they said that was all they had.  So we ate elsewhere the other
Manager Response: Dear Solem8s,  Glad you were able to visit us here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  It is our main job to make sure that you sleep comfortably and we glad to know you continue to do so after your departure. We will definitely forward your feedback to the restaurant and the parking rate does come separate as many of our guests fly into the area.   Please come back for another good nights sleep soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had a small, very short-notice emergency that we had to attend to in the area. We made this booking via TripAdvisor the morning of our check-in without issue and for a good price.  We checked in around 7:00p. The gentleman at the front desk, Ryan, was really nice. He was busy with a phone call when we first walked up, but he was very pleasant and patient with what sounded like a difficult guest.  We were checked in quickly and headed up to the room.  We had a single King room on the 3rd floor. It was very clean and you could tell the whole hotel has been pretty recently renovated. The hallways were clean and well-lit, the room was extremely cozy, and the mattress was brand new. It was such a comfy night of sleep on that bed.  The rain shower head was probably my favorite part
Manager Response: Dear Jared M.  We are so happy you were able to stay with us here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  The detailed background of your stay was very greatly appreciated and useful to know.   Ryan is a great asset and we are happy that he assisted you.  The shower head and beds are usually a hit with most of our guests, glad they were thoroughly enjoyed.  We look forward to your next visit and please try the breakfast.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Staff was helpful and friendly, the shuttle service was incredible! Available on demand, it was such a blessing. Super close to South Coast Plaza. Breakfast was not mind blowing but actually more than enough. I just checked into another hotel where I expected a little more than the Crowne Plaza and feel myself comparing... the pillows and beds and towels and rainfall shower at Crowne Plaza will be dearly missed this week!  I didn‚Äôt sleep well the first night at Crowne Plaza (light sleeper, jet lagged) and I was moved to a quiet room without any problem. The place is a little old but apparently renovations will be done later this year so I‚Äôll definitely be back in the new year!
Manager Response: I too love our brand new beds and pillows on top of our Crowne Plaza exclusive Sleep Advantage Kit to ensure we optimize your chance for a peaceful night of sleep. Renovations will begin later this year and we look forward to welcoming you again soon. Thanks again for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa, it was our absolute pleasure to host you.

Summary: I am giving this hotel a 5 mainly to counter the bad reviews.  I stayed here 1 night prior to seeing Hamilton (that cost 3 times the hotel stay). The location is great. The room was a nice size with a very comfortable bed and was very quiet. The employees were helpful and friendly. As others have noted a small frig would have been nice. Definitely not a "luxury" hotel but for the price, service and location it is very good.
Manager Response: Dear Morris K.,  We are so grateful for the recent stay and kind comments regarding staff and accommodations.  Glad to hear you were able to take advantage of the complimentary shuttle and hopefully you enjoyed the show as well.   Please come back and see us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We love the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa! Our events here are always a success because the service is fast, efficient and friendly. Oscar, our banquet Captain and his team take great care of us. We look forward to coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Joyce370,  Thank you for the recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are grateful for the kind comments regarding the service and specific team members.  Please come back and see us again soon.  Warm regards,   Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A hotel experience from the way hotels were were in the Good Old Days
Summary: This is a hotel in the middle of the modern hustle/bustle of the world the way it is today. But right there in the middle of the world is this hotel that's driven by old fashioned values. No garish frills that call attention to themselves. Just the quiet basics. But high quality basics. Everything works. Everything contributes to comfort and yes, serenity. What a pleasant experience this was.
Manager Response: Dear Primo54,  We are very thankful for the recent stay here at our property.  It brings us joy to hear that you enjoyed the good old basic values and your overall visit.  We do hope to see you again in the future.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Not up to standard expected from Crowne Plaza
Summary: I stayed there for 3 nights in Mar 2018. The property is not up to the Crowne Plaza standards.  1. Carpet is worn and even ripped in sone places. 2. Shower head was broken in my room. 3. Room had a massive Air conditioner and awefully noisy especially at night. It is so noisy that I thought, there was a truck parked outside my window. I kept it turned off thankfully it was still pleasant and not too hot.  I can only say good things about hotel Staff here. Super friendly and courteous. Breakfast buffet was good too. We only had nibbles with drinks for dinner and salads. Overall, i would not want to stay here again.
Manager Response: We are very grateful of the recent visit and vital information regarding your stay.  It saddens us to hear your expectations were not met due to the condition and noise of room.  Please know we will be making major upgrades towards the end of the year, which will include the carpet.  We hope you can come back and visit when this has been completed.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I wrote a review including photos in November 2016 and got the following response from Guest Relations.  To date, the carpet has STILL NOT BEEN REPLACED and looks horrible.  It makes the rooms feel dirty and it's completely unacceptable that the owners of this hotel don't address this issue.  One year and a half to replace carpet?  No excuses.  The staff are SUPER friendly and the food in the bar is good.  You could easily be a 4-5 start rating if you'd just fix this carpet.  Ownership clearly doesn't care!  Thank you so much for your recent visit. We appreciate the kind words regarding our staff members. We do apologized we fell short of your expectations when it came to our carpet in your room. Our hotel is currently in the process of updating the carpet in certain areas as
Manager Response: Dear Robert D.,  Again we are thankful for the recent stay and vital feedback regarding the carpet.  I am so sorry this has still been a challenge you have faced with us.  I assure you the management team and ownership are aware of your comments and take it very seriously.    We also appreciate your continued patronage during this process.  Please let me know before your next visit as I would like to personally meet you.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel staff, food and room were excellent. Bell Captain Greg Sandusky went out of his way to make our evening enjoyable. Location is ideal for theatre, shopping and dining. Will return for future performances.
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Thank you for the kind remarks regarding Greg, he has been loyal employee of the hotel for many years.   Look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: NOT UP TO CROWNE PLAZE INTERNATIONAL STANDARDS- SAD CONDITION
Summary: Sorry, this place is not even close to what a crowne plaza is about. rooms are small, windows a/c ,thought they don't make them anymore. stained carpets, small rooms, beds are comfy, but thats it. amenities? plastic cups in bathroom, really? did not even re-fill the shapoons after first nights use. housekeeper fine, but hotel is sorely lacking and will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Srimanone,  Thank you very much for the recent visit to our property.  We are very sorry we fell short of your expectations when it came to the carpet and amenities.  We are currently in the process of replacing some of our carpet and upgrading the rooms by the end of the year.    We hope you will give us another opportunity in the future once the upgrades have been completed.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed two nights. Room was comfortable; it had a good desk, solid bed, clean sheets, nice bathroom. Service was fine, too. The front door is too close to the bathroom door so the bathroom door had a closer that made the bathroom extra steamy. A/C worked well.
Manager Response: Dear Leonard O,  Thank you so much for your recent stay with us.  So glad to hear the room was comfortable and service fine too.  We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Such a pleasant front end staff!!! Check in was great and the conversations we had were always good. Some of the nicest people I have ever met!!  My room was upgraded to a suite, and they were helpful with local recommendations of where to eat, drink, etc. I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for visiting the the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy that you encountered nice people and were upgraded as well. We look forward to your return.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I believe this hotel need urgenty renovations, you can tell by the old furniture,carpet it is so old and stained looks very dirty, bathrooms are small and old, however restaurant even food is not  good service is good and staff are very friendly
Manager Response: Dear Lorena C,  We are very happy that you came to stay with us.  However sorry to hear we fell short of your expectations during your stay.  Please know we are in the process of doing a major remodel to our rooms, which will include the carpet and furniture in the next few months.    We hope you will give us another opportunity after that has been completed.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is constructive feedback about room 233.   The shower did not drain. Super annoying. Not sure why hotels dot not make the verification of the drainage of the showers a regular activity. Showers that do not drain is super annoying  The ironing board had some paint stains on it. I had to use a towel on top so that I could iron my clothes without getting them dirty.   The battery on the thermostat controller or dad. A tech had to come to  get it fixed  Other than that, everything was good hence 4 stars.
Manager Response: We are very thankful for the recent stay and the constructive feedback given.  The feedback is taken as a gift so that we may use for the future.  Glad everything else was good with your stay. Look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Close to 405 Freeway and south Coast Plaza (walking distance). Free onsite parking, Great happy hour in Bar with specialty draft beers. Hamburger, Tacos and more. Nice outdoor pool area to relax. Management info rooms will be upgraded shortly. Recommended if the price is right. MeuterMedia
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent stay and vital feedback.  We are very happy you found the hotel central to your needs and enjoyed the happy hour. Please come back visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: For a crown plaza, the rooms are out dated and worn.  My colleague had water dripping from the ceiling, had to change rooms at midnight.  The staff is great.  Location is great.  Was told rooms on higher floors might be newer.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recent stay.  We are very sorry for the challenging experience regarding the ceiling, which has since been repaired.  Please know the hotel rooms are going to be undergoing a renovation starting in one month which will be completed by the end of the year.    We hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Average at best, if you can't see very well
Summary: I am perplexed at the good reviews this place received.  We arrived late in the evening and it took forever to check in with only one party ahead of us.  There were two ladies at the desk but only one checking them in.  The one not checking them in, Kim, was doing something else and appeared grumpy so it was probably a good thing. Prior to arriving we called the hotel and requested a frig for our room for medication. They assured me it would be there.  Oh surprise! It wasn't there. I called down and spoke with, guess who? Kim. I explained the situation and although it sounded like I was bothering her she said she would send one up.  We waited and waited. Finally my husband called down and got Kim again. He had to pressure her and pinpoint exactly when this frig would come
Manager Response: Dear BBGraber,  We thank you for the recent stay here at our property.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenging experience you faced for the entire stay.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be used as a training tool moving forward.   Please contact me with any other question and/or concerns.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The family and I stayed at this fine property during the Holiday to visit family.  I am Gold Elite status with IHG.  This property is a well seasoned, quality property with nice accommodations and has been updated.  Though all the staff greet you with a smile and well wishes, I would like to give a special shout out to the Front Desk Team.  Aldo and Jessica made us feel welcome and went beyond to make our stay very comfortable.  Happy Holidays to you all at CPCM!!
Manager Response: Dear 12Eric2017,  We thank you for your recent visit to our property.  We do our best to take care of all of our IHG Elite Members and it was our pleasure to assist you on your stay.  Please come back and stay again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Bedding had several black stains and several large holes. Found eyelash on pillowcase. Curtains were dirty with large finger print food stains. Impossible to turn wall ac/heat off. Could set the temperature but fan wouldn‚Äôt turn off, so it cycled low/high and woke me all night long. Heard music from party till after 11 even though I was told I had a quiet room.  Nice furnishings and bathroom. Newer bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We are disappointed to hear that we fell very short of your needs regarding the stains and temperature of room.  Please know we have since remedied the issues and hope to have you back again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed one night as i had a mid morning flight out of John Wayne.   Really nice room with a very comfy bed.   Large bathroom as well. Only thing I wish it had was a little refrigerator and a way too make hot water as while a Keurig machine is nice for coffee it doesn't do any good for making tea.
Manager Response: Dear Chrisnpg,  Thank you for the recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  So glad you enjoyed the central location and comfy bed.  Appreciate the comments regarding the hot water and hope we can see you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I've actually stayed at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa several times in the last three years -- almost always on a business trip. My last stay was four nights as I had to attend a local trade show.   I just love the location.  Right by the freeway, blocks from South Coast Plaza, and just a short drive (maybe 4 miles at the most) to the Orange County Fairgrounds!  It is also very close to the John Wayne Airport, which is important for me as I usually fly into Costa Mesa.   Rooms have always been comfortable, even when we had a need for a pet-friendly room.  Staff is always most helpful and the service has always been excellent.  The restaurant staff here is exceptional.  They bend over backwards to give you the best service possible. This is important to me as clients have been
Manager Response: Dear Amelia P.,  We are so excited you have decided to make Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa your home over the past several years.  Glad to know you have enjoyed the central location, exceptional service and comfort.    We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed a few days in the area, it‚Äôs not nicely situated between Orange County and the city, easy access to the highways. Staff is very friendly, rooms comfortable. The breakfast buffet is excellent and Guillermina and Francisco take real good care, thank you guys! Will definitely visit again when in the area
Manager Response: Dear Bruno570,  Thank you for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza, Costa Mesa.  Happy to know you enjoyed the central location and comfortable rooms.   Please come back and see us again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best reunion location ever! Great hotel accommodations, great staff, great service!
Summary: I was the chairman of my high school class's 50th reunion held in late October, 2017. We had about 100 people attend. I visited this "boutique" sized hotel (as compared to an enormous Hilton, etc.) about 18 months prior, and met with Keith Allen, the Meetings Director for the hotel. From that time until the reunion, Keith was extremely responsive and helpful in every way. As the time became nearer, and reservations were being made by classmates, if there was a problem, I would call him and he fixed any reservations that needed fixing, took care of special requests from classmates, and was attentive to the ways in which I wanted the reunion to run. We worked on the menu, style of meal service, decor, table setup, the whole works. When the day came, it went as smooth as glass!
Manager Response: Dear Anne B.  We are so very grateful for the kind comments and recent stay.  The feedback is taken as a gift and will provided to our management team.   We look forward to your next visit with us.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: I visited for one night the weekend of October 21-22, 2017. I was attending a conference at the Hilton across the street
Summary: The room was very comfortable. The king-size bed was amazing. We were upgraded to a suite as I requested 2 queens due to sharing with a friend. Breakfast was great and the staff were courteous and helpful. I was attending a conference across the street at the Hilton, and it was a quick walk there. Overall, it was a comfortable stay. The room was quiet although the hotel was completely booked out for the night.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  Glad to know the breakfast and staff were great.   Please come back and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here last weekend when we were in town to celebrate a birthday at South Coast Plaza. We booked a king size room and check in was straight forward- I believe a trainee checked us in and she was great. Parking is $14/day with options in an outside lot or garage.
