As soon as I walked into the room I can see a big brown-ish stain and some lipstick on the curtains... I could not tell you what was on there so we went back up to the front and spoke to Alex to see if we can switch into another room. He seems kind of annoyed which bummed me out but was able to put us in a different room which I appreciated. We might have caught him on a bad day but the vibe was not great.  The room didn't have stains which was nice but not as clean as it could be. We found hairs in the NEW
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent visit and vital feedback provided.  The feedback given is greatly appreciated and is taken as a gift.  We do apologize for the initial experience with the stain and service.  Since your visit this has been rectified for future visits.   We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is our third event this year and we're looking forward to coming back again.  The amenities, food and care they always provide are excellent. Oscar and his team are fast, efficient, and friendly . They're attention to our needs is now seamless.This is our go-to for our Orange County events!
Manager Response: Dear Joyce370,  We are thrilled you were able to join us for another year hear at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad to know Oscar and his team were fast and efficient.    We look forward to see you again next year.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I was looking for a nice place that was also pet friendly.  We have a beautifully behaved small Corgi.  Sometimes the places that take dogs are not very good, and we wanted comfortable chairs, flat screen TV, etc.  Ths is a very unfriendly place for dogs.  Hattie is not welcome at outdoor seating anywhere.  Moreover, the TV, while very nice, has very few channels. WE can not even watch the American League playoffs. There is no place in the hotel or near to get espresso. The coffee maker did not work.  WE could not find major news papers.  There were no creams or shower caps.  The cost was more than many other places like the Aires.  We are paying $35 a night for Hattie to sit in the room,but only while we are here,  We must take her when we go out,  So disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear Helen M,  We thank you very much for the recent visit and are happy you were able to bring your Corgi.  Very sorry to hear the hotel did not meet your expectations when it came to your dog.  We wish you well on all of your travels.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is a good place to say if you need a hotel in orange county near south coast plaza mall and the John Wayne airport .  The hotel is good luxury hotel and consistent with the Crowne plaza hotel brand.  The customer service at the hotel is great and the bar is good place to get drink and food .  The hotel located by lots of near restaurants and shops if you are looking for activities.
Manager Response: Dear T0kra,  Thank you kindly for your stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are happy to hear that the restaurant and location was to your satisfactory.  Please come back and visit again soon!  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE
Summary: Really nice play to stay!  The value is incredible for the price too.  The restaurant is convenient, delicious, and even has a great happy hour. The rooms are spacious, with comfortable beds, and upscale amenities. The pool/spa outside area is a peaceful way to unwind after a day of meetings. Most of all the customer service was incredible. The staff I interacted with primarily: Danny, Anna, and Aldo (front desk), Eduardo (bar/restaurant), and the housekeepers who kept the room stocked and clean, were awesome. All were not only efficient at their jobs, but they were authentic in their desire to provide great service.  They made me feel like a valued guest and it made an ordinary hotel stay a fantastic one. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Angelahbailey,  Thank you for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Your kind words regarding the accommodations and staff are most appreciated.  We would love to see you back again soon!  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We are staying for five days and the front desk Concierge Danny was extremely helpful and accomadating when  I was not feeling well the first night and he had hot tea, honey and lemon sent to my room. It was very soothing. The next evening he remembered me and asked how I was feeling and if I needed anything else. It was nice to feel taken care of during our stay. Thank you Danny.
Manager Response: Dear Daddesigns,  Thank you for your recent visit to our property.  Glad to hear Danny our Guest Services agent was able to assist you, when you were feeling ill.  Our priority is our guests and I hope we can host you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: It was beautiful, the suite I stayed in was gorgeous and spacious almost like a small apartment. Two bathrooms 3 televisions I thought it was awesome, I booked it to be close to the airport before we traveled and I would stay again, the staff was great, I wish I had known how nice it was I would stay again and just lounge...
Manager Response: Dear Gracie V.,  We are grateful for your recent visit and vital feedback provided.   Glad to know we were able to give you the upgrade to the spacious room.    We hope you will come and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have booked in this hotel for 2 days from I just enter this hotel i felt comfortable and the front desk stuff and precisely Alex was helpful and very respectful with me. Good job and keep on. I appreciate all of your help.
Manager Response: Dear Mais A,  Thank you for the recent stay at Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad Alex and the rest of the hotel met all your needs.    Please come back for a future visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The management of this hotel is the most insensitive of any I have ever run into!  It was our wedding day and we needed an early check-in to be able to dress on time for the wedding.  Despite us phoning several days in advance, we were told early check-ins were not possible under any circumstances.We would have cancelled at that point however, felt unable to do so as we had prepaid in full in advance and would loose the whole amount.  We did get to the hotel early and after pleading, were allowed to check-in at 2:45 P.M.  The room was exceptionally noisy and we could hear people next door arguing and someone was pounding on the door at 4:00 A.M.  People walking down the hall could also be heard inside the room.  After not getting much sleep, there was no hot water for bathing in
Manager Response: Dear SoCalGal1125,  Thank you for your recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry for a challenging visit regarding loud arguing and issues with the water.  We have since remedied those issues and I am glad we were able to honor an early check in for your stay.  We wish you well on your future travels and if they bring you back to Orange  County, we would be happy to host you once again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: HIgh School Reunion event location: Good, but there were issues
Summary: Up front the management was wonderfully accommodating.  They gave us the feeling they really knew what they were doing. When it was all said and done, something like 85% of what we expected came through, which is probably Great!.  However, that other 15%, unfortunately, leaves a bit of a sour taste in the mouth.   Specifically, the reception space was way too small for the number of people (160) we had to handle. The mechanics of people flow and where there ended up did not work well.  We would not have had the experience the hotel management has had, so it was not so much that we didn't plan well, as it was the management didn't let us know how our flow would end up. Additionally, space that we thought we would have for the reception turned out not to be available, though it
Manager Response: We thank you for your recent stay and important feedback.  We do apologize the event held here at the hotel did not meet your expectations.  The information provided is treated as a gift and will be used to help guide future events.  We hope to host you on a later date once again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent. Keeps me returning. Recognition IHG Spire Am.
Summary: Excellent value. I keep coming back as the rooms are spotless, the new beds are very comfortable. In fact, my nieces came down from LA to see me and they commented on the great bed and restful sleep. I appreciate the little touches such as the rest well aromatherapy kit.   Just as important - great customer service. John and Ana were warm, friendly, professional and welcoming at check-in. (I had to extend my stay a few times due to family emergency and both John and Ana were kind.) Check out with Aldo, hotel manager, was also warm, professional and efficient.   Bartender and housekeeping were great also.   Convenient location, modern facilities, great restaurants in house and in the immediate area, spotless rooms with excellent amenities, comfy beds. Also brand new
Manager Response: Dear ThuanMTran9,  Thank you so much for the recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Your kind words and vital feedback are greatly appreciated.  We strive to make each stay for all of our guests memorable, especially those from our most loyal Spire Elite members.     I am very happy to hear that John and Ana were friendly and the hotel was central to your needs.  We truly hope to host you again on any stays in Orange County.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here over the weekend hooked it on Priceline said it was a 3.5 star place was decent enough very renovated beds were really nice and soft and pillows nice little place used to be a Holiday Inn but it was good which state is the Hacienda Travelodge in Newport the night before would never do that again that was bad
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are very glad you enjoyed the bed and soft pillows.  We hope to host you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is part of the Holiday Inn-IHG rewards program. Checked in showed my IHG card and asked if any upgrades were available. My party of 4 were given 3 free happy hour drinks in the lounge. NICE PERKüòÉ it is located right off the freeway and is close to all the shopping malls. Has optional breakfasts. But I could go to the McDonald's right next door if I wanted. Rooms are nice, very clean, and have very comfortable beds.  The only thing I found inconvenient was the ice mavhinevon my floor was empty.  Also ask to stay on the side away from the freeway,for a quieter night.
Manager Response: Dear Linda S.,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We appreciate your loyalty to the IHG Rewards program and are happy that you enjoyed the comfortable beds.   We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This used to be my go to place in Costa Mesa. Not anymore. I was subjected to verbal violence during my breakfast. Apparently, two coworkers are at serious odds at each other. To annoy each other, none of them would give me a spoon.   Seriously a spoon!!!  The male server, Jose, yelled at me and made several angry facial expressions to me along with Hand gestures.  SERIOUSLY??????  I tried to find Courtney the new manager to tell her the situation. Had no luck.  Oh and to top my stay at the hotel, I found a hair on the shower apparatus.  After, my complaint....it was immediately cleaned.   It is such a damnnnn shame.  This was an affordable place with perfect service.  Now on, forget it!!!  You lost a very loyal customer.
Manager Response: Dear Ontheroadagain3400,  Thank you very much for your recent visit and vital feedback given.  We are extremely disappointed and sorry you were to exposed to these employees.  Since your visit we have addressed the issue and assure you this will not happen in the future.  We hope to have another opportunity to host you.  Please let me know if you have any questions or would like to book a future stay.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager 7145573000

Summary Heading: Good hotel with good service and good prices
Summary: All in all this is a solid 4 star property.  They respect thr IHG Spire status ans give suite upgrades and the restaurant in the lobby is good.  Service is also good.  If your looking for a good solid 4 star in Irvine area this is a very good choice as their rates are very reasonable most of the time.
Manager Response: Dear Michael K,  We appreciate your recent stay and vital feedback given.  Thank you for your loyalty as being a Spire Elite member.  Please stop by when your back in the area.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Strategically Located close to airport, shopping and more
Summary: This is a classy hotel with great service and great rooms. The staff is very friendly and the rooms a nice and comfortable. It has shuttle service to John Wayne Orange County Airport and next to South Coast Plaza. If you want to stay in Orange County this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Luis M.,  Thank you for stopping by at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are happy the hotel was strategically placed to meet your needs.  We hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Quick Stay - it was good but needs updates
Summary: My family and I recently stayed one night in the Crowne Plaza. The common areas were nice but there was one common theme throughout the hotel...they needed new carpet. The rooms were pretty nice with new beds but the details were lacking such as escutcheons hanging off of most pipes, gaps in the wiremold, missing an iron, etc. The staff was excellent and all very helpful. I would stay there again but they just needed a few updates.
Manager Response: Dear Justin K.,  Thank you for your recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are happy you enjoyed the stay and are very aware of the items which you mentioned.  The hotel should have the carpet updated by the end of the year.   We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great for business or family visit...
Summary: This hotel has one the best value for its location, it's close to Irvine, one of the biggest cities in Orange County, close to the airport and of course the beautiful South coast plaza mall. The management is great and to me that is one of the great points of this hotel. Great corporate style hotel but families can enjoy it as well. Wi fi, decent gym, outdoor pool  Close to the Orange County airport!
Manager Response: Dear Expert101,  Thank you for visiting the Crowne Plaza, Costa Mesa.  We are so happy you enjoyed the central location and amenities.   Please come back and visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Wow!  What a nightmare on top of a really stressful period for me.  I made an online reservation in my husband‚Äôs name for two people.  My husband was in a business meeting in Los Angeles and I arrived to the hotel to check-in.   The woman/witch that I encountered, would not allow me to check in because the reservation was in my husband‚Äôs name.  This is absurd.  It may be a hotel policy that a lot of hotels follow, but I have never had one refuse to allow one spouse or the other to check in (regardless of whether only one spouse‚Äôs name is on the reservation).  I rarely put both names on a reservation and we travel a lot.  I showed my driver‚Äôs license (same last name as my husband) as well as my credit card, same first 10 digits as the one used to book the reservation and she
Manager Response: Dear Alsw2017,  We thank you for your recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are extremely sorry for the terrible stay.  We have since taken this feedback as a training opportunity for our staff on how to better explain our policies and problem handling.    We wish you well on your travels and should they bring you back to this area we would be happy to host you once again.  Please reach out to me with any other questions/concerns at 714 557 3000.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My room was really nice, a big comfy bed with one of the best pillows I've tried. The A/C air direction wasn't directly to the bed (which is perfect for me). The facilities are really nice, the pool area was really clean and the gym a little small but perfect to work out if you're on a job trip like mine. The breakfast was everyday the same but there's no need to change that menu, was delicious.  The restaurant for dinner have like 10 types of dishes, the meatball pasta was great!
Manager Response: Dear Alessandro Piccinini,  We appreciate your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad you enjoyed the new pillows, bed and recently remodeled gym.   We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights with hubby as it was near a business meeting we had to attend nearby.  The hotel staff are welcoming and friendly.  The hotel itself is clean and well located to nearby restaurants and South Coast Plaza.  The king room we stayed in was clean, spacious and overlooked the pool. The bed was incredibly comfortable.    Overall a terrific hotel for a great price.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Brigitte B,  Thank you very much for your recent visit and kind words.  Glad to know staff was friendly and you enjoyed the accommodations.    We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova  Guest Service Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for one night because we had concert tickets at the Pacific Amphitheater at the OC fairgrounds. If you have plans to attend the fair or want to be close to south coast plaza for some shopping this location is great. Walking distance to the shopping center and the fairgrounds are a quick 5min uber ride away. Hotel staff are very friendly, room was clean and comfortable! There are many highly rated TripAdvisor restaurants within walking distance, we enjoyed lunch at seasons52 and breakfast at Rooster Cafe...We had a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Carolabennett,  Thank you so much for your recent visit and king words.  Glad to know the staff were friendly and we were central to all your needs.  We look forward to your next trip to Orange County.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Easy Breezy Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa!
Summary: We were so happy staying at this hotel. At first we thought they just rip the customers off with the parking and not having a refrigerator in the room but overtime we noticed that it's not that bad. They told us the refrigerator is sold out. I don't know what it means by that because I never bought a refrigerator at any hotels. But Dini or Dina? (one of the female employees at the front desk) told me she would make a request for a refrigerator and then later I told her don't worry about it. The room is huge, ours is facing the jacuzzi. The bathroom is very spacious as well. There's no bathtub but the shower room is 10x better. The waterfall shower (huge head shower from above) is something I say to use everyday especially in a summer time you may want to shower with this twice!
Manager Response: Dear NoraFrydman,  It was a pleasure hosting you recently at the Crowne Plaza, Costa Mesa.  I am very happy I had the opportunity of personally speaking with both of you.  Glad to hear you enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer including the pool and buffet.  We hope you come back and visit when your in California.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: BEST MOTEL WE'VE EVER STAYED AT
Summary: Easy, fast, friendly check-in. Easy access to elevators. Then the room.....the bed was dreamy! New beds with the best sheets and pillows. The bathroom has a sliding door to enter and another off to the side to close for using the toilet. Then there's the roomy shower with with rainforest shower head. Always the same water pressure and you can set your your own temperature! Soft towels. The bathroom can fit two people in front of the mirror easily. They have quiet hours and we never heard a thing after 10:00. The maids do not come and knock on your door to ask if they can clean. You just turn the sign on the outside of your door. The pool was nice. They also have a good size hot tub. We ordered pool side food and it was good also. We did not eat or drink in the restaurant, but it
Manager Response: Dear Holly D,  Thank you for joining us recently at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  It brings us great joy to know you enjoyed the dreamy bed and rain fall shower head.    If you find yourself back in Orange County, please stop by for another visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights in June while visiting family in Stanton (15 min drive). We flew into LAX (1/2 of our vacation was spent in Beverly Hills) from JFK and landed around 10:00 pm so there was no traffic on the 405 on the way down to Costa Mesa. It was about a 45 min drive. Check in was quick and very friendly. We had a king room on the 3rd floor right next to the elevator but we never heard any noise from it. After settling in, Hubby walked next door to McDonalds and grabbed some late night fries. The bed was AMAZING! The mattress was super comfortable, the pillows were just right and the quality of the bedding was heavenly! Later in the week we checked into a fancy shmancy hotel in Beverly Hills and that bed wasn't even close to being as wonderful as the
Manager Response: Dear MrsAlh31,  We are so happy to have hosted you recently here at our property.  Glad to know you enjoyed our new mattresses and central location.    Please come back and stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel itself is great!!!  I love the pool and my boyfriend enjoyed the work out room.  What made this trip even more special are the staff.  I want to personally thank Ellen and Javier for their time and energy and helping us resolve the issue.  They were so kind and thoughtful and it has made our trip even better!!!!  The service at the Crown Plaza is A++++++++.  That is why we keep returning time and time again when we drive in from Arizona.  Thank you again Ellen and Javier!!!!!!!!!!  <3
Manager Response: Dear hsf0607,  We thank you for the visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa and the vital feedback left.  Glad to know Javier and other staff members made your stay memorable.    We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is located near a mall/restaurants and shops. great location. I stayed here for a conference. Nice and quiet hotel with a cute outside/pool area. The room was nice, but I would have preferred a fridge in the room. The staff was nice. They also have a shuttle service within 5 miles from the hotel. The mall in less then 5 minutes away and have great stores and restaurants there.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle S,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed the pool area and central location.    Please come back and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: All IHG Facilities Should Be Like This One
Summary: This hotel is right off I-405 in a lovely area. Every staff member we encountered was was friendly and helpful.  The rooms were very comfortable and tasteful.  Hotel in general was quiet. The restaurant had a limited menu but decent food.
Manager Response: Dear Racefan2016,  We thank you for the recent stay and kind remarks.  Glad to hear the rooms were comfortable and quiet.  We hope to host you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: More Like a Three Star Hotel
Summary: Upon arrival, I was somewhat disappointed with the building, the lobby and especially the dated lift. The entire hotel feels dated, the place is rather dark and unwelcoming. To me, this is exactly the feel of a three stars hotel.  Other than the bed, I wouldn't say the room is modern, most furniture is pretty basic, some are redundant and what surprised me most is the conceal Cabinet Coffee Maker. It is frustrating enough trying to keep the cabinet door, and the toilet opens, when you are making a cup of coffee.   Having said that, the staff who served me at the reception is friendly and pleasant; the check-in is relative fast for me.  I feel that I am paying a three stars hotel at a four stars price. There most be a better option in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Kengohcp,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We are very sorry to hear we fell short of your expectations of the hotel property.  We are very happy to hear the staff was fast and friendly.  We wish you well on your travels and hope to host you next time you are in town.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Disappointing with a ray of light
Summary: Stayed for a short business trip. Hotel is large and serves some airline crews. I have grown to expect the IHG Crowne Plaza brand to deliver a decent level of quality without being particularly fancy/lux. This one was rather disappointing. While rooms had clearly been redecorated, it was a little like lipstick on a pig. With the older parts showing under the redesign. Plenty of aging elements. The staff were attentive and professional, especially at the resteraunt.   Time for a real redecoration.
Manager Response: Dear IlanF,  Thank you greatly for your recent visit and vital feedback.  We are very sorry we fell short of your expectations in regards to the challenges in the room.  Our property is currently going under some renovations which includes our gym that was just completed along with some in room updates.   We hope to welcome you back after these items of have been completed.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I came here for a small workshop and was very pleasantly surprised that this hotel that a bit "motel-esque" on the outside is nice, clean and more boutique-ish when you get inside. The service is great, the food is great and all of the staff members bend over backwards to accommodate you.   The bed was wonderful. The shower had a rain type shower head on top and a normal strong spray below - your choice.   Two special touches were much appreciated - 1) a large magnifying mirror with several lighting settings and 2) a SLEEP KIT! (I'm attaching pictures of this fantastic little thing that I looked forward to each night). It has gel to soothe sore feet and legs, aromatic moisturizer for chest, neck and face, and a wonderful spritzer to spray sleeping, calming essential oils on your
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie D,  Thank you for your recent visit and vital feedback.  We are happy the staff was accommodating and the food was great.    Please come back and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel was beyond convenient. It was located less than ten minutes from the airport, right off the highway and blocks from major retail therapy. The room was clean and modern. The hotel restaurant had wonderful food and staff exhibited excellent customer service. I was beyond satisfied with this location and my stay.

This is a first rate hotel. Staff are so friendly and helpful. The facility was clean and well maintained. Food was exceptionally nice and good value. Special word of praise for Camella serving in the restaurant- she is a gem.
Manager Response: Dear Mgkelly2017,  Thank you so much for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  It pleases us to know the staff was friendly and helpful including our 'gem' Carmella.  We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We spent a week being treated like royalty. Nothing wasn't perfect. Imelda was a jewel. She anticipated every desire. Every time I turned around she was there asking what she could do for us. Also worthy of mention are Yesenia (spelling?), Virginia and the poor woman with her arm in a sling. We had such a good time we are returning next week for another 5 days.
Manager Response: Dear Athomasbbyc,  We are so happy you spent your recent stay with us at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are so happy our staff (Imelda,Virginia) treated you like royalty.    Please stop by and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great place to stay! Everyone so so pleasant and friendly! Very conveniently located. The free shuttle within five miles was also so good! I'd definitely return! Gym and pool were good. Buffet breakfast was an excellent treat!!
Manager Response: Dear Xime72,  Thank you so much for the recent visit to our property.  We are happy to hear that everyone was pleasant and conveniently located.  Glad to know you enjoyed the recently renovated gym.    Look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here in Aug 2016. Got here, checked in, walked a few blocks for early dinner at one of the hip vegetarian/vegan Resto, then grabbed some froyo on our way back to the hotel.   Our room was lovely. It was clean, spacious & comfortable. We also liked the amenities and the wonderful rainfall shower head in the bathroom.   During our few days stay, the hotel staffs & the restaurant staffs were professional & polite. However, we do think that adding a bit of a warm gesture, like a smile, would go a looong way in improving guests' experience :)  During our stay, we also went to the massive mall, South Coast Plaza, which was only about 10min by car to the opposite direction. We found many good establishments to satisfy our food cravings & shopping desires.  In summary: Nice room,
Manager Response: Dear Eggstraordinary,  We appreciate the recent visit to our property.  We ecstatic to know you enjoyed the central location and professional service.  We also appreciate the feedback regarding the smile as we also agree that is vital for the guest experience.    If you should find yourself in the area once again, please stop by for another visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Some Cable channels didn't work, the bathtub would not drain, housekeeping knocked at 8:30am to try and clean the room, which leads to a 2-star review from me.All in all nothing special about this property.
Manager Response: Dear Akmmalik,  Thank you for the recent visit to our property.  We are very sorry for the challenging experience you faced with bathtub and television.  The feedback provided was used as a vital training opportunity for our staff.  Please know everything has been corrected since your past visit.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you once again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa is very nice. The property is extremely well kept, the lobby is good looking, the staff is very welcoming and helpful. The room is great. Nice space, great bed! Defiantly a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear leebarber337,  Thank you very much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  It brings us joy to know the staff was welcoming and property well kept.  Please come back and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Good value and location with a few items left to be desired
Summary: The room was comfortable, spacious and clean, the location was great for FWY access and proximity to south coast plaza or the airport. Check-in with Alex was pleasant and easy and their lobby and restaurant area was visually appealing. Bonus was that we didn't have to pay for parking, as I had previously thought when I booked.  For the down side, their pool towels were sized somewhere between a hand towel and small bath towel. Not big enough to wrap around a waist unless it is for a small child. Also their spa had no working jets both nights and was only luke-warm. Our AC was probably my biggest disappointment as I was unable to lower it below a certain temperature (causing me to sweat at night) and it was extremely loud, making it difficult to stay asleep both nights. Also I
Manager Response: Dear Alimariew,  Thank you so much for the recent visit and vital feedback.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the central location of the hotel.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I booked this because the price fit my company's budget. It is well located near the John Wayne airport and a very large upscale mall. The rooms were spacious and well-decorated. The bathroom was tiny and outdated. There was a rain head shower but it was installed in such a way that it dripped on the floor. Overall, the bathroom was clean and functional. I was disappointed that there was no shower soap and the second day, my toiletries were not refurbished. The staff was very friendly and the bar was nice. I was disappointed that the fitness center was closed, but they had an alternative at a nearby Hilton. I would stay here again if Traveling on business to this area.
Manager Response: Dear Susan D,  Thank you so much for the recent visit and vital feedback.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the spacious rooms and decor.  Please excuse us as we are currently renovating our gym but will be finished very soon.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but kinda noisy location
Summary: The hotel is located right off the 405 freeway exit ramp.  It can get noisy at night as the traffic is just moving constantly.  The only time it's not noisy is when the freeway jams up and the cars and trucks move slowly through.  Unfortunately, I got the room that faces the main street and it was pretty noisy most of the evening till I was so tired that I just fell asleep.  The room doesn't have a microwave and you have to request for a mini refrigerator to be delivered to your room.  I even went down to the lobby to see if I could borrow their break room microwave but was told that they don't have any microwave ovens on site.  WHAT A BUNCH OF LIARS!!!  The staff even said that outside food is not allowed in the hotel.  Overall, the room is nice.  The 4 pillows were overstuffed
Manager Response: Dear Richard L,  Thank you so much for your recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry we did not meet your expectations when it came to the in room amenities and noise.    If your travels are to bring you back to the area, we would be happy to host you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: PRO:  Enjoyed our stay here, beds were very comfortable, rooms smelled clean, unique design of the room with different elements that didn't match but felt they complimented each other.  Towels were soft and bathrooms were well lighted and a nice space, no bathtub, just a walk in shower, which I loved.   Appreicated the touch card to unlock the door.  Didn't hear any road or neighborhood noises.   Hotel access was easy to get into and out.     Con:  Pillows were too soft.  Carpet is showing wear by door.  Wi-fi wasn't great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel.¬†I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.¬†It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a great location for a business traveler, just off the 405 a mile from John Wayne airport, and down the street from South Coast Plaza shopping mall and other great shopping and restaurants. Service was excellent. Very comfortable (firm) bed. In-room safe made storing my valuables easy. Keurig coffee maker in room, shame on you for wasting all that plastic, I didn't use it. Bathroom remodel was very nice, great rainshower shower head, excellent lighting, magnifying makeup mirror, soft fluffy towels. When I entered my room and noticed one of the 5 bulbs of the bathroom light was out and immediately called the front desk, the service person was in my room within 10 minutes to fix it - thank you. My room was just above the outdoor hot tub so there was some
Manager Response: Dear Sara H,  Thank you for your recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the central location and accommodations.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay here often. Front desk staff is always cheery and accommodating at check-in. Thanks Alex H, Gio, Carneta, Virginia, Aldo, Javier and Roy for always being so pleasant and helpful. The rooms are spacious with comfy beds, adequate storage and nice bathrooms. WiFi is quick and rooms have cat5 ports w cables.  The restaurant has great food and craft brews on tap! I've had great dining experiences with breakfast and dinner staff. Rachel, Mina, Imelda, Francisco and Ignacio are great in the morning. The Chef(Jaime) has a great menu for the evenings and Shane behind the bar knows his stuff. He can always recommend the right beverage to pair with your dish. Dom, Carmela, Ana, Elisette and Yesenia are great in the evenings. Very attentive. Glass never empties and orders are always
Manager Response: Dear Thomas_Nine1,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and continued patronage of the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  You kind words regarding our staff are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your continued travels here to our property.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Been staying here weekly for 3 months. The wifi is the absolute worst. Half the time it is completely down and when it does work it seems like it's dial up (Speedtest app shows 5 Mbps download). Their tv system is bad too, some stations are choppy. The showers in the renovated rooms are nice and the restaurant isn't bad. Parking is convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Dustin S,  Thank you so much for the recent stay and the vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry for the challenging experience you faced with the internet and television.  Since your visit we are in the process of upgrading our system and should have faster internet speeds.  If you are every down in the area we hope that you will give us another chance, as we would be happy to host you.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful Venue for a Boutique Conference
Summary: For the past 11 years I have hosted a small conference (less than 100 people) over the Presidents' Day weekend at this venue. It is the perfect place--this year the customer service was outstanding, starting with the attention to detail and the friendliness of the staff at the registration desk.  Of special note was the help and assistance provided by our Sales & Catering Manager, Ted Frisbee, and the Banquet Manager, Oscar Guzman. Thanks for a wonderful weekend!
Manager Response: Dear belindakelisle,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are ecstatic to hear you received outstanding customer service by many of our staff members.   We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager.

Summary: stayed here 1 night. The guys at the front desk (Alex & Chris?) were very friendly, made sure we were happy especially as we are platinum members. Does not include breakfast. No fridge in room, but one can be requested, supply is limited, 1st come 1st served, be sure to do so when booking
Manager Response: Dear m_k759,  Thank you so much for your recent visit and kind comments regarding our staff.  We hope to see you again soon!  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 1 week. They first gave me a room on the first floor, close to the road and therefore quite noisy. I asked to change room and get a room on a higher floor. They took care of moving my stuff from my room to the new one but they transferred everything except a brand new Canada Goose Parka (purchased $1,100).  I asked one of the hotel manager to take screenshots from the footage of the security cameras in order to prove that my coat wasn't transferred.  Either they forgot the coat in the former room and the following guest took it, or the housekeeping stole it.  I struggled with the insurance company from the hotel to get my money back. A  few months later I managed to get reimbursed only $500 by their insurance.  They didn't even offer me any free nights
Manager Response: Dear Yoann G,  Thank you for your visit and vital feedback.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenging experience you had during your visit.    If you find yourself in the Orange County area once again, please feel free to reach out to me with any questions and/or accommodation needs.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Clean, Congenial staff.   Feels like home
Summary: I walked into Crowne Plaza last night after not being there for 3 months and Alex and front desk said Welcome Back and my name.  They asked how my Holidays were and remembered the room I liked!  They are a GREAT property with a GREAT team that definitely chose their careers well.  It shows that they are all doing exactly what they love.  Its hard being away from home, but this feels like my home away from home no matter how long it has been since I have stayed here.
Manager Response: Dear Pollyneely,  Thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate your kind words and continued patronage.  We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel staff was wonderful treated us very courteously. The wait staff in the restaurant was especially great for the complimentary breakfast. Their names were Imelda and Mina and Francisco. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mike D,  Thank you very much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are extremely happy to know that Imelda, Mina and Francisco were very courteous to you.  We hope you will come back to visit soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very good service all throughout the hotel. Very nice outside fireplace to sit around. The breakfast is ok. Nothing to write home about, but it is not bad either. Service, cleanliness, and value make this place my go to place in the area. I stayed a few times there. They were all very good. Nice people, they must genuinely like their jobs. Will definitely be back again soon.  One recommendation: Maybe spice up the breakfast buffet a bit more.
Manager Response: Dear Ontheroadagain3400,  Thank you very much for your kind comments and recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are glad you enjoyed the amenities and the friendly service.  We hope to see you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My wife and I spent a couple of nights here.  While it caters more to the business traveler and to airline crews, it proved a good getaway for us.  We were just across the freeway from South Coast Plaza, the Orange County Performing Arts Center, and it's a short drive from John Wayne Airport.  The front desk staff and the cleaning crew were consistently friendly.  The room was very comfortable and not lacking in what we might need (with the possible exception of a microwave).  It did though need a little more care: there was dirt in the shower grout, the toilet seat was loose and the heater/AC was too loud.  Also, the hotel is right next to a busy road and the 405 freeway.  We could hear traffic but it was not too bad.  I would recommend a room not facing the road.
Manager Response: Dear Rschiller,  Thank you very much for the recent visit and feedback.  Its great to hear the staff was friendly and you enjoyed the central location.  Please come back and visit soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Good staff, but infrastructure needs work.
Summary: Staff was friendly, restaurant was good. However you'd better be 5'6" or less if you'd like to take a shower. I'm 5'8" and the trendy "rain" shower head sits too low for me. Also, good luck getting your devices to charge via the desktop plugs. Finally, at least on the first floor, the internet is unusable. I couldn't even check email because the connection is so slow. It's too bad a good staff and a good location are marred by the frustration of poor attention to detail.
Manager Response: Dear Jandjprosio,  Thank you for the recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are sorry to hear the shower did not meet your expectations and the internet has since been corrected.  We look forward to hosting you if you find yourself in the Orange County area once again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: local hotel right off the I-405 freeway
Summary: booked this hotel for a quick weekend get-away, used this hotel last year for family during there visit, but this was the first time I stayed here. nice lobby, has a bar and restaurant, plenty of parking, great location. room was ok, clean but nothing special.
Manager Response: Dear Ann G,  Thank you very much for your recent visit to our property.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the central location and accommodations.  We hope to welcome you back again in the future.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed 2 nights.  Alex and his co worker were great....friendly and helpful.  Room clean and spacious. Ate in the bar. Food good...not great.  Duck fries were white and soggy, not cooked enough.  Taste of duck and sauce was very good. Hamburger very good. I have 2 complaints......martinis are $15.50....crazy over priced.  The next day we left the hotel and returned at 2:45pm.....our room had not been cleaned!!!!    We asked for clean towels from the housekeeper and that was it!    Need to get housekeeping moving and reasonably price your martinis!
Manager Response: Dear Mary H,  Thank you for your recent stay and vital feedback.  We are happy Alex treated you well during your visit.  Sorry we fell short of your expectations when it came to the restaurant.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: The staff at this hotel are amoung the most friendly and helpful of any hotels we have stayed in the past 5 years.
Summary: The locations of this hotel was perfect for what we wanted to do and where we wanted to go.  The room was just "OK".., not great.  The hotel is old and the furniture, carpet, bath and walls of the rooms show it...!!  The lobby, restaurant and other common areas were nice.
Manager Response: Dear Hgenekoch,  Thank you very much for the recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are happy the hotel was central to your needs and restaurant was nice.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Happy New Year.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great room, quiet, skip the breakfast buffet.
Summary: Our room with 2 queens was great.  Beds were EXTREMELY comfortable.  Loved the beds.  Spacious and clean, nice bathroom, iron and ironing board, coffee.  Never heard a noise of any kind in 2 nights.  Parking right on site.  Desk staff and all hotel staff very pleasant and helpful.  2 blocks to the huge mall.  Very close to the airport; less than 5 minutes.  Skip the breakfast buffet- overpriced and very blah.  Maybe ordering off the menu is better.  The restaurant does get high marks.
Manager Response: Dear pbirdie3,  Thank you very much for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate your vital feedback regarding your comfortable bed and clean bathroom.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A  well runned and spacious hotel
Summary: I stayed in this lovely hotel with my friends for 3 nights and 4 days. The hotel is very nicely run and maintained very well. The rooms are very nice and spacious with many amenities such as irons, toothbrushes and so on. The staff are very helpful and are willing to help you out anytime . The breakfast is very satisfactory as well. However for further improvement of this hotel the meal service could be improved with more choices. I will definitely come back and I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear AshanSam,  Thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate your kind words regarding our amenities and staff.    Please come by and visit us again should you find yourself in the Orange County area.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is my second time to stay in this hotel. They gave me a room facing back which was very good for me to have a quiet place for good sleep. The location is very convenient to get around. There's also free shuttle available for nearby activities including SNA airport.
Manager Response: Dear Jim W,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad to hear you were given a quite room and enjoyed the convenient location.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The rooms are standard business fare and offer a good size and comfortable beds. The staff is helpful, but the service does waver a bit. The decor is a slightly tired and worn as the hotel is quite busy, so it is to be expected. That being said the rooms and clean and maintained well. The location is close to South Coast Plaza for very convenient shopping, however, as a general statement nothing is directly walkable as the hotel is in a commercial area.
Manager Response: Dear Capriskman,  We are thankful for your recent visit to our property.  The feedback is greatly appreciated and taken as a gift.  We are glad to hear the staff was helpful and the location central to your needs.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Crowne Plaza so we were walking distance to the South Coast Plaza for Black Friday.  We stayed for 7 nights in an accessible room with 2 queens.  The room was roomy, neat & clean.  All the staff were helpful especially Roy  and nothing was too much when asked.  There was always iced water & fruit water at reception for the guests.  You could hire a refrigerator if you wanted one in your room. There is a free shuttle service that will take you anywhere in a 5 mile radius of the hotel. You had to book a time to go and they would also pick you up from where you were dropped when you were ready to return. We ate thanks giving dinner at Maggianos Little Italy which was fantastic. I would not hesitate to recommend the Crowne Plaza for people staying in Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: Dear Karen L,  Thank you for your recent stay here at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and helpful staff.    We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in Orange County.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent value, clean, quiet, ideally located.
Summary: We stayed for two night during Thanksgiving. This is a return visit. I'm an IHG Ambassador member. The hotel recognized this and accommodated a one category upgrade to a suite 529 as requested. (Note I reserved an executive room and not a standard). Front desk staff are professional and welcoming. Rooms are crisp and clean. Property well located to great Mexican and Japanese restaurants. Their in-house is tasting as well. We will definitely return. Genuinely nice hospitality team.
Manager Response: Dear ThuanMTran9,  Thank you so much for your recent visit at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are thrilled to know you were recognized and welcomed properly.  We hope that you come back and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great place to stay and convenient.  Staff is excellent and friendly - special mention to Imelda Rodriguez.  The food was very good.  Easy access to the 405 freeway.  Quiet and clean rooms.  We will go back for sure
Manager Response: Dear Ray M,  Thank you so much for your recent visit at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to know Imelda was friendly and you enjoyed our central location.   We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The #1 plus of this place is the friendly and outgoing team there.  Everyone was very nice, from the front desk to the bartender.  I imagine this is one of the driving factors of the high ratings.  Good value for the money, great location near tons of shopping, but no restaurants are really within walking distance (by So Cal standards anyway).  This place would get a 4 or 5 star, however the condition of the carpet and trim in my room (516) was completely unacceptable.  The room should really be taken "off line" and not used until the carpet and repairs have been completed.  I emailed the GM with the photos the morning after my check in, and to date, have not heard back from him.  You don't want to walk into your room and see carpet like this, because it makes you second guess
Manager Response: Dear Robert D,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We appreciate the kind words regarding our staff members.  We do apologized we fell short of your expectations when it came to our carpet in your room.  Our hotel is currently in the process of updating the carpet in certain areas as the previous ownership had not used industrial grade carpet when renovating.  Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions and/or concerns at 714 557 3000.  We hope to welcome you back again when you find yourself in the orange county area.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great hotel, service was good. The hotel is in a great location close to Newport Beach and easy enough to access the highway to get to LA or San Diego. Room was spacious and clean. Ordered room service in the morning and it was great. The lady who brought breakfast to our room is what service is all about. Overall a very nice stay!

Summary Heading: Another great CP Property.  Ideal in many respects
Summary: Great decor.  Very comfortable rooms.  LOVED the shower!  You can tell that they recently remodeled and did it right.  The bar seems to have some great specials, with 2 happy hours/night.  The location could not be better - right down the street from South Coast Plaza.  Directly off the 405.  Reasonably priced on Priceline.  Excellent service.  I was able to use the business center w/o a charge.  Overall, a great experience.  I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear DrLuv,  Thank you for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are thrilled you loved the shower and amenities.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: 1st time at a Crowne Plaza. In town for UCI student/parent orientations Great location near freeways & McDonald's.  Room on 1st floor near gym made coming & going quick. Staff at check-in, housekeeping and breakfast were friendly and professional.  Room was spacious, comfortable and I liked the furniture and d√©cor.  Breakfast was included in my rate and was a great hotel breakfast. Way better than the standard free breakfast.  Loved the infused waters near check-in desk and the jogging route note cards in case you want to venture out for exercise.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear TheVez5,  We thank you for your vital feedback and recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are happy you enjoyed your accommodations and professional staff while you were here.    We look forward to welcoming you back to our property.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Top Notch Property, Location, and Sales Team
Summary: I have been working with the sales team at Crowne Plaza since 2013 and have booked numerous individuals and groups of different sizes at the hotel. Every transaction has been smooth from start to finish. Breakfast buffet is great, rooms are very nice, and the location is primo for walking to world class shopping and dining. A special thanks to Jillian and Jenette who helped us with our most recent groups and did a stellar job!
Manager Response: Dear Jofielder7,  Thank you so much for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We extremely happy to hear that your interactions with our sales team have been smooth from start to finish.  We value all our team members and are glad to have stellar employees such as Jillian and Jenette.     We look forward to hosting your next event.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great location and setting for reunion
Summary: Held our 50th high school reunion here and the facilities were great!  Happy hour drinks and appetizers were spot on, the meeting room was just right and the outdoor patio was a great gathering place.  Service was friendly and efficient although they were understaffed.  Room was clean, check in quick and all around a good experience
Manager Response: Dear Herb B,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to our property.  We are happy the meeting went smoothly and service was friendly.  If you find yourself in the Orange County Area, please stop by for another visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: The place to stay in Costa Mesa
Summary: This Crowne Plaza hotel and staff is second to none. We used this location for hosting multiple foreign groups and they made it so easy to check in and out quickly and accommodate our needs throughout the stay. Parking is so easy and access to the 5 is seconds away. The groups enjoyed walking to the nearby restaurants and South Coast Plaza to do some shopping!   This hotel is a no brainer for the OC/Newport/Costa Mesa area and we will be staying here for years to come with the great customer service, newly renovated hotel, and prime location.
Manager Response: Dear Eleaser5,  Thank you so much for your kind words and visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We extremely happy to hear that you enjoyed the central location and friendly staff.   We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: It is greatest hotel when I stay with pro volleyball team from china Shanghai around Costa Mesa and Irvine, I will definitely keep choose this hotel when I bring any pro volleyball team from china in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Hua L,  Your visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa is greatly appreciated.  We enjoyed having the volleyball team here, everyone was excellent.   We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at the Crowne Plaza and have nothing but rave reviews. They are perfectly located walking distance to the South Costa Plaza shopping center and very nearby beaches. Their location offers easy access to both the 5 & 405 freeways to get to get to Disneyland & the San Clemente outlets malls.  Their pool & Jacuzzi was like an oasis. Their breakfast Buffett was delicious. And their customer service was 5-star. It's definitely my new favorite hotel in So Cal.
Manager Response: Dear Brooke055,  Thank you so much for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We extremely happy to hear that you enjoyed the central location and five star service.   Please come back and visit soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location, Great Breakfast, Great Staff & Great Value
Summary: I spent a fair amount of time in northern Orange County and just recently discovered the Crowne Plaza. Its right near South Coast Plaza, and while easily accessed from the 405/72/55 its also nice and quiet. Breakfast is wonderful, staff is helpful and friendly, and the hotel has a really clean and comfortable feeling. You can walk to all kinds of great restaurants and snack options with the CAMP (love this place!) and the LAB nearby, as well as 2 great Poke restaurants, a Wahoo's, and a whole new mini-mall of food about 2-3 minutes walk from the hotel. I'll be be back...
Manager Response: Dear Bip_TK,  Thank you so much for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We extremely happy to hear that you enjoyed the central location and friendly staff.    We hope that you will come back and visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Good Hotel at the right location
Summary: I like to stay in this hotel which is just off South Coast Plaza, with an easy access to all business, restaurants and attractions in Orange County. The food which is served on site is simple yet good and nice presentation. Very good service.
Manager Response: Dear Markel52,  Thank you very much for the recent stay and the vital feedback provided.  We are glad you enjoyed the food and good service.    We hope to welcome you back to the area again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay here about once a month as my company has an office over on MacArthur and its like my second home  As an IHG Spire Elite member the staff always look after me and upgrade me pretty much every stay.   The rooms are modern, all with air con. Best rooms are the ones that are street facing as occasionally the rooms looking out onto the pool or back of the restaurant can get a bit of noise late evening with guests out enjoying themselves.  Only ask would be that the gym was a little bigger and had more equipment. Usually sign upto the 24 Hour Fitness just up the road which is about $60 for a weeks pass ( but you will need a hire car)  Some great spots nearby for food like the Blackmarket Bakery, Shabu Shabu, Habana and Rooster Cafe.  Aswell as a giant shopping mall just up the
Manager Response: Dear Jon H,  Thank you so much for the kind words and recent stay here at the Crowne Plaza.  We are ecstatic to know this is like your second home.  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and hotel.    We look forward to welcoming you back to our property soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a few days during a business trip.  The client I was visiting was only a few miles away, so when I remembered to schedule ahead, the shuttle dropped me at their office.  On the day I did not schedule the shuttle it was already out for an airport run, so the front desk called me a cab.  The cab was 20 minutes late, and when the front desk called to get an update they were told it would be at least another 20 minutes.  At this point I was already late for my morning meeting.  Kelli, a Crowne Plaza staff member, kindly stepped in to help me out at the front desk and called another cab company.  She also got in touch with the Crowne Plaza's shuttle driver to see what he could do.  the second company called showed up a few minutes later, and I was only about 10
Manager Response: Dear Terri K,  Thank you very much for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to hear the staff was helpful in getting you to your destination.  We look forward to welcoming you back.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Car was vandalized , as well as others and they offered NO COMPENSATION or and real response. Gave me the corporate smile, handshake and typical rhetoric.  Very Disappointed in how they essentially told me sorry, but tough S***.
Manager Response: Dear massha1203,  Thank you for choosing our hotel on your recent stay.  We sincerely hope you will give us another try when you are back in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: You Don't Always Get What You Ask For!
Summary: I requested a room with two beds.  We checked in and I was informed that one of the beds was a sofa bed - but that still counted as two beds. I was told that since I booked the room through Hotels.com they guaranteed the room but not that I would receive two beds as requested!  Since we didn't get the two beds they gave us our $10.00 parking space at no charge.  We had a late lunch and were beat from traveling and I just wanted to hit the hay.  So we head up to the room with our left overs from lunch that were going to be our dinner.    The hotel is beautiful and very tastefully decorated.  I do not understand why there was only one elevator for that wing of the hotel.  The room was beautiful, clean and quiet.  The downfall was that the room did not have a refrigerator in it!
Manager Response: Dear W9850ZY,  Thank you for your recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry to hear well fell short of your expectation when it came to the refrigerator and breakfast.  Unfortunately, non of our rooms come with a refrigerator standard and the breakfast normally isn't included either.   Please reach out to me personally if you should find yourself traveling to the area once again.  I will be happy to provide you with options and rates that include breakfast and we will be happy to provide refrigerator for your needs as well.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: A very nice hotel and a short distance from the airport.  Free shuttle service is available.  Rooms are nice.   Housekeeping does a great job.    Good facilities for meetings as well. I was very impressed with Carlos and Oscar and thank them for their professional service. Room service provided great service.  Food was great.  I would definitely stay here again.  Walking distance to some nice dining choices.
Manager Response: Dear Joe L,  We thank you so much for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are glad to hear our housekeeping and banquets team provided professional service during your stay.   Please come back and see us again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Nice rooms with excellent location in Costa Mesa. from a few minutes walking to the shopping malls. Close to the Japanese mall. Just 9 minutes driving to Newport Beach. Fast internet love the shampoo and conditioner of the hotel
Manager Response: Dear manrehe,  We appreciate your recent stay and important feedback.  We are glad to know you enjoyed the rooms and location of the hotel.  If you find yourself in the area again, please come back and visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Definitely recommend staying at Crowne Plaza Mesa! Very convenient location and late checkout were an added bonus. Every staff member we came into contact with was extremely courteous, pleasant and professional! Our room was ready early and Gio at the front desk was nice enough to provide us with complimentary breakfast vouchers since we were here to celebrate a birthday. Mina our server in the dining was very attentive and friendly. Our room was clean, bed comfortable and tasteful  modern decor. Customer service here in addition to the nicely update accommodations made this an incredible stay!
Manager Response: Dear jmosika,  Thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  It makes us very happy to hear of your incredible stay.  Please come back to visit us again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel was updated and clean. We stayed for the night only to catch our flight home the next day. We checked in after dinner. The room was updated with two queen beds and a desk. It also had an armoire at the entrance way which held the one cup kureig. The pillows on the bed were kinda flat and I needed to use two to get comfortable. There is no free breakfast, but there is a macdonalds next door. I took a shower before bed. The shower was also updated but the tub did not drain at all. And I tried to see if the plug was in the tub but it was very confusing. I wouldn't know how to do it that's for sure. There was a lack of electrical outlets in this room. My brother in law had a power bar, but if he didn't. We probably wouldn't have enough. I had to plug the morning coffee in
Manager Response: Dear Diamyn,  Thank you so much for your recent visit and the vital feedback provided.  We apologize the bathroom was confusing and the lack of electrical outlets.    If you should find yourself in the area once again please stop by to see us again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Costa Mesa.
Summary: I have stayed at this location a few times now for business and have never had any issues.  The staff is friendly, the beds are comfy, and the location is great.  The hotel is near the airport, many restaurants, and the freeway.  Easy on, easy off, but it doesn't feel like you are right by the highway.  The restaurant/bar area is clean and the food is very good.  I would stay at this location again next time I am in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Shnoogie,  Thank you so much for the recent visit.  We are happy you enjoyed the staff and location.  We hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel.  Staff was great.  Pool and spa quiet and clean.  Liked the Restaurant in the hotel.  Took the shuttle over to the best mall close by.  Piano in the lobby that a guest was playing.  Very relaxing.  Did not see children.
Manager Response: Dear Neice71,  We thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are extremely happy to know the hotel was nice and the staff great.  Please come back and visit again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: When I was stranded here because my flight was cancelled I chose this hotel!! So happy with my choice and I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Very chic and super nice inside. Reasonable rates and great staff...especially the check in process.
Manager Response: We thank you so much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Glad to hear you thought the hotel was chic and super nice.  Please come back and visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very accommodating. Karen was the  one of the nice customer service reps I had the chance of meeting. Although I called 2x to let them know I would be late(and later...)  Karen was super friendly and genuine! She made this experience very memorable- knew who I was when I arrived, made the check in process hassle free, and let me park in a restricted recreation parking spot near the entrance overnight bc I am a young woman and didn't want to be wondering the parking lot at night. She took great care of me and was looking out for me just like a friend would... Thanks for the great night sleep- great shower products and cozy clean environment which is a must for me!  The morning crew was eager to help me, and the check out was a piece of cake! Thanks again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Katharine K,  Thank you so much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy Karen was able to make your check-in experience a memorable one.    We hope to invite you back to the hotel again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova  Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Considering the location and the name I was expecting more
Summary: Nothing really bad with the place, it's reasonably priced, well located and service is very good, problems are just in the structure it self. Old rooms, smell in all common area, a mix of different contribution that give you the idea of dust also if probably it's all clean. Room are not very good maintained, mine was with burning/abrasion on the old carpet, cables were running on the wall in a quite humespun way and not a very good sound isolation; pretty noisy in the night. It's ok but not what you could expect from the brand.
Manager Response: Dear Giuseppe W,  Thank you so much for the recent stay and the vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry we fell short of your expectations when it came to the hotel structure and old carpet.  We are currently in the process of renovating our carpet which should be done by the end of the year.  If you are ever in the Orange County area, please contact the hotel should you reconsider staying at the hotel so that we can ensure a great next stay.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed there for two days and had a great time. The room was very clean and decent size. The staff super friendly and helpful. The bathroom has a rainforest shower head which was amazing. A lot of little touches like aromatherapy lotions and sprays for a good night sleep and extra charging stations for laptops and cell phones. Super fast free wifi and great location. The tavern down stairs has excellent food , reasonable prices and awesome service. All in all a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tonyadarling,  We appreciate your recent visit to our property and the vital feedback given.  It makes us very happy to hear the staff was super friendly and you enjoyed the central location.   We hope to welcome you back to the area again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service and attention to detail!
Summary: I had to attend meetings in Costa Mesa and the meetings were held at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  It was a wonderful place to have our meetings.  One of the best things about the hotel is the staff.  They were very friendly and were attentive to our every need.  One employee, Imelda Rodriguez, went above and beyond the call of duty each day when we ordered lunch in the hotel.  She always got our orders correct, and brought them in to our meeting room with a smile.  Way to go, Imelda!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer L,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to know Imelda went above and beyond for you along with other staff members.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Out of touch, but great service
Summary: I was here for business and stayed a week.  Pros --> The staff were excellent, especially those in the restaurant.  Ismeda was attentive and anticipated needs for us all week. The location was central to our meetings and the meeting room was large and comfortable for our work.  Cons --> However, the internet through out the hotel was very poor. In my room I could not send and receive even small emails and could not use our online tools for work. Simple social media pages would not load.  Near the lobby the internet was terribly slow but functional. However, two times during our stay it dropped out completely.  Second issue for us was the 2nd floor hallway.  The smell was quite strong.  I wondered if there had been a water leak.  We would avoid walking the hall altogether and
Manager Response: Dear Worktrip6855,  Thank you so much for the recent trip to our hotel.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenging time you faced with the internet connection and bad smell in the hallway.  We have since confirmed the internet is working strong and there is no smell as well.   We would definitely enjoy to have you back whenever you find yourself in the area.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Free Wi Fi!  Surrounded by shopping and restaurants!  This place is a great value and staff were very helpful and courteous.  This is my 4th visit and will continue to stay here.  I had been staying at the Westin which is a very nice place but this is much better value.  Westin charges for internet and parking which adds another $30 per day to costs.  Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Oyabaka,  Your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa is greatly appreciated.  We are very happy the staff was courteous and helpful.  We are excited you have made this your choice hotel when in the Orange County area.   We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have such mixed feelings on this place. The staff were all so friendly and helpful, which is great.   My room on the other hand was just good, average, but not 4 stars. Lots of wear and tear on the bed frames, carpet and fixtures. There were stains of 3 of the 4 lamp shades...looks nasty. The fire alarm fixture was rusty and shabby looking as well as the yellowed (obviously old) smoke alarm which went off when you open the bathroom door after a shower...because there is no fan in the bathroom, all that steam rolls out into the room. I also found an empty pop bottle under one of the beds.  The beds themselves were actually pretty good. A bit firmer than I like but comfortable nonetheless. The bedding was also in good shape and clean. :-)    The shower head was great!...one of
Manager Response: Dear TravelIsAsTravelDoes,  Thank you very much for the recent visit and vital feedback provided.  We take the information as a gift and will make sure that it is made aware to our management team.   If you ever find yourself in the area feel free to stop by again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Does't look so good outside but inside it's beautifully done. The room we had was large and had lots of outlets for our gadgets. Large bathroom and great shower.  We didn't have a refrigerator or micro, for our leftover food and they do charge for parking right out front and not secured?   Thermostat to control the quiet air-conditioning.  The internet in our room was very slow and unreliable.
Manager Response: Dear R55Wilson,  Thank you so much for the recent visit to out property.  We are very happy you were pleasantly surprised by the appearance of the hotel and you enjoyed the shower.  We have since confirmed the internet is working correctly.   We hope to see you again soon!  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very happy with our choice of hotel, in particular the location which was central to everywhere we needed. We stayed for 10 nights and couldn't have chosen a better 'all round' hotel. Food, quality of room, pool etc were all well above standard however what stood out for us was the quality of the staff. There wasn't one person who let them down which, as a well travelled businessman, is very rare. Imelda in the restaurant was great example of how friendly and proffessional staff should be. The other big plus was the reception staff. When you in a foreign country its great to have people who go out of their way to help.
