Manager Response: Dear Shaun P,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are overjoyed to hear of your experience here with Imelda and the other staff members.  We hope that we can welcome you back to the hotel soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel may look old from outside but it's very nice and modern inside.   Bar area and bar patio are really cool.   Rooms are also very well kept.   Parking is only 10 dollars a night.   Free internet and free welcome drink for rewards members. They have a good selection of draft beers. Happy hour from 5-7.
Manager Response: Dear Mikheil_a,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We are ecstatic that you enjoyed the bar and patio.  We hope to see you again soon.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Property and close to EVERYTHING!
Summary: We had a great stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  All staff was friendly and so helpful.  Awesome service by Mina! She took the time to recommend shopping and was  just a pleasure to talk to.  this hotel offered everything we needed for this trip--pool was great, bar was great and the outside lounge area with the fire was so comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear OnWisconsin1,  Thank you very much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to hear that the staff was friendly and helpful to your needs.    Please come back and visit again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Had such a great stay here! Everyone was super nice and courteous especially Mina! Huge shout out to her, she was very attentive as our server and bartender at the restaurant! I recommend her Bloody Mary, delicious!!!  We would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Aurrea339,  Thank you so much for visiting the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very happy Mina was super nice and attentive.    Please come back to visit and have another delicious Bloody Mary.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I use this hotel every month for business trips.  It is very consistent.  The rooms are quite comfortable.  The pillows, sheets, and towels are of good quality.  The bed is very comfortable.  The a/c works well and can be set by me with a thermostat.  The staff are friendly and helpful.  I only eat there for breakfast as there are so many choices for lunch and dinner elsewhere.  The food is good although not very imaginative if you get the buffet.  Same thing pretty much every day.
Manager Response: Dear Sakemall,  We are very glad to hear you have made our hotel your monthly stop for business trips.  Thank you for the vital feedback regarding the comfort and quality of your room.   Please come and see us soon if you find yourself in the Orange County area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Happily surprised as to how good my stay at this hotel was. I planned 5 days, stayed 7.  Everything was spot on. From the accommodations to the Fireside restaurant. The staff was amazingly attentive during the whole stay. Special thanks to Virginia, Alex and Aldo.  Outstanding. And thanks Greg for moving me after we discovered a noise issue from the neighboring room. I'd come back as its a good location to meet up with my friends and eat.  Also walking distance to the Lab and the Camp.
Manager Response: Dear Joshcalkid,  Thank you so much for the recent visit and the kind words.  We are very happy to hear that members of our staff were outstanding during your time with us.   Please stop in again if you ever find yourself in the Orange County area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We booked the Green rate which I believe they will not have anymore but it was worth the rate with free breakfast and a cocktail at night. We ate at the restaurant both mornings and were greeted by a very friendly staff that was very accommodating, Especially Imelda C Rodriguez. She was the best. The food was excellent and the bar had a great variety of drinks. The rooms were comfy and clean and the pool was nice. It was also in a good central location. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear anchart895,  Your recent visit here at Crowne Plaza Costa is greatly appreciated.  We are happy you booked the green package while also enjoying the breakfast and cocktails which come included.   We hope you come back soon to visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We were in the executive wing and our room was lovely. Took us about 10 minutes to figure out where the curtains were but the room was modern, with a large bed and clean, shiny bathroom. McDonalds next door was a welcome sight when we arrived late in the evening and hungry!  The only negative I can think of was there was a bit of a stain on the sofa in the room, everything else was spot on. It was a little more pricey than other similar hotels we have stayed in, but this is to do with the area rather than the hotel itself.
Manager Response: Dear BeckyHastings,  We thankful for your recent visit to our property and the important feedback given.  We are very happy to know you enjoyed your room. Our apologies for the stain found on the couch.  We will be working closely with our housekeeping department to ensure this doesn't happen for future guests.   We hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed for a weekend stop as part of our family vacation and the we had a great experience. Rooms were clean and nice. We had breakfast buffets included for our group and our server Mina was extraordinary service for our breakfast meal. When we arrived for breakfast the second morning she already offered to prepare our tables bring larger quantities of water and coffee and overall took care of us. Amazing service at the restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Cosmin G,  Thank you so much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate the vital feedback regarding the clean rooms and the service provided for breakfast.  We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Front Desk staff extremely helpful and courteous -- want to recognize Alex Henry he was excellent!  Helped me with my billing and he also went out of his way to help us retrieve some luggage that my daughter had accidentally left behind. His quick action resulted in us getting our "stuff" before we had to fly out -- thanks Alex!
Manager Response: Dear Joseph M,  Thank you for your kind words and your recent visit to our hotel.  Alex Henry is a great asset to our team and we are happy he was able to exemplify the type of service we expect our guests to receive.    We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Awesome stay!  Karen at the Front desk was really nice.  Really close to a lot of places.  Parking was easy to find.  All in all, a nice hotel and definitely would stay here again.  And likely will for future trips whenever I am in the Orange County area.  Thanks again Karen!
Manager Response: Dear Dwight L,  We are very happy to have hosted you recently at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Thank you for your kind comments regarding Karen and your accommodations.   Please do stop again when you are in the area.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Annoyed that my flight was canceled out of Santa Ana and I couldn't get out until the next day, I searched on my phone for the highest rated hotel closest to South Coast Plaza.  The Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa came up with a 4.8 out of 5.0 rating, a very reasonable rate, and free shuttle to and from the airport.  I called and was picked up within 10 minutes of my phone call and delivered to the hotel.  The customer service associate at the desk was pleasant, empathetic, and efficient.  They offered me a free cocktail and free shuttle service to anywhere I wanted to go within 5 miles of the hotel.  I chose South Coast Plaza and proceeded to spend some time shopping and dining at one of the restaurants connected to the mall.  When I was ready, I called the shuttle driver who came
Manager Response: Dear Lisa P,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa and the very kind comments.  We are very happy to know that the service was pleasant and the location central to your needs.   We hope to welcome you back to our hotel soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Positives are cleanliness, bed, location and staff.  Negatives are a noisy a/c, no fridge or microwave.  They would bring in a portable fridge for $10 a night!  Also, bar drinks are pricey if it's not happy hour.  In spite of being close to the freeway, it was fairly quiet. The room was well appointed and roomy.  All in all, it was not bad.  With just a little more amenities, it could be great. We were going to the Scottish games at the fairground and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Sierra_Gray_Wolf,  Your recent visit and feedback is greatly appreciated.  We take the feedback as a gift and will make sure to pass along to our management team.   If you should find yourself in the Orange County area, please stop by for another visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We arrived from New York via Denver. We were collected by the Shuttle Bus. The driver was very friendly and said we could use the service within a 5 mile radius of the hotel.  The reception staff were very courteous & we were delighted with our spacious room.  We decided to dine at the restaurant and both had a delicious meal served by Carmelli who was delightful.  She suggested places for us to visit in Yosemite once she heard we were touring California.  Breakfast choice was also very extensive and we were served by very efficient & friendly staff.  A thoroughly enjoyable start to our tour!
Manager Response: Dear Rika G,  Thank you so much for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  It pleases us to hear that the service staff was courteous and the meal was delicious.   We wish you well on your travels and hope to see you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I found this on the Secret buy on Travelocity and I am super impressed. I work in the industry and know what to look for. The lobby is fantastic and the ambiance lovely. I was greeted by Alex Henry at the Front Desk. He was wonderful and made me feel at home. He's a keeper, great customer service and personality. I would totally take him to my Vegas property. The uniforms are a great color too. Thank you for the opportunity to find you and I will be staying this franchise of hotels again!! I love it here!!
Manager Response: Dear Christina G,  We appreciate the vital feedback and your stay here in Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very fortunate to have great employees such as Alex Henry to provide that level of service we expect.   Please come back and visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa was decent.  The rooms were awkward, but very clean, no bugs!  Parking was $10 per night (free wifi) and the building was quiet.  For the price, this place was worth it.  There is a coffee maker (in a closet?) and a rainfall shower head in the bathroom.  The hotel bar has awesome (though overpriced) food and decent happy hour.  This hotel seems to cater to airline employees and large groups.  We chose the location as it is equidistant to the beach and Disneyland.  Traffic was light and the commute was quick.
Manager Response: Dear i_like_it_clean_73,  We thank you for your recent visit to our property.  The vital feedback is greatly appreciated regarding the value for the accommodations.    Please stop by the next time you are in town.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I visited this hotel on a recent trip to Orange County.  I found this hotel to be exceptional both in appearance and in their staff.  I especially want to mention two people, Betza and Giovanna.  Both of these two ladies are extremely friendly and anxious to help when I needed them.  I highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting a hotel that appreciates their guests and where the staff is always ready to assist in whatever the guests desire.
Manager Response: Dear Jim30122,  We are very happy to have hosted you hear at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Thank you for your kind comments regarding the exceptional service you received by our staff including Giovanna and Betza.     We hope to see you again whenever you find yourself in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great accommodations and amenities, but the staff, at all levels, are very attentive to their guests.  This morning, and yesterday morning, the fabulous fresh real food breakfast buffet was very busy.  Servers and all buffet staff were gracious, efficient and timely with coffee as well as the refilling of the buffet service. Tables were cleared quickly, the coffee flowed and the guests were well served. Excellent breakfast staff, cheerful and attentive even under pressure! Awesome fresh food!!!!!mmmm!
Manager Response: Dear Arlinerm,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  The kind comments regarding our courteous staff are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to hosting you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Almost a good hotel but missed too many marks.
Summary: This hotel is missing  something. The location is ok, service is not so great and the rooms are set up in a very awkward  way, with closets being next to the bathroom boor and the door to the room, three doors all open outward  and bang into each  other . The coffee maker is placed inside the closet which i didnt see, but you have to take it out and use it in the bathroom, no mirrors in the room but one in the closet, rooms on the first floor facing  parking  lot  made me feel exposed. My friend came with me to drop me off and had his dog with him, so they charged me $30 pet fee, even though he was there for an hour. The rooms are nicely appointed  and clean, the location  is great near south coast  plaza and short drive to lots of attractions.Restaurant  has a very boring menu
Manager Response: Dear Tamim A,  We appreciate you stopping by to visit and for the vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry to hear our hotel did not meet your expectations.    We wish you very well on your travels in the area.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel is convenient to the John Wayne Airport (SNA), shopping, businesses, etc.  It is also OLD, and our room, while "nice-ish" was dated.  Waited to check in for about 10 minutes before the attendant came out from the back office.  Sounded like she was on a personal phone call.  I realize it was midnight, but pay attention to your job - it is why you are there.  Didn't partake of drinking or dining on facility.    Most of the parking is in the back, and you walk through a lot of dark to get to the hotel entrance.  Made my partner very uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Dear David151,  Thank you very much for the recent visit to our property.  We appreciate the vital feedback provided.  We hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,   Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My recent stay at the Costa Mesa Crowne Plaza was great. Other than one grumpy guy who was pretty awful, every other member of staff were lovely, friendly and helpful. The room was spacious and overlooked the pool, which was nice. The TV signal was clear but the choice wasn't brilliant. The coffee machine was easy to use (some biscuits would have been nice) and the bathroom was nice and clean. The pool looked nice but was very chilly. I had a tasty breakfast every day in the Fireside Tavern, the hotel restaurant, of avocado and bacon omelette, which was delicious. The decaf coffee was good too. I had a few other meals there that were pretty good but I felt slightly overpriced unless you ate during Happy Hour (5-7pm or 9-10pm). There's a Mc Donalds right next door and just across
Manager Response: Dear LCRw,  Thank you so much for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the spacious rooms and do apologize for the challenging staff member.   We hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: My hunny and I stayed at this location while we were house hunting in the surrounding area so we were in bed early and up early each day.  The breakfast buffet (which isn't free) is delicious, fresh and had healthy options of fruit or eggs with spinach and tomatoes.  Its worth choosing to eat at the hotel rather than looking elsewhere.  Staff are friendly and very helpful.  If i had one negative thing to say would be that the shower leaked all over the bathroom floor and our toilet flushed so loudly and intensely we made a "no flushing at night rule" so as not to wake each other up for late night bathroom breaks.
Manager Response: Dear Mdiabo,  Thank you very much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate the vital feedback and nice comments on breakfast.   We would like to welcome you back whenever you find yourself in the area once again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was a very clean and fancy and elegant hotel. The rooms was very comfortably and the cleaning service was good. The front desk staff was very helpful.    The morning breakfast was excellent.    But their workout room is too small; only one treadmill doesn't make much sense.
Manager Response: Dear Rumifan,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We appreciate your kind remarks regarding the comfortable and clean rooms.    Please know we will be upgrading our fitness area soon and will be adding another treadmill.  We hope to welcome you back again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: The best all around hotel ever !
Summary: This hotel was phenomenal, a word I never have used before in a review. Everyone we dealt with was  a part of giving us a totally wonderful experience. We were there at a high school reunion and from the moment I walked in the door everyone made me feel welcome. The people who set up the reunion said that everyone they dealt with helped to make it a great experience without going over budget. At dinner time, Erik, the restaurant manager and Annamarie, the server, made every meal special. Everyone I came in contact with, from the people who straightened the room to employees I ran into in the halls were so nice and helpful.The hotels I've stayed at  in Chicago could take a lesson from this place.
Manager Response: Dear Garyratik,  Thank you so much for your kind comments and your patronage of the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are very glad to know everyone who was part of your group enjoyed their time with us.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Nice older hotel, looks more like a Holiday Inn than a Crowne Plaza.  People are very nice, breakfast food and service way above average quality.   The room had a major problem, a big leak under the shower door.  This is easily fixable.  Also it would be very nice to be able to open the window a few inches so that the really annoying air con unit could be turned off.  Slow elevators.   I would stay again at the right price.
Manager Response: Dear Rbertolott,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We glad the breakfast and guest service was about average quality.  We are sorry to hear you did face some challenges with your shower door while staying.   We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT FOOD, CUSTOMER SERVICE, SMELLY MEETING ROOM
Summary: The food  was great. The staff very knowledgeable, helpful and attentive.  The room we met in though was less than stellar. It was dark and smelled like mildew and I felt that the carpet was damp.  Beautiful suites and standard rooms.  Convenient shuttle from to the airport.  Excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Ivbp68,  Thank you so much for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza, Costa Mesa.  We are glad to hear that the staff was helpful and attentive.  Please accept our apologies regarding the challenges you faced with the carpet.   Please feel free to contact me with any other questions or to book a future reservation at 714 557 3000.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Room was a bit small.   I was expecting a microwave and fridge,  but they were absent. Nice  k-cup coffee maker though . Rates were good for 1 night stay(Saturday).  Non smoking hotel, but could tell people were smoking in the elevators. Besides the smoke smell  would go back again. Convenient and right off the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Linda S,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  We are very glad you enjoyed the convenient location and good rate.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We just want to thank everyone at the Crowne Plaza CM for making three Visitors from England (UK) feel so welcome. Total service, great food, lovely room and a relaxed atmosphere. we will be back soon. Special thanks to Javier,Kelli,Carmela and the Bar team for making us so welcome and for being so nice to our little girl Isobel.
Manager Response: Dear A Trip Advisor Member,  Thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa and the vital feedback provided.  We are glad to know our staff members made you feel welcome.  We hope to see you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: From the time you check in they are dedicated to service
Summary: I travel ALOT for business.  This week I am in California.  I can tell the well trained staff at hotels by how I am greeted.  This hotel does an EXCELLENT job at taking care of their guests.  I checked in with Alex who took the time to ask how my day was going and was genuinely concerned.    The bar and dining room are exceptional. The food is excellent and the service is fantastic.  Kristian, who works as your friendly neighborhood bartender stands out as going the extra mile to help out guests.  This is important to your business traveler.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff K,  Thank you for your kind comments regarding our staff members and the great service provided.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa in the near future.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed for a one night getaway about a week ago. Aldo at the FD was very nice and was able to get us a nice upgraded room. We appreciated that and would have loved the room if it didn't have a giant white stain in the middle of the sofa. After seeing that we were a little apprehensive about the cleanliness of the rest of the room we stayed in. Besides that and some mold in the shower, the rest looked clean but we stayed clear of the sofa for sure. Our favorite part of the entire stay was the restaurant, Fireside Tavern. We loved the cocktails, friendly service and food and overall had a great experience there. Would probably not go back and stay at this property in the future, but would definitely dine with them again!
Manager Response: Dear callmecali310,  Your vital feedback and patronage is greatly appreciated.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenging time you faced while staying with us.   Please feel free to contact me with any further questions and/or concerns.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager 714 557 3000

Summary: Check in is in quick and they have luggage carts. Standard rooms here are on the smaller side but well appointed, I thought the aroma therapy kit was a nice touch. Rooms don't have fridges but they make up for this with an ice delivery service free of charge. Decent TV and channel selection. Bathroom was clean and the shower is nice but a little difficult to work. Bed was comfy and had plenty of fluffy pillows. Pool/jacuzzi area is inviting and maintained. Plus they have cabanas! Restaurant area was nice and they appeared to have good food. They also have a small patio with a fire pit to sit around. As other guests have stated even when the heating is on it will turn on the ac after awhile making the room cool and drafty. Property could use a new bigger elevator. Plus I also
Manager Response: Dear HotelGuruGirl,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  Your kind remarks regarding staff and food are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel when in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had one night here as we had an early morning flight. The hotel is ideally located for John Wayne Airport and the shuttle buses leave every half hour from the hotel, but be aware you must book as they do fill up. Checkin was friendly and stays was recognised, there may even have been an upgrade but I cannot recall. The hotels decor is smart and contemporary and this is not just reflected in the lobby but also in the rooms. My room had two queen beds a desk and a chair with a footstool. There was also bench at the foot of each bed which in my view was superfluous and simply took up space. The rooms were comfortable and clean and the beds was also comfortable. The bathroom is small but functional with a great shower and small tub. The plumbing was odd and the flush on the WC
Manager Response: Dear Binman62,  Thank you so much for the recent visit and the vital feedback.  We are glad you had a pleasant experience with the friendly check in staff.  We do apologize the hotel did not meet your expectations with the structure of the building and poor sleep quality.  We hope to provide a different experience to you if you are ever in the area once again.  Please contact me with any further questions and/or concerns.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Unfortunately, I have experienced a horrible welcoming from one of your workers , a reception worker named Aldo  I would like you to take a minute and hear what happened , as I am EXTREMELY upset with his behavior .  First off , I booked the room via PRICELINE , I know that booking a room via a third party isn't as "exclusive" as going on your site and booking , yet when I used this service in the past in other hotels it was a great experience. Not this time.  After booking I have called the hotel , telling this mister Aldo that I will be checking in between 6-7 pm ... Also have kindly asked that if there is any wiggle room to upgrade my room it will be fantastic since this will be a big night for me ( I chose your hotel to be one where I propose marriage to my girlfriend ) He
Manager Response: Dear avi_ed1212,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are both embarrassed and extremely sorry for the lack of empathy and that you felt blown off by our staff. We pride ourselves on excellent guest service and the friendless of the staff, so we are truly sorry you did not receive either of those things.   I would love the opportunity to speak with you in person regarding the experience you had during your stay and to make it right for you. Please contact the hotel at your earliest convenience, 714.557.3000 and ask for Kelli.    Once again, please accept our sincere apologies for the unprofessional experience you had at our property.     Warm regards,   Kelli H.   Front Office Manager

Summary: Our family was in town for a funeral.  There were 9 staying in the hotel as guests and an additional 7 who joined us for several meals.  The front desk was attentive to all of our various needs, including guests who were elderly and disabled.  What made our stay so amazing was the wait staff in the restaurant.  For breakfast Imelda Rodriguez was our waitress both mornings we were at the hotel.  We constantly had people coming and going throughout the entire meal, with various rooms being served at any given time.  She handled our requests with grace and patience.  The star of our stay was the evening restaurant manager, Erik Meister.  Once again, we were somewhere between 6 and 16 people at any time, sometimes coming and going within the same meal.  We ordered our meals at
Manager Response: Dear Margaret L,  We are very grateful for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Thank you for the feedback regarding the attentive staff and I am glad we were able to make your stay comfortable given the circumstances of your visit.   We would hope to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future.  Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions and/or to book your next visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager  714 557 3000

Summary: Staff are friendly and helpful. The location is also good, it's close to SNA airport. Only one thing I am a little bit disappointed is my room is facing a main street and pretty noisy becaus of traffics.
Manager Response: Dear Jim W,  We appreciate your recent visit and vital feedback.  We are sorry you were not satisfied with the room location.  We would be very happy to welcome you back and place you in a quite room away from traffic noise, if you find yourself in the area once again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is not the best one for look and fashion, old furniture - dark color -  but surprisingly it is a friendly one. We arrive late and were welcomed by a friendly receptionist, they try to accommodate your need (restaurant including), but the hotel need a serious make over in term of look.
Manager Response: Dear lolotte17000,  Thank you very much for your recent visit.  We are very happy you were welcomed by a friendly face.  We are very sorry to hear the hotels appearance fell short of your expectations.    We hope to be able to welcome you back if you ever find yourself in the area once again.  Please contact me personally with any questions and/or concerns at 714 557 3000.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This Crowne Plaza is located in a great location just off the freeway and within walking distance to many great locations, such as the South Coast Plaza shopping mall and Mitsuwa marketplace. Our stay here was quiet and the room was very clean and looked better than other IHG properties that I have been in. The rates were very reasonable and we had no problem finding parking as well! I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Caesarspal,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  Its great to know you took advantage of the central location and enjoyed the quite room.  We hope to see you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here, for my vacation, the hotel location is quiet good, It is very close to the main shopping center of Costa Mesa, I had breakfast a couple of times in the hotel buffet. The waitress Imelda Rodriguez gave me exceptional service. The hotel and their staff gave me excellent attention throughout my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Glow G,   Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We appreciate your vital feedback regarding the central location and exceptional service of our staff.  We hope to see you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great customer service, very clean hotel
Summary: My husband and I had a great weekend staying at this Crowne Plaza while attending a wedding in Orange County.  The staff were all so very accommodating and helpful, especially Imelda who waited on us during breakfast and Eric who treated us like family in the bar.  The hotel is easy on-and-off the 405 freeway, which made all our commuting a lot easier.
Manager Response: Dear Stacy W,   Thank you for taking the time to leave your kind comments regarding our staff members.  We appreciate you stopping to visit, we will be happy to welcome you back whenever you are in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: An average Property, but a Great Staff
Summary: When we recently scheduled a trip to Orange County on short notice, we were unable to book a room in any of our usual choices due to the major convention that was in town.  After reviewing several on line choices of the remaining hotels with availability we chose the Crown Plaza.  Once we arrived, it became clear that the hotel is a bit long in the tooth.  It isn't bad really, just below what I would expect for a 3.5 to 4.0 star property.  The rooms are comfortable, but there are simply issues like leaky windows and less than sound proof walls.  That's the bad news.  The good news is the service from the staff is fantastic.  They simply did everything one could ask to help make our stay as pleasant as possible.  Keli at the front desk was especially friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Russ,  Thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are glad to hear the staff really made your stay.  We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not met when it came to the accommodations.   We hope to welcome you again.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was our fourth visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa. We have been impressed each visit with the friendliness of the staff from the front desk to the restaurant/bar. In addition, the rooms are always extremely clean and comfortable!!  I get a great night's sleep in that bed with those fluffy pillows!!  On this particular visit, we were there for a family emergency and did not know how long we would need to stay. The front desk managers, Michael and Giovanna were so helpful and sensitive to our needs, I can't say enough about how much that meant to us. Then, there was Erick who we first met years ago when he was a server. He is now a Restaurant Manager and someone so kind and caring that I would not hesitate to call him a friend. The people at the Crowne Plaza are among

Summary Heading: Fabulous Customer Service and Great Food
Summary: We stayed at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa for 6 nights, and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. We were especially welcomed by our waitress, Imelda Rodriguez, who took wonderful care of us, most notably while taking food out to us by the pool. The only complaint we had was not having a mini fridge in our hotel room, as we like to keep milk around at all times for our children.

Briefly, remodeled MOTEL property. Attractive lobby Friendly helpful front desk experience Rooms are large but dark and cold. They are decorated in shades  of black and grey.  Desk chair very ergonomic. Room furniture stiff and uninviting even thought appeared to be upholstered leather. Restaurant - Food was tasty and prices reasonable. Restaurant Service - Two female servers were pleasant but did not smile once throughout my stay. Did not like cumbersome shower bath combo. No shower illumination. Bathrooms had cold austere feel. They were clean Excellent shuttle service to performing arts venues and restaurants. Big plus.
Manager Response: Dear Stephan P,  Thank you very much for your recent visit.  We are very happy you enjoyed the friendly front desk staff and furniture.  I do apologize for the challenging time in restaurant.   We hope to welcome you back to the hotel when you are in the area.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is well located to all that the OC has to offer. Close to shopping centres, beaches and easy to get to from the freeway. Love this hotel as it is a low rise building and comes complete with complimentary on-site parking. The rooms are faultless with all the amenities you need. The hotel has a great outdoor pool and spa area with plenty of room to relax in the California sun. The restaurant and bar is brilliant - I ate here each night and found the menu to have something for everyone and the staff here are very friendly and helpful. This is my second stay at this hotel and I loved it. I would choose this hotel every time if back in the OC.

Summary Heading: Great nights rest and good quality spot
Summary: Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa is in a great central spot for excursions in Orange County. The hotel offers easy parking for a 10$ fee.  There are good amenities if you are hanging out at the hotel. A nice gym and a good pool area for sunny days. There is an onsite restaurant and bar that we didn't get to try but it looked good.   The rooms come with Kcup machines and good quality sundries. No qtips! Beds are very comfy with good sized pillows. We will be back. This seems to be a business friendly hotel. Many large companies nearby and the South Coast Plaza.
Manager Response: Dear zkrscasa,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We appreciate your vital feedback and we are very happy you enjoyed the local amenities.  We hope to see you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Older hotel facilities at a great location
Summary: I give this place 3.5 stars. I understand that options are limited in the area. However, we were disappointed by the older hotel facilities. Lobby area is really sparkly nice and service pleasant. Things change as you get on the elevator. Elevator itself very small, buttons worn and faded. The building smells and looks old. As you walk down the dark hallways, you can't help but have a bad feeling about the room. The Executive King room has a tiny little bathroom with no ventilation. Bathroom door constantly closes on itself making it harder to air it out after showers. Bathroom wallpapers are slightly stained and tired, as well as the outlets, light switches and furniture (Except the bed. It is new and pristine). Although the TV channels are great, cable connection is unstable.
Manager Response: Dear tifw,  Thank you so much for the recent visit and the vital feedback provided.  We are very happy to hear of the pleasant time you had here and appreciation for the central location.  We are currently in the process of making vital upgrades to the property which will add to the great amenities currently provided.   We look forward to welcoming you back to the area if you should find yourself in the area once again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager 714 557 3000

Summary: I've stayed at the Crowne Plaza on many occasions, everyone is great and very welcoming. Aldo and Alex in the front are amazing, they are super friendly and have a great sense of humor. Sometimes, I've had minor issues with my rooms but they're always been great. Imelda in the restaurant is fantastic. She's the best server they have. Always multitasking and always catering to my customized orders. She makes breakfast a great experience every morning.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy K,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your kind comments regarding our staff.  We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel, we will be happy to welcome you back whenever you are in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing Service! I wish I had everyone's name to add here. You were all outstanding!
Summary: Business trip, several people in our group stayed here. Enjoyed the breakfast buffet, lunch and happy hour. All were pretty fabulous! But, the service was amazing! Each server took time to ensure I/we were taken care of.  I have stayed at many upscale 5 star hotels and I must say, the service here beat those hotels by far! I would definitely return and recommend.
Manager Response: Dear MissymeCalifornia,  Thank you so much for your recent visit.  We appreciate your vital feedback regarding the restaurant and we are very happy you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again soon.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Rachel, Christian and Keli provided great  help and service while we stayed. The hotel was very nice and clean. We used shuttle service to restaurant and the driver was very pleasant and helpful to take us wherever we wished to go!
Manager Response: Dear Jane410,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your kind comments regarding our staff.  We appreciate you stopping to visit, we will be happy to welcome you back whenever you are in the area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Our fourth great stay here in the last 6 months. It starts with Alex Henry at the front desk who is always professional, helpful and accommodating and continues with a great room, great restaurant staff and a perfect location close to John Wayne, shopping and Newport Beach. Thank you.

I just got back from my overnight trip at the Crowne Plaza. Scored a BARGAIN rate ($108) so my boyfriend and i decided to have a bit of a mini staycation.  Pros: - Very friendly reception - Close to the camp/the lab/south coast plaza - Nice room  Cons: - Pay parking (tip: if you park on a side street off Paularino Avenue, you can park all day for free. Only a 5 min walk around the corner) - Weird smell - Basic buffet. Luckily, we got it for free. Otherwise it wouldn't have been worth $17 each.  Overall I would say it was ok. I'm glad I got a special, because during the week it's close to $200 and not really worth it. It's a hotel more suited to business people needing somewhere to rest their head before a flight out from John Wayne or the like.
Manager Response: Dear NickyFM,  Thank you for the recent stay and feedback provided.  We are happy you enjoyed your visit.    Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is in an excellent location. I was able to walk to everything.  The room was nice and staff was great. My second day there the elevator was out of service so it was a bit inconvenient. I put out empty tray in hallway and it stayed there for almost 24 hours. Overall it was an ok experience, but considering the price I'm not sure it was worth the value
Manager Response: Dear A Trip Advisor Member,  Thank you for the recent trip to Costa Mesa and the valuable feedback provided.  We do apologize for the challenges faced during your stay and please know the elevator is now in working condition.  We will be using this post as a vital training tool for our staff.  Please let me know if you are ever back in the area as we would be happy to welcome you back to our property.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I arrived late at night, tired and pregnant (!), and the front desk staff (specifically Aldo) was extremely accommodating to find me an extra quiet room and help me put my luggage there. The bed was also extremely comfortable. Overall the hotel is a great value for the price and I would definitely stay here again.

We were looking for a perfect getaway in Orange County from LA and found Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa to be ideal! We had a late check in and early morning check out - the staff was very professional and efficient to get us on our way. Room service was fast both times and I recommend their menu...they have one of the best restaurants in Costa Mesa. Our suite was top notch! Definitely a step above your average stay anywhere. I especially liked the temperature ranges on the shower and spacious bathroom. The hotel is conveniently off the 405 and there is a huge shopping center on the other side of the freeway where we got to enjoy some retail therapy. I recommend this hotel if you're staying in or around Costa Mesa and looking for something lo-key. They seemed to have quite a few

I won't stay here again due to the fact of poor management. In short I was charged for the room I cancelled when I made reservations but was never informed & management apparently didn't want to talk to me when I called about it.
Manager Response: Dear Snoelle2,  Thank you very much for the recent visit to our property.  We do apologize for the challenge you had with the cancelling of the reservation.  We would very much appreciate the opportunity to amend any charges that shouldn‚Äôt have been made.  Please call me directly at 714 557 3000 with any questions on your billing.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly and helpful staff -- the best part of this hotel
Summary: We spent 3 nights there just before Christmas.  We are members of their IHG rewards program and were given a top floor room at no additional cost.  The room was ordinary but comfortable and the bathroom was very good.  A microwave oven and a refrigerator would have been nice -- if they were supplied we didn't find them.  We ate breakfast in their dining room each day and that was the highlight of the hotel.  The buffet was very good, they would prepare eggs any way we wanted as part of the buffet, and the service was outstanding.  On two days Imelda was our server and couldn't have done better.  I've forgotten the name of the server on the third day but she was also friendly, helpful, and very pleasant.    One thing worth mentioning -- our GPS (Garmin, current map) didn't know

It was a good hotel, we had an issue that was resolved. Pool area is amazing and valet was a plus. There was a $36 dollar fee per day because it was a disney area and that included wifi. The coffee was good and the reception area was beautiful and very large. I would stay here again. Target was across the street, which was very convenient for last minute things we needed.

Summary Heading: Nice meeting place! Staff was Awesome!!!
Summary: This hotel was the choice for our real estate group to meet.  The rooms provided for a comfortable sleep time.  There was a restaurant lounge area right off the lobby.  Food was good and the staff was even better.  Imelda Rodriguez, our hostess and waitress, was so nice and hospitable that she deserves to be positively recognized.  She took great care of us and made us feel very welcomed as if she was taking care of long-time family members.  I hope hotel management realizes what a jewel they have in Imelda!  Having such nice people employed at the hotel always make the business trips that much nicer!  We'll definitely stay here when we are in the OC again.  Thanks Imelda for taking such great care of us!

This hotel reminds me of the way all hotels used to be back before the glut of economy brands like Hampton, Holiday Inn Express and Fairfield.  Although its not a high rise, its nicely appointed and has friendly and helpful staff.  The rooms are very comfortable and inviting, and even though the furnishings aren't the latest art deco, it still looks great. The bar is off the lobby and outside there is a beautiful seating area complete with a number of fire pits to keep you toasty on those chilly nights. Plenty of parking it seems but I was annoyed by the $10 a day parking fee.   I recommend this hotel.... I certainly will be back!

We stayed overnight at this hotel last weekend so we could focus on our Christmas shopping at South Coast Plaza for two consecutive days.  We did the same thing last  year and since we had a very positive experience then, we decided to stay there again.  It was extremely easy to get off the 405, park the car, get settled in our comfortable and clean room, then hop to the mall.  We could have walked but took the car because we knew we would be carrying shopping bags on the way back.  All in all, a very nice and quick stay which was exactly what we needed and wanted!

Summary Heading: Rooms need new heating and cooling system
Summary: The air conditioner ran continously. It was cold and we turned heat up to 75 degrees. As soon as the thermostat reached 75 degrees, the heater shut off and the air conditioner automatically started blowing cold air. Even turning off the thermostat did not help. Up all night freezing with air conditioner running and my attempts to keep heater on. The carpeting was ragggety and old.  Room was only so so. No microwave or refrigerator. If this is the high end of priority club hotels, it needs to be remodeled or sold to a lower end hotel company. Definately not worth the price. Staff however was great!
Manager Response: Dear Mmorn1,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your vital feedback in regards to your stay.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenging time you had with heater.  We would have appreciated the opportunity to fix your heater while you were here, however we will definitely make sure our heaters are in working order.   Please stay tuned next year as we will be making some upgrades to our carpet which has not fared as well as we hoped it would've.  The comments regarding the staff are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit.  Warm Regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Stylish and comfortable, internet not perfect
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located, the interior is nice, the personnel is very helpful and polite, my room was convenient, clean and spacious. Few points could be improved: internet quality (at least in my room on 3rd floor), buffet breakfast is all-the-same each morning, and $10 for parking seem a bit unjustified considering the location. But still I do recommend this hotel for business stay in Orange county.

After a miserable stay at the SFO Crowne Plaza I had the opposite experience here.  EVERYTHING was great:  staff, food, room, a/c, room service.   I was getting ready to leave IHG as my major chain but now I am reconsidering.  Thanks to the wonderful staff at this property.

Room was very nice. Awesome shower. Staff very courteous. Promptly recovered an item left behind. Only complaint was the elevator was whacko. It would go to my floor bang around a bit then go back to first floor and leave door closed. I complained about it but it was not fixed during my stay. Normally wouldn't complain about two flights, but I have bad knee.

My first visit while on a business trip. It is a first class property with excellent service, rooms, food and amenities. I was there for three days and was very satisfied. I will stay there on my next visit to the area. The fitness area was excellent. Plenty of new equipment for both weights and aerobic exercise. Room service, which I used three times, was fast, arrived with food still hot and each item I ordered was cooked perfectly. Room service and restaurant prices were on the high side but not outrageous.

It wasn't awful, but it really wasn't great and up to the standard of Crowne Plaza. Elevator was out of order and the area was tacky. On the upside, the breakfast buffet is nice, but I'd stay somewhere else next time.
Manager Response: Dear CTopher81,  Thank you very much for your recent stay and vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry the hotel did not meet your expectations and for the malfunctioning elevator.    We are glad the breakfast was a highlight during your trip.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel if you should find yourself in the area once again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best Hotel Stay I have ever had
Summary: I spent two weeks here for work and this basically became my home away from home. The staff here are SO AWESOME!! Carmela, Abel, Jason, Sebastian, Cheyenne. There are many others that made my stay great from housekeepers to the restaurant staff to the stellar front desk. They all operate as if you are a guest at the Ritz or Four Seasons-really top notch service and people. The hotel is very nice, clean rooms, great buffet breakfast. A nice happy hour in the afternoons and beautiful courtyard. Beds and pillows are uber comfortable and there is a shuttle to take you where ever you want to go. I would return in a heartbeat

Pluses for this hotel are the friendliness of the staff and the location. Our room was adequate and quiet although we did miss a refrigerator. It was clean and the bathroom was nice.  We didn't miss the tub but did note that the door jambs needed painting near the floor and wall paper was starting to peel in some places in the room.  We appreciated the use of the shuttle to go to a nearby restaurant where parking was limited. We did have trouble adjusting the air but a call to the front desk resulted in maintenance appearing shortly thereafter and it was just a matter of controls.  The grounds were nice but it was too cool to use the pool.

DON'T BE FOOLED BY RATINGS (feedback)...I decided to give hotel another chance only because of the great rate at the time of booking.  BIG MISTAKE.  I travel about 60% of the time (Eleven states.  Plat. IHG), and was here for five nights this month (Nov).  When checking in, I told Alex (front desk) that prior experience was not good, and to please help make stay better.  Didn't happen, as I personally showed him how incredibly disgusting room was.  (1) Sheets were clearly stained looking, and had a black/small hair on it, (2) the door hanger ("Please don't disturbed) & TV channel sheet were torn, and/or filthy, and overall, the ("Executive Wing") rooms are dark and dirty looking (rugs/couches worn, towels dingy, etc.).  Alex was great in doing what he could to improve situation
Manager Response: Dear choward114,  Thank you very much for your recent stay and the vital feedback provided.  We are very sorry for the challenging experience you faced during your stay.    The information provided will be used as training tool for our staff as we strive to provide our guests with the best experience possible.  We would very much appreciate the opportunity to speak to you  at your earliest convenience.   Please feel free to contact me at 714 557 3000.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A home away from home (for work)
Summary: We stay at the Costa Mesa Crowne Plaza regularly with work. There is always a familiar face to welcome you - Javier and Giovanna welcomed us with a big smile and warm reception. Rooms a quiet and comfortable and free wifi so handy

I am currently staying at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.....I travel over 200 nights per year. It is rare for me to find something special....but i have here this week. The hotel is very comfortable, the people have been great. The menu was great. I do need to single out one person, Carmella. She served me in the restaurant. Her service was only outweighed by her personality. Every hotel needs a Carmella.

Summary Heading: The most disgrace of the Crowne Plaza Brand
Summary: I am a Platinum member with IHG since 2005.  It was certainly my big mistake to make that decision to stay in this motel. Yes, it is a motel that charge your 4 stars price.  The 2 male staffs at the night/evening shift (I check in after 6PM) seems like they hate their job (or just hate me). They did not even smile or think that they look  "cool" and handsome when they do put any smile on their faces when checking in with their guests.  This is my normal requests that I need a room in a high floor and close to the elevator.  I also purchased the room with breakfast this time.  Guess what, none of these was taken care of!  I need to go back to the lobby and waited again for them to make it right.  Yes, I have to ask again for a room in high floor and close to the elevator.  I even
Manager Response: Dear Dr. Arthur M,  Thank you very much for your recent stay and conversation over the phone regarding your stay.  We are very sorry for the challenging time you faced during your visit.  The information provided is vital in our success as it will be used as a training tool for our staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel and as discussed please contact us before your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager 714 557 3000

Summary: Imelda was our server and made the visit quite special.  The food and service were both exceptionally good.  I highly recommend this place for any occasion.  We plan to go back as soon as possible.  As I said we highly recommend it!

Summary Heading: Centralized, relaxing and hotel with an Amazing staff
Summary: I chose this hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor.  I select most of my hotels from here and have never been let down.  My husband and I wanted a close getaway for our anniversary and chose Orange County.  This hotel is just down the street from South Coast Plaza, close to the beach and within a 2 mile radius of a variety of mom and pop and chain restaurants.  The hotel lobby and restaurant/bar are very inviting.  We were in room #403.  It is at the end of the hall from the elevator, which helped make it quiet.  The room was spacious, faced the pool and had a stand up shower.  Loved the shower, it has two rainfall shower heads.  The bathroom is spacious with a separate toilet room.  The only minor negative thing is the toilet roll holder was broken and cosmetically there

The restaurant is amazing, good food and wine. We arrived early and they allowed us to check into a room without a fee.  Hotel was clean and tasteful.  The one issue we had was quickly and appropriately handled. Our 3rd night a guest had brought in 2 small barking dogs the hotel moved us promptly to another wing of the hotel. Work out room and pool are very nice. Picture is of the duck fat fries.  Amazing!!

The hotel was a great location for this trip, 8-10 minutes from the OC Airport and 5-8 minutes to business location.  Jeanet (manager) was great and very personable.  Shane (server) was excellent. Michael (server) did well as did Michael at the front desk.

Summary Heading: A Semi-Precious Gem Tucked in Next to the 405
Summary: This hotel is an older property that has been updated.  I got my room from a well-known on-line service provider - I didn't really appreciate the fact my view was of a driveway, but I could live with it.  The room was remodeled nicely - my beef - doors to the armoire would not stay shut, the bathroom door would not stay open, and the placement of the armoire in connection to the bathroom was just wonky - awkward and weird.  The hotel does have free wi-fi, is close to South Coast Plaza and the Camp, the staff is super friendly.  I think the gym was very average - equipment not real stellar - but doable.  I probably would stay here again because everything was clean, the staff was nice, and it's a bit cheaper than some of the more luxury properties but competes well.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela P,  Thank you very much for your recent stay and feedback regarding our property.  We are glad you enjoyed the location and friendliness of the staff.   We hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay at a lot of hotels, I would have to say that this hotel is Excellent, The Staff are very nice and helpful, Rooms are very clean and tastefully decorated, the check inn staff were very accommodating. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Very nice, staff are wonderful and we received VIP treatment and received some upgrades that I was not expecting.  Rooms are upgraded and spacious, great shower !Many thanks to Jeanet, Betsa (sp?) and all the staff of the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa!

It was an excellent hotel for a meeting room. The room was clean and serviced with water. It was very nice to have it open to the pool. The hotel was very accommodating for a group not using the hotel room.

I would highly recommend this property! Property is inviting, clean and done in great taste! The suites are luxurious for one in this price range but most important the staff was exceptional!  A young lady named Giovanna went above and beyond helping us out and made all the difference ensuring an amazing stopover at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa, CA Almost all staff had great customer service skills that I am certain is a reflection of the front desk manager Jeanet Carlson who like Giovanna was amazing! I would like to thank both these amazing ladies for making us feel welcomed and make us feel special! I will most definitely be returning to this property for a much longer stay and telling all my friends about it!

I stay in a lot of hotels and this one was a pleasant surprise. Check-in staff (Sebastian) was helpful with a great attitude and was very welcoming after my 7-hour drive to get there. The room was well-appointed with the things I appreciate: good lighting, plenty of outlets to plug in my toys (love the ones in the bedside lights so my phone and tablet could stay close to the bed where I was working with my feet up), a stand-alone shower, and everything looked new and not worn out. I got a refrigerator upon request, which was much appreciated. I wear contact lenses so it aggravates me when the sink drain stoppers don't work well and most of them don't. This one did. A small thing but important to me. I only ate once in the restaurant, but when I did, the food was good and the
Manager Response: Dear Judy S,  Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Our hotel is aimed at making it easy for our business travelers when it comes to making your connections.  We hope to welcome you back in the future should you find yourself in the area once again.  Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions or comments.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager 714 557 3000

Summary Heading: The staff here are like family.
Summary: The difficulty of nailing me down to write a review underlines how impressive an impression this hotel and in particular it's staff has made on me.   Recently I checked out during a blackout in the area and the hotel staff were quickly visible and informative, guaranteeing my safety by lighting up the dark stairwells (lifts were out of order), knocking on my door to assure me of my wake-up call and carrying my cases down the stairwell.  Jeanet the Front Office Manager emailed me shortly after my departure to inform me that points accrued on this stay (as systems were down at check-out) were duly credited.  Thank you.  Apart from wonderful amenities, in particular a great restaurant and pool and locality to great places to eat and shop, the warmth and genuine manner in which I'm
Manager Response: Dear EliaAmosa,  We are very thankful for your continued patronage of our hotel and we are very fortunate to have great guests such as yourself that stay here.  We consider you part of our Crowne Plaza family and are glad you call this your home away from home.  As always we are here at your service and look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Gio at the front desk was amazing and helpful after we had a horrible experience at another hotel the night before.  The rooms were clean and beautiful.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone!  They let me do late checkout after we got stuck on the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Micki S,  Your resent visit to the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa is much appreciated.  We are so very glad to hear Gio assisted in making your stay a good one, she is a great asset to our team.    We hope to extend to  you the same amenities should you find yourself in the area once again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa while in Business in Orange County, its location is very convenient just off the highway, this Crowne Plaza offers what is expected from the brand, however, what makes the difference is the staff, they are friendly and very professional, haven't seen this service in any other Crowne Plaza.   Specially Cheyenne, Alex and Javier from the front desk and Anna from the room service.   Definitely an opportunity for improvement is the cardio equipment at the fitness center compared to other Crowne Plaza and the wifi speed.  Give it a try, you will see the difference.
Manager Response: Dear George C,  Thank you so much for the recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Your kind remarks are greatly appreciated as is your patronage.  We pride ourselves in providing great service, which makes us excited when our guests recognize it as well.   We are in the process of making upgrades to our fitness area towards the end of the year.  We hope that you we can welcome you back so that you may experience it.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel last minute for my friend's birthday. We arrived very late, check in was a breeze and the lady who was on duty was friendly and accommodating. They also made my friend special on her birthday by giving her a free parking pass (parking is normally $10 per vehicle...it's always the small things that counts). They also allowed us to use the grand piano in the lobby without hesitation even if it was already late at night. The only reason i'm giving them 4 stars and not 5 is because their rooms are very outdated (i don't know if this is true for all of their rooms). There was a TV, but the TV stand is just a small desk which only fits the TV and only the TV. There is a detached closet which looks very old school. I also find it weird that the coffee maker is
Manager Response: Dear Khalil R,  Your feedback and patronage is greatly appreciated.  We are glad your check in was seamless and efficient.   We hope to welcome you back to the hotel again soon.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: eh.. decent clean nothign special but solid staff
Summary: I did like the cleanliness and I got an upper level quiet room when I saw the intoxicated crows in the bar mid afternoon. I suggest top floor far from the elevators then your stay will be fine. The staff was great, nice room, clean and 4*, gym was not nice and elypticals were unusable but a nice treadmill if you get it before someone else does. They need to upgrade their wine list and gym. But the price was solid and if you need an essential 4* stay near john wayne airport and the price beats similar I would stay here. Shuttle to south coast plaza across the freeway. I am mixed on this one but if saving $ and I got a good deal i would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Eric L,  Thank you for your recent stay at our property.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be communicated to our staff and ownership.    If you ever find yourself back in the area we would look forward to hosting you again.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I arrived at the hotel to a busy front desk and was asked to come to a newly opened check-in station by Jeanet Carlson.  WOW does she understand customer service.  She was fun and lively while making me feel at home and appreciated.  She was simply outstanding!  I also want to say I have stayed at several Crowne Plaza‚Äôs while with IHG and I have never enjoyed my stay before staying at the Costa Mesa hotel.  The staff, every one of them, is extremely friendly and says hi, my pleasure, and thank you to you as you travel around the hotel property.  If I am ever back in the area this will be my hotel of choice.
Manager Response: Dear William M.   Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We are so very happy to hear of your pleasant visit.  We will be happy to be your hotel of choice, whenever you are down in the Costa Mesa area.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Besides the molding in the bathroom having mold and be warped. The shower had mildew in ever corner.  They double charged my credit card and the iron ruined three of my dress shirts.  I have stayed here for business several times and each time there were problems.  The wifi was so slow I could not even work in the room.  When I took these problems to the staff nothing ever was done about it,  they even acted like I was the problem.
Manager Response: Dear Scott B,  Thank you for your recent visit and continued patronage.  We are very sorry to hear of the challenges we have faced during your stay.  We are currently investigating the situation with our management team.  We would definitely like to hear more from you at your convenience please reach me at 714 557 3000.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay for a business trip
Summary: The staff were very attentive, breakfast was a great variety and quality, room was updated and very clean, hotel was quiet, amenities were all I needed.   Will definitely stay there again. A few staff members that were just outstanding were Javier, Imelda and Memo Huge thanks to them for making my stay that much better!
Manager Response: Dear Kristin C,  Thank you for your recent stay and kind comments regarding our staff.  We hope to host you again soon.  Please contact me with questions and/or comments before your next visit.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel had exceptional service. The people were super friendly and the rooms were exceptionally nice and clean. We had a great stay here. It was also nice that they had special service and attention for airline employees as we are certainly on the road a lot and special customer service makes our trips so much easier when we're gone for long stretches!

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, but they know how to screw your bill fantastically!
Summary: I stay here every other week for work (not by choice). Upon checking in last time they informed me that my credit card declined. Alarmed, I quickly opened my Citi app on my phone. Turns out there were multiple transactions being processed from the hotel from my previous trip. They had never closed out my previous ticket and were trying to bill me for $1700 instead of $550. I had to BATTLE with them on two occasions to get this resolved. The reply from the manager was that she did not know where the charges were from. She could not figure out how to remove them. I am still trying to get it resolved with no luck thus far. Really frustrated with them.
Manager Response: Dear Josh B.,  Thank you very much for your recent stay at our property.  We are very sorry for the challenges you faced during your stay.  We are currently investigating into the situation.  Please feel free to contact our accounting department with any other questions/concerns you may have at 714 557 3000.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager 714 557 3000

Summary: This hotel has been updated in the last couple of years. The staff is super friendly and nice. From check in to check out everyone treats you with a smile. The room was very nice and very clean.   The restaurant serves good food and there are fire pit things outside that are really nice at night.   The location is very close to the airport and they have a free shuttle with a friendly driver. It is also walking distance to restaurants and a big mall on the other side of the highway.  I would definitely stay again.

After a long drive, we were received by the warmest welcome and most efficient check-in by Michael and Karen at the reception!  The hotel lobby was as impressive as the room decor for this hotel level.  Very comfortable beds and clean well-kept room.  Exactly what we needed at 130am!    Thanks so much, Michael and Karen!!

The entire staff was outgoing friendly and very helpful. From the front desk staff to the restaurant staff( we especially appreciated Carmela who was kind and a hard worker-  we saw her bring water to a couples table who had a dog, such an incredible thoughtful gesture)
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisorMember,  Thank you for your recent visit to the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  We delighted to hear of the friendly and helpful staff that you encountered.  Your feedback is much appreciated.    We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient, extremely friendly but wearing & tearing
Summary: The location of Crowne Plaza is amazing for the O.C. area, 15 minutes from Newport Beach and with shopping & restaurants just down the road. The freeway is also just by the hotel adding no extra travel time to get on the freeway if going elsewhere around California. The staff was perfectly friendly and helpful, allowing us to check-out a little later than the usual 12pm. The only issue is the obvious wearing & tearing of the property, with cleanliness a bit borderline acceptable. I had a moment in my room where I stepped on something sticky with my bare feet that I did not know what it was, which worried me with the standards of house-keeping. The A/C also wouldn't turn off on our last night, which we did not make a huge fuss over at all seeing as we were leaving but believe it
Manager Response: Dear Elaine G,  Thank you so much for your recent stay at our property.  We are very glad that you enjoyed the location of the hotel and the friendliness of staff.  However, we are sorry to know of the challenges you faced during your visit.   The feedback provided will be used as a vital training tool as to ensure the standard of quality is maintained.  If you find yourself in the area again please contact me directly at 714 557 3000 to ensure your next visit is a memorable one.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I would probably give this hotel 3 1/2 stars.  It's better than average but not quite up to very good standards.  First the good.  The hotel is reasonably priced and generally attractive, the staff was excellent, the room was large and the bed was comfortable.  The location is convenient to Newport, South Coast Plaza, John Wayne Airport and Orange County locations in general.  The issues I have with the property are maintenance related.  The carpet in the hallway was stained and was very worn at a couple spots in our room.  Paint was peeling in the bathroom probably because there was essentially no ventilation in there.  There was a hole in the upholstery on the couch.  When we checked into our room the A/C wasn't working and it was very hot.  I called the front desk and they
Manager Response: Dear Dan C,  Thank you for your recent visit to our property.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed the comfort of your bed and excellent staff service.  Please accept our apologies for the hallway and furniture in your room.  Currently we are looking to make some renovations to our carpet as it did not last as long as we had hoped it would.   If you should find yourself back in the Orange County area please reach out to me personally at 714 557 3000 so that we can ensure your next stay be a memorable one.    Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: Booked this hotel for a one night business trip b/c of proximity to the airport, which was less than 3 miles away.  There is safe secure parking for $10/day.  Room service was prompt and they allowed me to check in 2 hours ahead of check in time since there was an available room.  There is a small 24 hour gym so if you need to get a quick workout in you can. Would definitely stay here again for work if I am back in the area for business

Our first stay at this property was most pleasant!! We stayed one night during the week and the staff really took great care of us. Aldo at the Front Desk was extremely accommodating and friendly! Our room was large & lovely, comfortable bed and awesome shower-head. Happy hour 5-7pm at the Fireside Tavern had great food & drink specials. Employee Carmela at the restaurant took excellent care of us and was a joy to talk to! We went back 9-11pm for more drink specials and we drank outside by the Infinity Fire Pit! Very romantic and quiet. The hotel was very quiet -- mostly professionals there for work. The outdoor pool was nice, it's lit at night with canopies and a large hot tub. Thanks for a great stay - we would definitely continue to use Crowne Plaza after that stay.

Sebastian was our go to person throughout our 2 day visit. Not only was he courteous and professional he gave us complimentary breakfast for the following morning. He upgraded our room for the 2 nights for free. We were guests of the bride to be with her entourage me, the mom of the bride who made the reservations had never stayed there before and was so glad we did. We were doing the bachelorette celebration at Disneyland that weekend. The room was spacious and even temperature. The lounge and outside seating at night was very nice to wind up the day and evening at Disneyland. There was an error on our bill but they corrected it immediately. Wonderful place to stay I would definitely stay again and recommend this hotel to others!!!!

One of human's most memorable impression is scent and it was not a good one as I walk down the hall to my room. It smelled like old spilled alcohol mixed with animal fur. It could also be the dirty dishes in the hallway. For some reason, there seem to always be dirty dishes near my room (116). Luckily the smell stops at the hallway.   My room was nicely furnished and the bathroom was updated. The other reviewers are right about the paint chips but overall it was not bad. Unfortunately, the room don't come standard with a mini fridge. I was told I can add one for $10/day so I skipped it.   I am very picky when it comes to beddings. The first thing I do before getting into a hotel bed is check for hair. None here! The bed and bedding was comfortable but don't expect fluffy down
Manager Response: Dear TravelBug4702,  Thank you very much for your recent stay at our property.  We also thank you for the vital information provided in your comment.  We are very sorry for the challenges you faced during your visit. Currently we investigating into the smell of the hallway and dishes left during your visit.    It pleases us to know you were satisfied with the cleanliness of the room and the quality of your meal.  We hope to welcome you back to our hotel should you find yourself in the area once again.  Please call me personally at 714 557 3000 if any questions and/or would like to book another room.   Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Guest Service Manager

Summary: I feel compelled to write this, having had an amazing 3 night stay. Great staff, who couldn't be more accommodating for our family,  the food was excellent and it was a they couldn't have done more for us after a long haul flight.

Summary Heading: My favorite IHG property!  The Crown Plaza - Costa Mesa is a Crown jewel!
Summary: Every time I've checked in to the Crown Plaza Costa Mesa I've been greeted with a smile and by name. Not only does the friendly staff go out of their way to make sure you're comfortable and happy with everything, they've actually made me feel like I was coming home (my second home)!  I grew up in Costa Mesa so that gives me a sentiment of joy to be welcomed back with such enthusiasm every time and treated so well by everybody.  The Rooms are clean, spacious and modern and the beds are very comfortable too. The Fireside Tavern (located beyond the lobby) is delicious and I enjoy having a full breakfast there after a good nights rest. I look forward to my next opportunity to stay at my favorite hotel in Orange County! A special shout out to Lori Puddester (Director of Sales) She
