For anyone traveling with a pooch, finding a hotel that is truly accommodating can be a challenge. My husband works in Costa Mesa regularly, and we have always stayed in this hotel. Before it was a Crowne Plaza, it was fine...a nice experience, but nothing that inspired me to write a glowing review.  Dog owners have access to lovely patches of grass located conveniently near their rooms. Waste bags are provided, which can really come in handy, and encouraged everyone to take care of the area. I also appreciated the little paw print hang tag for the door to alert the staff that my dog was inside. Dogs are also welcome in the outside lounge area off the dining room, which is fantastic. Smart, too, since the longer dog owners can hang out with their canines, the more money we'll

Summary Heading: Imelda Always Greets Us with A Smile!
Summary: Overall, the staff makes the Crown Plaza is a great place to stay. Imelda always took the time to make me feel like a friend and listen to my work stories. Thank You Imelda!  Much Love to all the Staff :-)

Summary Heading: Very pleasant Surprise, thanks to Samuel!!!
Summary: After a long day of travel, I was greeted with a smile from SAM!!! I was upgraded to a King Executive Room for being a Platinum Member which was very nice. The staff was just so personable and made you feel right at home. The whole hotel looks completely remodeled and the rooms were spacious and modern with unique touches. The king bed was very comfortable and the different choices of pillows were a plus. Whenever I'm in Orange County again I am for sure going to stay here, plus the restaurant (Fireside Tavern) was wonderful and very upscale. Also reasonable prices and they have happy hour two times a day. But what made everything great was just from the beginning with Sam greeting me and being so caring and professional. That always leaves a great impression. Thanks Sam and the

I don't get the opportunity to stay at local hotels much, but for a conference I got to stay at the beautiful Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa. Everything about this hotel, from the service and knowledge at the front desk, to the cheerful housekeepers, to the super cool restaurant exceeded all my expectations.  The rooms are super clean, beautifully decorated and the bed is the most comfortable hotel bed I've ever slept in. I made a call to the front desk at 9pm to ask for ice, and it literally took 1 1/2 minutes to be delivered to my room.  My meetings throughout the week included lunches and the super friendly and efficient banquet staff prepared a great buffet pool side. SO nice to get away from the meetings and sit by the pool for an hour. Oscar, our banquet manager was so friendly

Have stayed here several times now and have been well taken care of each time. The front desk is always helpful.  My husband and I are really enjoying the new restaurant and menu, especially the service.  Richard is Great and really takes time with all of us guests. I've also enjoyed being served by Cesar, Moises, and the others... You have a good group of employees which makes a great experience for your guests. Thanks,  Linda and Lloyd Farris

This hotel is my home away from home when I am in Orange County. Clean and spacious rooms, comfortable beds, free shuttle service.  The staff make it great, they offer great and friendly service, they remember your name and preferences after only one stay. Especially Cesar and Richard in the dining room, they are the best!

I've reviewed this hotel in the past and due to some changes, wanted to update my review.  I want to preface this by saying that I stay here almost every week and have done so for about 1 1/2 years,  While there have been changes at the front desk, the staff continues to provide top notch service.  I'd like to send huge thanks to Chris, Arturo, Imelda and everyone who works the 2nd shift during the week.  They make my home away from home delightful to the extent that they can.  While the rooms could use a little upgrading, they are clean, comfortable and nicely furnished.  The shower is arguably the best hotel shower ever!  Now to the negative.  They have recently renovated the restaurant and bar area, which, physically is an inviting and comfortable room.  They've added much

I recently stayed at this hotel and found the rooms quiet & spacious, staff very helpful and the restaurant which is brand new excellent both food & staff.  Less expensive then other major hotel chains across the street. Free shuttle to airport & shopping. What more can one ask for!

We decided to spend a good day in this nice hotel  in  Costa Mesa before the drive to La Jolla th√© following day for a conference my husband attended last month.  The first time we stayed in this hotel was last year and were charmed by the stylish and well-furnished spacious room,  with a big bathroom and assigned to us, consequently, opted to stay again in the same hotel this year.   Noticed the new extended  roof in front of the hotel's entrance - a good shade not only for hot days but also for wet season.  Room assigned to us this year is again a big well-furnished, stylish room. With a Keurig coffee-maker, my husband enjoyed his coffee-time very much.  Staff are very friendly and accomodating.  Breakfast buffet was ok, a bit of cooked food but as usual in most American

I arrived in the early evening and was disappointed to see the construction going on as they remodeled their restaurant area. They had tables set up around the lobby and were serving from a limited menu. The room I was assigned faced a busy street with road noise most of the night, coupled with a dog barking in the hallway. I was in Orange County for just one night, and one of the reasons I chose to stay at the Crowne Plaza was the complimentary airport shuttle. From the airport to the hotel the shuttle worked fine, but the following morning it was unavailable to guests needing a ride back to the airport so I had to hire a taxi. I'm a IHG Rewards Club member and really expected a better stay than that unfortunate experience.
Manager Response: Dear DelGregorio,  We are thankful for your recent stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa.  We are very sorry to hear that your stay was not up to your expectations.  We understand that renovations are not easy on our guests and may cause an inconvenience, for that we do apologize.  We are happy to announce renovations on the restaurant remodel have been completed and we would definitely like to welcome you back to enjoy it. We try best as possible to keep the shuttle available to everyone, though the hotel shuttle is open based upon availability and therefore does become busy during peak hours of travel.  We would love to welcome you back when in the area to ensure a more pleasurable time from every part of your hotel experience.  Please contact me with any further questions or when booking your room.  Warm regards,  Aldo Casanova Front Desk Supervisor 3131 Bristol St. Costa Mesa, CA 92626 714 557 3000 Direct 714 957 8185 Fax acasanova@cpcostamesa.com

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the hotel and the staff were very friendly and accommodating. The room was stylish with an extremely comfortable bed and the bathroom was spacious with an incredible rain shower! What a treat.  The hotel is situated in a great location if you have time to venture out. 1 minute drive to local cafes, 3 minute drive to the South Coast Plaza (incredible shops and restaurants) and half an hour drive to Newport Beach. Can't ask for more! There is also a pool and a newly refurbished restaurant.  We would stay again.

Front desk staff was very helpful.  Our room attendant, Lucero Molina did an excellent job.   Here for 2 nights with husband's professional organization.   Rooms are very clean and comfortable.   We both loved the shower! I missed a frig and hair dryer in the room.  I enjoyed the fitness center and pool while here.  Appreciated fast internet connection.

Javier Jaimes was awesome with his customer service.  I have owned 3 different businesses and so I know what customer service is.  He was outstanding and made us smile!  All the staff were great and friendly and helpful, but he really stood out to me.  Thanks for an awesome stay.

I experienced and great stay and friendly staff. Lucero Molina my room attendant was excellent at her job my room was very clean and the breakfast was a great start to my morning. I enjoyed the pool and palm trees at the pool side. The staff went out of their way everyday to insure our meetings were the best they could be. The snacks were great and they kept the water and juice flowing during our meetings.

Summary Heading: Never have I felt more at home
Summary: Was put up in this hotel for work. Two weeks in a hotel is not my idea of fun. But the customer service I experienced here was amazing. The staff was all so friendly and amazing, The manager Art was hands down fantastic upon checking Art, Imelda and Chris made us feel welcomed and right at home. The rooms were always cleaned and restocked, The pillows on the bed were amazing. My coworkers and I even joked about taking them with is. The hotel was redoing there bar/restaurant area but they made it work to where the guest where still comfortable. The bartender Ashley was by far my favorite person that worked there. She told us the best places to eat and visit.  Dinner was always severed by the best Richard and breakfast with Ceaser.

Amazing service and very friendly staff at the desk. Airport shuttle service was great, even asked if I need to stop and pick up anything for my stay. Valet parking was better than any others I have used. The only issue was the staff at the restaurant, slow service, not friendly and food was cold and looked like left overs. I would eat out, next time. Other than that, I will be staying again, central to highway and close to the beach.

Summary Heading: Top notch service and swanky decor
Summary: During my recent 8 day stay at the Crowne Plaza I found the staff very professional, friendly and helpful.  My room was very clean, the front desk staff was helpful with directions and coaching me on the use of the computers in the business center.I like the timeless yet a little swanky d√©cor of the lobby and rooms.  I plan to return soon.

Every time I come to Orange County on business I stay at the Crowne Plaza Orange County It is so centrally located for my needs and the rooms are very comfortable and very clean. Javier and Sam are my point people and they go over and above to help me every time.  They are the best of the best and greet me by my name when I arrive.  They are thoughtful and very resourceful and will go out of their way to help you and all your needs. Bravo

Summary Heading: Average stay, a little pricey for what you get.
Summary: Stayed for just one night on business. Convenient location, close to the highway and the staff was very pleasant. I had made a reservation a few days prior and called the day of check in to confirm. When I gave them my confirmation number I was told that my reservation was cancelled, (which I didn't do). Nonetheless, they had a room at the original price and I was good to go.   Bathroom was nice with a large shower (no tub) and good water pressure. The room was a good size, but both my wife and I thought the bed was pretty hard and uncomfortable. Average all the way.

GM Charles Haber has much to be proud of here ‚Äì his staff is excellent, including his very thoughtful assistant Lori Puddester.  Mr Haber solved an issue I had with the ‚ÄòNational Service Desk‚Äô ‚Äì and for that I started out liking him and his property.  Front Desk Service is fast, cheerful and efficient:  Arturo, Imelda, Elizabeth,Chris, Sam, Javier & Tiffany.  There are no complaints about the service and the facilities at this location.  Everyone here is well-trained to take the guest‚Äôs comfort into account before all else.  When I called in to report a lamp that didn‚Äôt work properly, it was fixed in a jiffy.    The property is not new, but it is well-tended.  Amenities are excellent, with all the things guests need for comfort.  And while the current restaurant lacks a full

Here for two weeks for a business trip and the Crowne Plaza made me feel at home.  So very friendly especially Richard in the dining room. He had complimentary cookies, fruit and bottled water sent to the rooms of all our team. Very clean, everywhere. Lovely lobby and pool area.  Well done Crowne Plaza.

Great rates for a great view, very central location to the best oc has to offer.  The staff was fabulous from the front desk offering drinks for birthday to the outstanding bartender Ashley. Will definitely return for another "daycation"

Ashley and Richard gave some of the best service that I have had in a long time at a hotel the were very attentive and very friendly. Through the whole dinner experience. The whole time I was down on there in the make shift restaurant the were two kids in the restaurant and Ashley and Richard took such good care of the kids through the whole night.

My latest trip out west found me staying at the Crown Plaza in Costa Mesa Ca. While the hotel was under going some renovations, the staff more than made up for it with their friendly welcoming attitudes. From the front desk, to the restaurant staff each individual was friendly and cheerful. The restaurant and Bar staff (Ashley) were an absolute pleasure. It's nice to see a friendly environment when traveling, when we so often get the cold, isolated routine.

Summary Heading: Home Away From Home-with Executive Flair
Summary: What a refreshing experience!  What a difference a quality hotel staff can make!  Visit this hotel and discover your Home Away From Home!  Travelling for work can be challenging.  Being away from the conveniences of home and the comforts of being with our family can make business trips even more of a struggle to function at full capacity professionally.  I travel for work one-third of the year and have experienced hundreds of hotels.  By far, the staff at the Crowne Plaza is fantastic, all the way around! Gratefully, because of the excellence in quality from the contemporary decor, to the perfectly weighted and textured bedding (perfectly comfortabIe!), to the wonderful staff, I am able to "fire on all cylinders" when staying at this hotel.  I am pleasantly and exceedingly

My family and I stayed at the Crowne, Costa Mesa.  I purchased an extra room for some members of my family and used some points from my rewards card (something that has thoroughly confused other hotels in the past).  Elizabeth was great; she was able to navigate the three different reservations I had and upgrade my room (due to IHG status).  The service was fantastic all around and the breakfast was great.  Nice pool area and a good bar/restaurant area.  This place was well worth the money (especially if you can take advantage of a rewards program).  Everything was great.

Summary Heading: An average experience but it did the trick
Summary: I really have nothing very negative to say about the Crowne Plaza hotel. My wife and I stayed a night over New Years eve. The bed was comfortable, the TV was big and the room was clean.  As I initially reached the front desk to discuss my reservation, the only man who was there, took a call. He didn't acknowledge us nor did he even say, "I'll be right with you."  This was a little off-putting as first impressions can usually set the bar for the staff. After he hung up, everything turned around and we actually exchanged some witty banter before he gave us the key to the room.  I won't explain why he did what he did as it has happened to us at other hotels/restaurants but he didn't charge us for the parking and he set us up with a fridge in the room, free of charge, to chill our
Manager Response: Dear Bmurf6873,   Thank you for your recent visit to our hotel.  We take your feedback regarding our hotel as a gift. We wish you a great new year and look forward to welcoming you back whenever in the area.   Warm regards,     Aldo Casanova Front Desk Supervisor 3131 Bristol St. Costa Mesa, CA 92626 714 557 3000 Direct 714 957 8185 Fax acasanova@cpcostamesa.com

Summary: The Crowne Plaza has become my temporary home after relocating for business from out of state.  The staff here has been outstanding.  They are always greeting you with a smile and they are very accommodating. Chris and everyone at the guest service desk are quick to help and when the work day is over, Ashley and the gang behind the bar always help create a nice relaxing and comfortable atmosphere to wind down.  I have not stayed here very long but I can tell that a place this great starts with great management, and trickles on down.  Kudos to the entire Crowne staff.  Thanks for everything!

We only stayed one night but this is a really nice hotel with friendly service and our room was beautiful and sooo clean! We were sorry we could not stay longer and check out the amenities and explore the surrounding area!

I've been staying at this hotel since the mid-90s and have seen it change owners and names numerous times.  We stay there at Christmas because family is nearby, and noticed several things that were different this visit, starting with a parking charge.  They have an enormous lot surrounding the hotel and a parking structure behind the hotel.  There are few guests at Christmas and there are usually about 30-50 cars in the lot.  They now are charging guests an extra $10 parking fee, whether you use the valet or you self-park (limited because they have roped off most of the lot for valet).  Next, when we get to our room, we discover they have removed all ice and vending machines from all floors except the main floor, a further inconvenience.  The room itself is okay but has extra
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Melinda M.,    Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and feedback provided. I do apologize that you do not approve of the parking charges at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa, which have been in effect since the first of the year. As always we try to remain competitive with the other hotels in Costa Mesa. We are very grateful and appreciate your past stays and hope that we may welcome you back to the hotel in the future.     Warm regards,    Aldo Casanova Front Desk Supervisor 3131 Bristol St. Costa Mesa, CA 92626 714 557 3000 Direct 714 957 8185 Fax acasanova@cpcostamesa.com

Summary: Our four day stay at the Crowne Plaza was just wonderful, great hotel and staff, room very clean and comfortable.   Special thanks to front desk staff Arturo and Imelda who we cannot say enough about them, and made us feel so at home and good sense of humor also Sam and Javier very courteous. Our room on the fifth floor was quiet and great view. Services at the restaurant  was excellent as was the food and their staff very courteous and prompt; Brenda, Ron, Richard were just great. We will definitely be back, we are making this hotel our second home when we visit from Nevada. After on the road two week vacation this was our last stop of all the hotels we stayed on our trip this was the best.

The hotel is modern, refreshing and comfortable.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  Really enjoyed their sense of humor as well. I stayed in a king room and it was spacious and clean.  The shower was amazing, it felt like you were under a waterfall.  For a place to relax and still get work done, this is it!  The hotel also offers free shuttle from the airport as well as the area.  So, close to shopping!! loved it!

I've stayed at many different properties near John Wayne Airport (SNA) over the years, but up until now, I've somehow overlooked this gem. I checked in tonight and was very impressed with Imelda and Arturo, who both really seem to enjoy working here. They were friendly, informative and just really welcoming. When I got to my room, I was again impressed. It was spacious, modern, and the bed was extermely comfortable. I decided to stay in and eat in the restaurant, which turned out to be a great decision. Sitting at the bar, I had the pleasure of meeting Ron and Javier - two really awesome guys with a natural talent for customer service. Great conversation, excellent food, and I never had to wait for a drink. This is now my new "go to" hotel whenever I'm in Orange County and I

After a hectic day of Christmas shopping, my friends and I went to the bar at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa. Richard was our server and suggested some great happy hour appetizers and cocktails. He made the best lemon drops we've ever had. We will definitely be back to visit Richard again. What wonderful service and a gentleman! A great place to go after shopping at South Coast Plaza. So close and such great prices and great service. Thank you Richard we had a wonderful time!

We stayed at the Crowne Plaza for 4 nights over Thanksgiving weekend!  It is BEAUTIFUL!!!  Very clean.  Loved the shower with dial in thermostat!!!  The Staff was amazing.  From the minute we walked in the lobby until we loaded up our car to leave, we were treated like royalty by each and every staff member we encountered.  Ashley and Ron in the bar were especially accommodating and took great care of us.  They were very friendly, helpful and prompt.  Ashley even suggested we use the free hotel shuttle one night to have dinner at the Saddle Ranch, so glad we took her advice!   Can't wait until we return in August!!!!  Highly recommend this hotel!

This hotel is very nice. It is clean, has friendly and helpful staff and the food is great. Their shuttle service is great - only one person accepted a tip. There were several business travelers who obviously choose this hotel each time they are in the area - it was like "old home week" when they found each other in the lounge one evening! This is always a good sign. A very nice upscale mall is within walking distance or their shuttle will take you there.

I have stayed over the road at the very tired Holton Costa Mesa for years, but decided to climb out of the safety zone and cross the road to the Crowne, especially as I just joined the Gold Ambassador Club.  best thing I did for ages.  Flew into LAX from Australia, arrived at hotel 8.30am.  No problem at all checking into a room at that hour!!  Received the Club upgrade.  Given breakfast voucher to use them, plus another for the next day, plus another drink voucher, all for a single night stay.  Staff were great, room was nice enough for the location (and price), pool was good, all in all, they have me for life!!  Well done Crowne.

My husband and I have completely enjoyed our Thanksgiving holiday. Our stay was great as the staff is very sweet and helpful. The room was very nice , clean, and comfy. We have stayed for 4 evenings and we were able to enjoy the hotels restaurant the Savoy. The food is scrumptious and service excellent. Our server favorites were Ana on Thanksgiving evening then Ashley and Brenda the next evening. All in all this hotel restaurant and all the employees get a 5 star vote from us! Really loved our stay.!

Ashley is an awesome bartender/ waitress. she has a great personality, and a memory like an Elephant and the food was excellent also , the rooms are nice and clean and hotel is close to our destination.   I wish they gave  more discounts through the Internet clcdws

I've stayed here a few times and it has always been a good experience.  The hotel is clean and well maintained.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  In the bar, Ashley is amazing.  She remembered my name and drinks after only having been here once before a few months previous!  The food is good, the rooms clean and quiet.  Overall, its a nice place to stay.

My favorite part of the hotel is the bar.... Love the holiday spirit.  I have stayed here for a few days now and it's been super mellow and chill.  Extra close  to mall to shop. Ashley and Elizabeth,  thx for the hospitality... Tis the season

The staff was awesome very attentive to my requests.  The rooms were more then accommodating.  The banquet staff especially Oscar Guzman, did a spectacular job.  The onsite restaurant and bar also provided incredible service, Ron, Javier, Ashley stellar.  We used the shuttle where Omar was punctual which made our excursions to dinner perfect

Have stayed here twice now. Used to stay at the Westin up the street but they got so expensive! I actually like this hotel better. Its newly remodeled and modern but still cozy. The beds are comfortable and everything is always clean. The staff is really nice and they have great perks here! Free wifi. Free parking (well, it was free last year and free valet this year due to construction but I guess its usually $10 now). A complimentary shuttle to the mall...and you can schedule it to take you elsewhere if its close by. Its also walking distance to some other little places in the area.   Haven't tried the food so I can't say anything about that....but the room service pricing isnt offensive like most places. I have stayed on the bristol street side and did not have a noise issue.

Upon arrival found that a good portion of the hotel and property were under construction.  Have to walk around the back of the property to get to the front.  Not necessarily a big issue - just would have been nice to know in advance that work is being done (oftentimes hotels will note as much when making a reservation).  Booked an upgraded King Suite room.  Wasn't really anything other than a normal room size, with a couch and a desk in the same room (no separator or anything of the sort).  Room was on 3rd/top floor - facing Bristol Street.  There was a LOT of traffic noise - which started at about 6:00am.  If this is a problem - then make a request for another room away from Bristol St.  The daily breakfast (which was included in the price of the room) was very good - choice of
Manager Response: Dear Myacknich,   Thank you for your recent visit to our hotel and for the great feedback provided.  We sincerely apologize for not having been notified of the construction to our main entrance prior to your visit.  We will be opening our brand new entrance this week and will be finished with the construction.  Please contact me personally when you are in the area next, to make sure we can accommodate you with a more comfortable room and stay.    Warm regards,    Aldo Casanova Front Desk Supervisor 3131 Bristol St. Costa Mesa, CA 92626 714 557 3000 Direct 714 957 8185 Fax acasanova@cpcostamesa.com

Summary: I just wanted to take a moment to praise the staff at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  Everyone I had contact with during my stay was extremely helpful and friendly.  Special thanks goes to my waiter, Richard, who was my server several times in a row and always as helpful, cheerful and welcoming as can be!

Split my 4 night stay between here and the Best Western in Santa Ana. Wish I stayed here the entire time! Rooms were smaller but I felt so much more cozy, relaxed, and comfortable here. I went during low season and front desk gave me the perfect room!!! Higher floor overlooking the pool. The bathroom and shower looked new and remodeled. They have a rainfall or some sort of special shower and it was divine! Lovely modern design, everything was clean, and the bed was cozy! I didn't want to leave. Good for romance or relaxing in room, but also right off freeway next to South Coast Plaza and close to everything fun in OC. Hope I get a similar room next time! Parking is $10.

Had to stay here for a quick business trip and was very pleasantly surprised! Rooms were very comfortable and recently updated. The breakfast included was great and had a pretty decent selection. Most important was the service - from the Valet (free BTW) to Ashley at the bar, it was top-notch. Everyone was helpful and very friendly - well worth it. If you are ever traveling to Irvine/Orange County, this is definitely the place to stay.

What a fantastic hotel. So modern and clean with an exceptionally friendly staff. The restaurant and bar area or fantastic. Richard took care of our group and was outstanding. Would love to have someone like that work for me. This will be our go to place in Orange County from now on.

Everyone on this property couldn't have been nicer. From check-in to check-out and everyone in between. I'd like to say kudos to Richard and Ashley in the restaurant and bar area. Very personable, friendly and efficient. Also, Arturo did a great job at check out. I'd be proud to have these people work and represent my company any day. Thank you for a pleasant stay Cindy Fore

Summary Heading: Great location, rooms and excellent staff
Summary: The hotel was a nice surprise and rooms were comfortable during my business stay. Minutes from John Wayne Airport and major freeways is why I chose this place. The dinning room is elegant and food was well prepared. Staff is kind and curdious. Location is near a major shopping area. I will be back.

Great location for South Coast Plaza and the shuttle bus is a great addition if you want to visit a restaurant nearby and not drive.  Highly recommend the suites, they are spacious and luxurious, loved the Temple Spa toiletries, bathrobes and the decor is very muted and relaxing, felt totally relaxed and loved the bedding.  The pool area is great and the bar for drinks.  All the staff were very friendly and would definitely revisit this hotel.

Summary Heading: Best staff ever and awesome restaurant
Summary: This easily was one of if not the best experience I've ever had a hotel. It started with Elizabeth at the front desk. She helped us get our rooms sorted out when we messed up, that was way too easy. Then a small group of us came down to have a quick dinner before heading out for the night. We walked in to a super clean restaurant and were given fantastic recommendations by Guiermo our server. Unfortunately they were out of the liquor we wanted for shots to start the night, normally a bummer... Not here! Ashley didn't hesitate to ask Greg the guest transportation driver to run out and pick some up for us. So cool! I've never heard of that happening before You'd think that would be enough. Nope not here. Richard the supervisor came by multiple times to make sure we were all happy

Came into town but didn't have plans until the next day so we decided to take it easy and stay in for the evening which we were kind of bummed about because we wanted to go out to a nice restaurant an go out for some drinks... However when we went downstairs we were pleasantly surprised that they had a very nice restaurant and bad area.  There were 4 of us and we all got steaks and drinks. Guillermo was our server and was awesome!!! He went above and behind for our table and made us feel like we were the only table in the restaurant. Our steaks were all cooked perfectly and tasted amazing! ( we have all been servers in college so we appreciate good service have eaten at many upscale steakhouses)   When we ordered a round of shots that were our favorite, they came back and told

My family all came in for a wedding.... It was far beyond my expectations. Had dinner at the hotel and it was amazing. I can't say enough for the service we received, Guillermo served us and made us feel like we were the only table here. Ashley at the bar sent the driver Greg out for a specific type of alcohol we wished they had. It was very considerate and never once did they expect anything "extra". It's rare to find a place that genuinely cared about our experience. It felt like they were happy to take care of us. Richard stopped by and asked how we were doing several times and made it a priority to make sure everyone (not just us) was taken care of. Great experience. Would recommend to anyone.

Could not be happier with our stay at the Crowne.   The service was great, awesome valet saving my brand new iPhone, front desk accommodating our large group and the restaurant & bar being the best part of the visit.     Thank you again Ashley, Guillermo, Greg and Richard!! This will absolutely be our place to stay when we come back to Orange County!!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel in South Orange County
Summary: My girlfriend got an incredible rate on Hotwire for the Crowne Plaza Mesa hotel Orange County this past weekend. The hotel is located less than 1/2 mile from South Coast Plaza - a shopper's paradise.  My girlfriend and I were attending a jazz concert at the Segestrom Theater for the Performing Arts only blocks away from the hotel.  The hotel has recently undergone a renovation.  Our room was very spacious and had all new furnishings (i.e. tv, desk, lamps, bedding, art work, etc).  The beds had pillowtop mattresses which were so comfortable and cozy.  We even had down pillows to sleep on!!  The bathroom had high end fixtures and was nicely decorated.  Lobby:  check in/out was efficient.  The staff was very courteous and friendly.  Bar/Restaurant:  a special thank you to Ron (wait

As a business traveler that spends half my life on the road I can honestly say the staff and amenities at the crowne plaza costa mesa are top notch.   The general manager Charles and his staff went above the call of duty to make sure me and my traveling companion had an excellent stay (kudos to Arturo and the front desk staff).    Ashley and Javier at the bar/restaurant: Thank you for the hospitality.     The rooms have all the bells and whistles a road warrior could wants.  Solid wifi, comfortable beds, quiet rooms, and rain showers.   Location is perfect for orange county business and pleasure.    Look forward to a return visit.

Last minute trip restaurant and bar is fabulous great food and great service. We had great appetizers and great sandwiches. Bar has 50 percent off appetizers. The bartenders Ashley and Javier are great ! Will stay here again. Rooms recently renovated very nice !

I recently attended a conference in which the hotel that held the conference was sold out. As such, I had to look at other alternative and Crowne Place Costa Mesa was one of my options. The room was very clean and decorated in a modern style. In addition, the room had a Keurig K cup coffee maker and a rain shower head and hand held shower head in the bathroom. In addition, appetizers were 1/2 off during Happy Hour. The hotel is very close to the 405 freeway but you do not hear any freeway traffic in the room. I will definitely like to stay at this hotel if the opportunity ever arises in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel near John Wayne Airport.
Summary: Great location with access to many different express ways (I-405 and others) as well  as very close to SNA (John Wayne) Airport in Orange county. Only 10 minutes to Newport Beach or Huntington Beach with shopping and and other activities near by.  The fitness Center had enough cardo equipment but lack strenght training machines or free weight.  Valet parking is available but not required and parking was free.  The breakfast buffet was fresh & tastie and the service was friendly and fast. The hotel was having some outdoors refreshing/remodeling and that limited the doors that I could come and go from.

I booked a stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa using hotwire. Hotwire messed up my order and I was shy a bed. It was not good news to hear that after travelling across the continent that I didn't have a place to sleep. However, the staff at the hotel were extremely helpful in sorting out my situation, despite the hotel being fully booked in multi-bed rooms. Alma and Elizabeth provided outstanding service and were patient and helpful as I tried to get Hotwire to cooperate and fix the mess. In the end, they treated us to a free breakfast for the trouble.   It wasn't their fault, but these staff were here to help and ensure our experience at the Crowne Plaza was a memorable one. They turned my negative experience with Hotwire into a positive experience with their hotel. Based on

Summary Heading: Best customer service anywhere anytime by Gary Moses from Savannah, GA
Summary: I have now stated at this hotel two separate times in the last 30 days. Each time was for five days and four nights. This hotel has had a complete renovation and it shows in the beautiful rooms that I stayed in. But better than that was the customer service of the front desk, especially Sam, and also the shuttle drivers.  The hotel has a policy of taking you anywhere you want to go within a 5 mile radius. It is the first time I had experienced that type of service. And was completely blown away with the nice and efficient way they took you places. The drivers also recommended various restaurants and grocery stores that they thought I might like. And they were correct. Also to my unbelief, the shuttle drivers refuse to take a tip for taking me to the various places I requested.

We recently spent one night at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa and  enjoyed our stay.  This hotel is pet friendly and has a nice grass area in the back.  Our room was large, very clean and the bed very comfortable...loved the rain shower!  We used the AAA rate and therefore received free parking and a buffet breakfast, which was very good. Since we arrived later in the day and had our dog with us, we used room service for dinner. ...a little pricey but the food was very good. The staff at this hotel is great!  Because of family medical issues we had to book a hotel in Costa Mesa at the last minute...there are several hotels close by but the prices are very high.  The Crowne Plaza was affordable and a very pleasant place to stay....I highly recommend it.

Currently on day 4 of 4 night stay (checking out tomorrow early am).  Very convenient location to SNA. Airport shuttle was prompt and checkin was a breeze.  Booked AAA rate and checked in as club level IHG member (gold status from previous week stay posted mid stay).  Was told at checkin that rate included breakfast which was news to me.  Given room on 5th floor, executive floor, and given a certificate for free drink in the bar as well as breakfast coupon for each day of stay, a pleasant surprise.    5th floor room overlooks pool and was very well appointed.  Appears to be newly renovated.  Single king bed, huge bathroom with walk in rain shower.  Breakfast in restaurant was above average and service was great.    Usually stay at the doubletree when in down but booked here due

Very nice stay. The room was quiet, the bed was comfortable and the front desk and valet parking people were very friendly. The downside was the bathroom had no type of fan and steamed up quite a bit. There was no way to keep the door open to let it air out. The first day of my stay my room was forgotten by the maid service. I arrived at my room from at 6:00 from my meeting to find it exactly as I had left it. I called the front desk for clean towels and they did offer to send someone up to do the room but I was too tired to wait. The next day my room was spic and span but I went to get in room coffee and that had not been restocked. Kind of frustrating.
Manager Response: Dear Tricia0123,  Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and apologize for any inconvenience during that time.  Please contact us before your next visit.   Best regards,  Aldo Casanova Front Desk Supervisor 3131 Bristol St. Costa Mesa, CA 92626 714 557 3000 Direct 714 957 8185 Fax acasanova@cpcostamesa.com

Summary: We had a nice stay at this hotel. Free self park, easy check-in/check-out, and clean updated rooms made this a great stay. The location was perfect, nearby the highway and easy hop to the airport. Great restaurants nearby including a Japanese grill open late for our late arrival! Overall, I think we were pretty satisfied.

My stay at the Crowne Plaza hotel was an excellent one, spacious, comfortable room, great location, and fine breakfast buffet.  Javier at front desk could not have been more helpful with checking in and out and even helped arrange a airport shuttle.  Ashley concocted some of the best cocktails I've ever imbibed, very friendly and lively lounge area, large pool with beautiful surrounding.  Will be back again, and I really appreciated the late check out...

Summary Heading: Most helpful staff and I would know cause I work at a crowne plaza
Summary: When first arriving everyone was very helpful in finding a place for my large vehicle to park, seeing as how the building was under construction it was not an easy task but was taken care of with no problems, during our stay we had to lengthen our stay twice cause of our application for apartments taking longer than predicted and it was handled effortlessly. All of the front desk people were beyond helpful from telling us areas to look for appt. In to roads that we might want to avoid for traffic. The bartender who's name I can't recall, she was so down to earth and was also a big help in finding a place to live, as well as amazing service seeing as how we had just drove 2600 miles it was very nice to relax and have a drink! Overall the property was beautiful and rooms were

From the moment we walk in the lobby to check in until we check out, my family always feels welcome, relaxed and special at the Crowne Plaza in Costa Mesa.  My daughter attends college nearby so we stay here when we visit her and we wouldn‚Äôt stay anywhere else because it‚Äôs beautiful,  the accommodations are clean, comfortable and most importantly, staff treats us so well.  We just got home from another trip and this morning, as usual, we enjoyed an over the top, delicious breakfast in the hotel restaurant.  We were greeted by the smiling face of Caesar, who took great care of us.  He made sure that all of our needs were met and also made us feel special - as if we were the only guests there.  The staff has a way of making everyone feel that way!  I can‚Äôt recommend them enough!

I stay here quite often. The hotel and staff has always tried to make each stay feel special. Tonight Francisco made a special trip in the hotel can to buy me something that I forgot to bring. The culture of the staff is wonderful.

As a member of the food and beverage/hospitality industry, it made my entire stay memorable when I had the pleasure to be assisted by Arturo and Sam.  Their local knowledge and recommendations were second to none.  They both validated their recommendations based on personal experience and built a relationship with me and sincerely made me feel like they needed me and not that I needed them.  I was addressed by name upon check out by Arturo who has a real passion for the role he is tasked with.  There was only one opportunity found during my visit that I will directly forward to management and not take away from Arturo and Sam.  I thank you two for making a difference and delivering an experience that inspired me.

I stayed for 6 weeks to train for my new job. I have worked in 5star resorts for 13 years so i might be a tough critic but i am also more understanding as long as service standards are up to par. I had a great stay until the day of my departure. I had been in 3 different rooms during my stay. In my 3rd room, i noticed i started getting itchy and had hives. I thought it was a reaction to something i ate. The night before i checked out I stayed up late and saw a bug on me. It was a bed bug. Then I lifted the mattress and i found a cluster and a big bug full of my blood. I brought this up to the Manager, Ernie, and he told me they werent responsible for anything if they are on my luggage and they go home with me. They will only cover medical expenses. He seemed annoyed with me and
Manager Response: Dear SDPHX,   We value and appreciate the time you took to make us aware of the challenge you faced during your visit.  Please accept our sincere apology for the inconvenience. Our corporate manager has reached out to you personally to further discuss this situation. If we can do anything else for you, please do not hesitate to call or email us directly.  Warm regards, Ernie Montalvo

Summary: Walking into the hotel I was greeted with fresh citrus water and an easy check in with Elizabeth.  Loved the new decor. Really modern and sleek. Our room was clean and comfortable. Really liked the Keruig coffee, made me feel right at home!  Great Happy Hour in the bar! Richard went above and beyond and took such great care if our group . He was really nice and funny, I will for sure be back to visit Richard!   Ashley also was great! Great food and drinks! Loved that you had Pacifico Beer!  Overall was realy Impressed and will for sure be staying there rather the Westin South Coast. Crown Plaza is way better!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The only reason this isn't a five star review is because our A/C unit seemed a bit loud, but other then that, this is a very nice hotel with a recent renovation.  Rainfall showerhead and wand are always a plus.

My company selected this hotel as our contract hotel for 2013 and I have spent probably 30-40 nights here this year already.  The room and service are always excellent on all of my stays.  This is indeed very impressive, considering I am here very often.  This is definitely a well managed and maintained hotel.  Kudos to the entire team!  The rooms are average in size and very modern and wonderfully decorated.  They offer Keurig as their inroom coffee - truly a dream for those of us coffee lovers.  Bath amenities are spa type and very high quality.  They smell nice and even great for us guys.  Products are moisturizing but not overly greasy or heavy.  I always have great skin and hair days when I stay here.  Breakfast items stay relatively fixed - they chose to stay on point with

My family planned to make the best of having our house tent fumigated by having a three day staycation. I called the Costa Mesa Crown Plaza, opposed to an internet reservation to ensure that they understood that we had a cat. When we arrived, I stayed in the car while my wife went in to check in where she was informed that they allowed dogs to 20 lbs, but not cats. Interestingly, while she was waiting to talk with the manager, a more valued customer, who was also having his house tented was allowed to bring his cat. This was discussed right in front of her! The best that can be said is that they credited our credit card for the stay. We took our business to the Fountain Valley Residence Inn where we were treated very well. I will never again darken the threshold of
Manager Response: Dear jedswift,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts and concerns. We highly value views, opinions and feedback from our guests, as this allows us to improve the service we provide.   Many IHG properties are franchised, independently owned and operated, in this case, we determine our own pet policy, often times in compliance with local ordinances. Our hotel allows dogs only and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you.   Your feedback is not only essential but is also a helpful tool to measure the level of service we extend to our guests and at the same time provides us with an opportunity to improve our standards. We are sorry for the troubles you had and do hope that this incident would not deter you from staying with us during your next visit.   Sincerely,   Dhan M Case Manager  IHGCare

Summary: I was immediately impressed with this hotel. The hotel was  very modern, it appears to be recently renovated.  The location is excellent,convenient to freeways, South Coast, restaurants,SNA.The staff was very friendly and accomadating. The room was large and comfortable. The rate was very reasonable for the season and the area. Would definitely stay here again.

Good price, modern renovation. Pool was closed which is always a downer me seem to happen frequently to us, grrr!!! Sent us over tooth Hilton pool via van. Comfy bed, good pillows, fairly quiet other than a little road noise and some dudes dogs behind the hotel.

I attended a wedding in CA and stayed here. The property is very nice and the employees are exceptional...especially Ashley the bartender and Melia the security person. Everyone who works there was more than willing to help out however they could. I would stay here again and hope that I have the opportunity to do so!

Summary Heading: Our stay was Amazing! We'll be back.
Summary: From the beginning our visit was outstanding. Grant at the front desk made sure we were well taken care of. He even helped my lost friends find their way when they got turned around. The entire staff was great. Our room was clean and the maid staff kept it that way all week. When we got back from my son's game I couldn't find the tv remote so they sent up a new one. We had a view of the pool (and some houses) but it was quiet. Parking was pretty good as well and being right off the freeway made it easy to get around. Great shopping and restaurants nearby. Don't forget to stop at the restaurant near the lobby. The wait staff made us feel right at home. Can't wait to go back.

I loved my stay at this hotel.  I was in Orange County twice and stayed there both times.  Their staff is so polite and always happy, the rooms a great- very big and comfortable - and the hotel is very clean and well maintained.  I really was comfortable here.  This will be my sna go-to hotel.

Stayed for a week at the beginning of August.  Great location 5 minutes from John Wayne Airport, right off the 405.  All of the staff very accommodating and pleasant, food in restaurant very good.  Rooms are clean, spacious, and modern with great air conditioning and free wifi.  All-in-all a great stay and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice hotel at a good price!

Stayed one Saturday night while in town for a reunion.  Sam at the front desk was GREAT!  Very hospitable and was was able to check me into my room before noon.  The room itself was sooooo comfortable, with all the amenities I could ask for!  LOVED that amazing shower as well as the Keurig (sp?)!  Bed was comfortable, linens were spotless...I could go on and on about how impressed I was with this hotel.  The only minor glitch was the $10.00 parking, which I understand is reasonable for California hotels, BUT, when I got back to the hotel late at night the front parking area was filled with non-registered cars.  I had to park in the back garage, which was somewhat unnerving, being a woman traveling alone.  That by no means would keep me from staying here again....just wanted to

We recently spent the weekend here and were so impressed by the positive attitude and outstanding service of all the staff, from the front desk to the restaurant wait staff and housekeeping.  Erik in the restaurant remembered the specifics of our breakfast order from the first morning, making us feel like more than just another table to serve.  Kudos to all!

Summary Heading: I would give 3.5 stars if I could.
Summary: Pro's:  Nice hotel with a really good breakfast buffet. Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Rooms are nice but a little weathered in spots. Wi-Fi works well. Price was very reasonable. Ample parking on a non- Friday/Sat night.  Neutral: Location:  I had to backtrack to get to the hotel when coming back from Newport area.  OK to leave from there though. Cleaning people took our remote?  Batteries were low in the first remote. AC a little noisy. High def TV with no HD signal.  Negatives: Parking spots are super narrow in the garage.

I stayed at the Crowne Plaza hotel as my Mother in Law, Husband and I were in town for a friends wedding. We had organised to stay in a room with a king size bed (this also helped us get a deal, being guests at this particular wedding) and we had requested that another small bed (for my Mother in Law) could be added to the room. Yes, they said. After booking, my Father in Law confirmed with the hotel staff that there were three adults coming and we would need an extra bed, we were told this was no problem. A couple of days before our arrival, my Mother in Law phoned to confirm the extra bed and the staff told her that there would be an extra bed in our room. Upon arrival at 3pm, we were told the room was not ready and we would have to wait until 3.40pm and we could change for
Manager Response: Dear E_Arkley,  Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We‚Äôre sorry we fell below your expectation regarding customer service, the roll away bed and the air conditioning which was unacceptable. We will address these points.  I assure you the feedback of our hotel will be reviewed and most certainly forwarded to the appropriate departments. We take  the confidence our guests place in us very seriously and work diligently to rectify any unsatisfactory experiences. We hope you give us a chance in the future to show you how great our hotel is.  Sincerely,  Orlando A. Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: Very good service and excellent tripadvisor guy Greg.
Summary: I would like to share good experience with Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange Country trip advisor guy Greg.  Greg is very helpful and excellent guy. He give us a ride to shopping and dinner.  He is very knowledge and he knows all around.  I am very happy with service and hotel.  Thanks you, Neville & Jennifer.

Summary Heading: My mini vacation was incredible! Thank crowne!
Summary: Front desk was polite. Anosh the front drake girl was super.buffet was really tasty and fransico was courteous. Ashely the bartender was a lively personally that made our evening very entertaining. I recommend this place any time.

Summary Heading: Left wanting for.......nothing!  It was THAT good!
Summary: Honestly, I do not recall being this overall happy with a hotel in recent memory!  The property is maintained to meticulous standards, immaculately clean public areas, as well as guest rooms, the layout of the hotel is ideal for convenience, and the staff is outstanding!  Every single person I encountered from the front office staff to the housekeeping and engineering staff gave me a very sincere warm greeting, asked if I was in need of anything, and genuinely seemed to care!  The front desk team simply could not do enough for me, quite literally falling all over themselves to be of service!  I saw a great deal of pride virtually everyone seemed to exude in their property, which is of course most unusual but very welcome in today's world!! Of particular mention at the front

I'm an Angeleno through and through, but some celebrations in Orange County have left me in need of a "second home." Luckily, I think I've found it. Nestled at the cusp of South Coast Metro and Costa Mesa, this hotel is truly convenient, comfortable, and clean. The staff is incredibly friendly, and make sure to visit the bar for some great specials. I stayed two weekends back to back in July, and both rooms were spic and span, comfortable, and quiet - which induced peaceful rest after a day of adventures. Good things to note: they have a shuttle that will take you anywhere within a 5 mile proximity - including the OC Fair! There is a McDonalds a few steps away for some fast food needs. Down the street is a mini mall plaza with plenty of restaurants to try, and extremely close is

From the moment we got to the hotel, We  felt we were wanted and appreciated- Chris at the front desk was knowledgeable and so helpful- he was a pleasure to deal with- this shows customer service is NOT dead                    Next the savoy their restaurant has a GREAT happy hour and again we found a great waitress this time named ANA who was just marvelous- the food and drinks were good and fairly priced- all in all a great vacation and large spacious room with comfortable beds

We stayed here for 5 nights and it was really a wonderful experience. Our room was on the 5th floor overlooking the jacuzzi; it was spacious and very clean, and most of all, very quiet :) The staff and their services are outstanding...fast and sincere. Staff at the restaurant are nice, too and the buffet is worth the price, good selection. Few minor things I have to comment...some of the paint chips in the bathroom need to be polished and a couple of faded or slightly torn spots on the carpet floor should be fixed. Otherwise, it is an excellent place to stay in Costa Mesa; parking is always available  in the garage. It's sad that they don't have availability for our next coming trip dates for our requested room...so we have to stay at another hotel.

I stayed here at the end of July for a 10 day stay in Cali (my first trip to the West Coast).  I have to say that the hotel staff are very friendly and professional, particularly the female barmaid...who was very funny.  I needed somewhere close to Huntington Beach but as I booked when the US open suf comp was on...my options in Huntington were a little limited.  I guess things work out for a reason and I couldn't have asked for a more comfortable room.  The rooms have obviously just been rennovated and are absolutely spotless...the bed was great and tbh I couldn't have changed a thing about the room. Very modern and peaceful!  There was ample parking at the hotel (with the overspill car park behind the hotel)...so even late nights left me with no issue finding a spot.  Would I

I travel often for business and pleasure and have to say this hotel is top notch. The hotel staff are extremely helpful. They offered me printed directions and personalized service. My room was immaculate. The shower featured a handheld spray and a rain showerhead. Relaxation lotions and sprays were available bedside. My room also had a personal mini Keurig. Breakfast was extremely good. The only dissapoinment was I couldn't stay longer. I plan to go back for a fun visit in September and would not stay anywhere else.

Summary Heading: A nice hotel with renovated rooms.
Summary: Stayed here for one night as a Platinum member. Rooms renovated as were the bathrooms. Decent sized rooms and bathroom. Breakfast was very good. Service in hotel also very good. Hotel near major mall in area.

Excellent, excellent service. I stayed here for a week long business trip involving long hours and little sleep, and it was extremely comforting to stay somewhere where the staff really cares about you and your stay. Specifically the front desk staff (Grant, Imelda and Chris for me) were more than happy to help, and wonderful people to interact with. Overall, very happy!

I stayed here 5 days for a training and from the moment I walked in to the moment I left I felt welcomed! The room was beautiful and immaculate clean. Greg shuttled me from the airport and he was great, Front Desk Staff and Restaurant Staff very accommodating. In my group there were people from all over and they all had great things to say, including myself from CT. Keith, thank you for your hospitality! I know for sure that if I go back to Costa Mesa, this property is were I will stay!  Simply fenomenal!!

I cannot find anything negative about my stay.  The people working at the hotel and restaurant went above and beyond outstanding customer service.  Great location, we attended the orange county fair it was terrific.   Thanks for the great stay.

Very happy with the service i received. Was only a one night stop off in LA before heading off to Bora Bora for my honeymoon! Front desk was great and upgraded me to the suite due to my IHG ambassador card. Breakfast was decent and they arranged free parking for me as well. Can't complain! No real magic or sparks but did its job at a very generous price. Would recommend if you want a decent location without a killer price.

I was very impressed with this hotel. The location is very convenient to the airport and South Coast mall and business area. There are many restaurants to choose from. The rooms were very nice and comfortable. The staff truly exceeds expectations. The rate was very reasonable for the area. I look forward to a return to this fine hotel.

Summary Heading: Stay, Park and Fly - thanks for making it work!
Summary: My wife and I recently spent two nights here. One at the start of our trip, the other on the return. We drove from our home (200 miles) and flew out of John Wayne Airport, using the parking package we got a covered garage spot for our car for 15 days for about $50 extra on the room. A great value, and they have a shuttle to the airport. The return flight was late at night, so we stayed over and drove home the next day. The renovated property is very nice, they are still doing some work, but nothing to interfere. The breakfast is a good value and the food is very good. Especially helpful was Ernie Montalvo who helped with booking the parking part of the package. At the front desk, Javier was very courteous and helpful as were the others whose names I don't recall.  We used the

The building used to house the "Hanford" hotel (according to my GPS and confirmed by hotel staff). It has been the Crown Plaza for the past year. But why didn't they renovate before opening? The lobby and restaurant were fine but the rooms...carpet was old, dirty, smelly. The lights were difficult to turn on/off. The room set up a bit outdated.   Furthermore, at check in: I am a Priority Rewards Club member but forgot my card. The person who checked me in reported that he could not pull up my membership number (Huh?)  Very strange!
Manager Response: Dear shortcakes12,  Thank you for being an IHG Club Rewards member and for writing us a review.  Please accept our sincerest apologies for failing to meet your expectations with regard to our hotel's overall aesthetics. Additionally, I am truly sorry for not being able to deliver the highest level of survive our members deserve. We deeply regret the the negative experience and impressions you may have had.   Our goal is to ensure that all our clients leave satisfied and we try our best to fulfill all our guest requests, therefore, we are sincerely concerned when we fall short of your expectations. I have taken note of your valuable comments and will use these to monitor and improve the quality of services we offer to our guests. Once again, thank you for your comments.   Dhan M Case Manager  IHGCare

Summary: When we arrived at this hotel we had two problems no room and wrong dates. All my problem as I'd messed up the online booking. The front desk, despite having a full hotel worked wonders. I can't thank them enough.   We had to put up with a single room and a sofa bed, but again the great front desk staff worked hard and found us a new room with two beds for the following night. Outstanding.   The hotel is a little tired if honest, but this is a minor issue. The pool marvellous but the 'gym' really poor. A few cv machines and a bench press. Quite disappointing.   But still....no complaints from me given the outstanding service from the front staff... True people first service...best ever! I hope the MD reads this review as these people need a bonus/reward for sure :-)

Visited this hotel in April and had a great time. The restaurant was clean and food decent. Rooms were nicely appointed and the bathroom was beautiful! Convenient access off the highway made getting to this property a breeze.

I had a meeting for 20 people at the Crowne Plaza and the team there did a fantastic job. The meeting director Keith went out of his way to meet the needs of attendees with allergies and to accommodate schedule changes during the week. Greg shuttling our group around each night was a huge benefit to see the area. Ashley and Jen were great in the restaurant. Nice pool and rooms. Plus walking distance to the Camp and Lab or mall to dine out really gave everyone in the group a lot of variety for dinner. I would definitely have a meeting or stay here again.

I was fortunate enough to stay at this great property early last week. The rooms were recently renovated and the staff was incredibly friendly and attentive. From the front desk to the restaurant/bar staff and the housekeeping team, I never saw a face without a smile on it. This is a hotel I would recommend to others without hesitation.

I stayed at this hotel for a week.   Work was extremely busy so it was great to return in the evening to the hospitality of Ashley and the rest of the restaurant/bar staff.   They were all very friendly.   Before I sat in my seat Ashley had my beer on the table.  I will return for sure.  Go Sox!

Summary Heading: Crowne Plaza near South Coast Plaza
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. We travel to Orange County 2-3 times per year and tend to not stay at a different place each time. This was a very restful and enjoyable trip. I liked the proximity to South Coast Plaza and the shuttle service was absolutely fantastic and very flexible. I would have preferred a room on the top floor, but none was available at the time.   The only thing that I found disturbing was that the hallway carpets were rather dirty with spilled food and cola stain marks, but a couple of days prior to our departure, this was cleaned. It should, however, be a priority to keep the hallway carpets clean and patrons need to be more respectful of hotel property in general!

Summary Heading: The bartenders Ashley and Emily are fantastic! Great service all around!!
Summary: From the free shuttle wherever we want to go to the great food, fun pool, and beautiful rooms this was a great deal!!! The duck confit fries and espresso martinis amazing! I was so impressed with how friendly the staff is and so accommodating!

Summary Heading: Nice stay. Great room, good bar, good service and awesome shower.
Summary: I will stay there again just for the rain shower, room service and the bar. Ashlee served me at the bar all 3 nights I was in town for work and she was great. My room was very clean, comfortable and had everything I needed. I love how easy it is to get to the hotel, lots of open free parking, free Internet and close to everything. Ill be back for sure.

I often travel early out of SNA airport and prefer to stay nearby so I don't have to get up to drive an hour.   I was thrilled to hear that the old, outdated Crowne Plaza shut down and moved to a new location.  I initially thought I was going to be disappointed when I pulled up to the hotel, but the inside of the hotel is boutique style with more updates in progress.  The staff is great at both the front desk and at the bar.   The rooms are fantastic with completely updated bathrooms.   After a little research, I discovered the CP bought this hotel from a private operator that were trying to make it a higher end boutique hotel.   Most of the materials in the hotel are high quality, there are some painted finishes showing wear that need to be replaced (interior of elevator and

Summary Heading: I refuse to stay anywhere else when I travel to the LA area!
Summary: I absolutely adore this hotel! Phenomenal staff, excellent housekeeping, with a nice and modern flare. I have an upcoming reservation at the end of this month and was upset when I was going to stay at a different crowne plaza, but I rearranged my trip dates just so I can stay here! Lance has once again out-done himself at providing excellent service even when I called the hotel at 3AM at night! Fantastic!  This will be my 3rd time staying at this hotel and many more times to come.   This hotel definitely provides the high quality hotel, service, at a reasonable price!    P.S Their beds are sooooo comfortable!

Summary Heading: 5 stars to the Crown Plaza Staff
Summary: Thanks to the staff Grant, Art, Ashley and special thanks to Chris for his Hospitality. I have stayed here many times and would recommend it to anyone needing a room in the area. When I'm hear again this is where ill will stay without question .

I am heading to the Hotel for Boot Camp CMD Training.This is a preliminary review. But what I can say is that when I called the Hotel for some specific requests (Yes I'm a "specific" traveler and hate flying and have specific needs). Grant at the front desk is great, he accommodated my requests and was helpful with transportation info and getting the extra fridge I need will need in my room. He was also helpful with getting me details for me getting to Disney on Friday to meet my family! Great job! Not even there yet, but looking forward to it! Grant being able to answer advanced local questions was great. True local. I am a former Los Angeles resident from Hollywood and Beverly Hills...Great Job!!

The hotel and service are great. The front desk was very polite and greeted you when you came in. The service at the bar and restaurant was fantastic and Ashley that was working the bar went out of her way to make sure you were taken care of with great service. The general Manager Charles went out of his way as well to make sure my stay was excremental and because of that service I will be coming back time and time again. The food for breakfast is better than you would get at a breakfast only dinner and I recommend it for anybody that stays at this hotel. They treat you like you are on vacation even know you are staying at the hotel just for work. The rooms are great too!

This is a special place. Charles the GM deserves kudos for creating a great culture. At the bar a girl named Ashley provides very friendly service. You have to stay here and say hi to Ashley. She makes wonderful conversation

Summary Heading: ... go the bar and ask Ashley for the No. 2
Summary: Pros: ez check in, free shuttle service, the room was pretty and loved the bathroom.   Cons: took about an hour to get a bagel/coke from room service, no fridge in the room, and remodeling which held up the elevator.  Overall a good stay, would  definitely recommend to others and we plan on coming back.  Very close to shopping and dining, went to the lounge both nights and met Ashley, the bartender she was very nice and friendly ‚Ä¶ between her, my boyfriend and myself we came up with a great cocktail, next time you‚Äôre at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa go see her and ask her for the No. 2.

Service was excellent!! When we would call down for anything, it was taken care of immediately.  The front desk was very polite and friendly. The restaurant was fantastic.  We had "Eggs Florentine" every morning and don't forget to ask for Emily as your server, she was prompt and fun to have as a waitress. Would have liked to see the hot tub a bit fuller and cleaner. For two people, there was limited storage room. We enjoyed on 3 night stay and will go back every opportunity we have when we visit Orange County.

Conveniently located off the 405 close to shopping. We stayed one night. Friendly staff. Rooms clean spacious & modern, comfortable stay. Great water pressure, comfortable beds. Only thing that needs work on is HDTV.

Summary Heading: Excellent value, location can't be beat!
Summary: July 4th weekend in CA can be difficult. But we stayed at the Crowne Plaza on Costa mesa and had the most relaxing time. Every night we hit the hotel bar for a night cap. Ashley was the best! Very friendly and the perfect combination of chattiness and efficiency. She made the hotel stay jump from good to excellent. I would recommend the hotel to anyone wanting a relaxing coastal weekend.

Summary Heading: Comfort in the land of plenty
Summary: We were in S Cal for an anniversary party - but if we'd wanted to go shopping this would have been The Place. Nothing missing from excellent room except perhaps a mini-fridge. A good breakfast available in the. Sizable dining-room and you can take it out to a nice terrace.  We'd go back again.

Although this very centrally located hotel is undergoing a serious "facelift", the staff was very helpful.  I agree with the other comments regarding Javier...he is excellent!   Helpful, and friendly...he stands out immediately from check-in to check-out.  Another super star is in their dining room and her name is Emily!  She obviously enjoys working with people and made our dining experience a joy!!  Always smiling and anxioius to help you in anyway she can, pleasant and professional....one of the most memorable servers in our travels!!  There is another great member of the staff in Costa Mesa and he works in the bar.  I don't recall his name, but he was very pleasant and it was obvious that he enjoyed what he did. These three members of the team at the Crown Plaza Costa Mesa

This is just our first day of a three day stay at the Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa. I read the great reviews for this hotel and they have not disappointed us! We called the hotel for shuttle pick up at the airport and they were prompt, courteous and friendly. Javier at the reception desk was just helpful and friendly. he informed us that the gym was under renovation but not to worry they would take us to L.A. fitness and pick us up at no charge. The room was great but had a problem with the air conditioning. We called and someone was there in minutes. The air conditioning needed to be replaced. Issac the head of maintenance was terrific. he was knowledgeable, professional and prompt to transfer us to a new room. What could have been a hassle was solved easily! So far lunch at the

Summary Heading: Crowne Plaza Costa Mesa Orange County
Summary: I love this hotel because Javier is the most wonderful, helpful, friendliest person I've encountered in all my travels. Our company trip was held there 2 years in a row and both times were especially memorable for me because of Javier. He remembered me from the year before.  He made sure I had everything I needed when ever he was at the desk. His service is quick, knowledgable, and personable.  Thank you Crowne Plaza and thank you Javier for making our week of training all that much more fun! See you next year!

Summary Heading: 3.5 at Best - Not a 4 - Would repeat
Summary: I have stayed at this property before.   There is a small conservative lobby which is glamorized by creative photography.   The front desk staff are sufficiently polite.   The beds are acceptable.  All in all, it is an acceptable short stay property.  One of the positives here worth mentioning is that they did not charge for parking.  Given the gross overcharging for parking at comparable properties nearby, one must consider that paying a bit more here can actually net you savings as at the time of last stay, it was gratis.  The caveat is that during certain peak times when you may be returning in the evening, you may find yourself queuing around the lot for a spot -- particularly on Friday or Saturday night as the lobby level has some drinkers occupying these spaces.   Just
Manager Response: Dear B P,  Thank you for your recent review of our hotel. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We were pleased to see such high scores for Service, Sleep Quality, and Cleanliness. We have taken note of your additional comments and have shared these with our management team to aid in any decisions for updates or changes. We hope we have the honor of serving you again and making your stay the best it can be.  Sincerely,  Adrian D. Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: This hotel is wonderfully located (near shops, restaurants and attractions). The service was excellent and the room was spacious. The staff were very helpful and courteous. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and will return.

Summary Heading: Customer service driven, Clean, quiet and total class act
Summary: Needed a getaway and the Crowne definitely delivered!  There wasn't one request in three days that couldn't be accommodated.    We found the rooms to be quiet, beds and pillows so comfy!  Fluffy bath towels and great shower!  All the comforts of home.  Even a Kuerig in the room!!!   The bar / restaurant food to be delicious and affordable, the staff went above and beyond, and super friendly. Special mention to the following staff:   Ashley Emily Francisco Guillermo Reuben Ernesto "Ernie" Art Shae    All very accommodating and professional!

While the lobby of the hotel is very nice, the rooms are hit and miss.  The beds are very nice and comfortable, but the bathroom could use some work.  There was a significant amount of rust above the  bathroom mirror.  Upon check-in I received a voucher for a free breakfast which was very good.  They have a buffet or you can order off the menu.  This was a nice change from the usual hotel free breakfasts I've been eating.  I stayed here due to having a very early flight the next morning from SNA that wound up being cancelled which explains why I was able to eat breakfast.  Distance to the airport is less than 10 minutes even with traffic.

Our recent stay was unbelievable ‚Äì the minute we walked through the door we were greeted with professionalism and 5 Star services.  Checking In was quick ‚Äì Room was beautifully staged and extremely clean (did not find 1 hair in the bathroom- my peeve)  Hotel Staff -from the Maintance Worker to the Front Desk- always inquired if we need anything.

Summary Heading: Pretty good but probably will try others
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights in April. We got a good deal. The location is very convenient, right off the freeway. There is a McDonald right next to it. Also there are lots of restaurants and shops close by. The lobby is very nice. The lady checked us in quickly and is friendly. The room is good size and clean. We didn't try the restaurant.  It wasn't too warm in April but the room is still a little stuffy. We tried turning on the AC but it is loud probably because it is an older unit. Our room faced Bristol Street so it can get noisy especially late night when everywhere else is quiet.  When we checked out, we were charged $20 for parking ($10 per night) even though we booked the package including parking. When I pointed it out, the lady was apologetic and immediately corrected
Manager Response: Dear SLTrips,   Thank you for providing us with a very considerate review and thank you for staying with us. We certainly do our utmost to make your stay comfortable and pleasant, so we are very pleased to note that you were satisfied with the level of service, facilities and the location of the hotel. I would also like to  apologize for the dissatisfaction you had experienced. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas and take the necessary actions to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future. Thank you for staying with us and we all hope to have an opportunity to serve you again.  Sincerely,   Janice A Case Manager  IHGCare

Summary: I read tons of reviews before selecting this as my OC destination for 4 nights.   The Good:  It's unassuming on the outside but has modern decor on the inside.  The rooms are great.  Comfy beds and great showers.  All of the staff were exceptional.  Great proximity to a mall and shuttle service to areas close to the hotel is a nice perk.  The bad:   Housekeeping was a bit of a dud.  Breakfast was just meh and room service was meh.  Could've passed on both.    The ugly: The carpet in the executive wing needs to be pulled and burned.  Gross....remove it.    Overall, a solid 3 star hotel.  A great bang for your buck.   Lower your expectations and you should be fine.....otherwise there are other options in the area.
Manager Response: Dear moniepoo77,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review of our property. We're so pleased you liked the fine location of our hotel in the area and the friendliness of our staff. Please allow us to apologize for the service you received and our breakfast selections was less than satisfactory. We also apologize for the unusual condition of our carpets in the executive wing which did not live up to your expectations.
